name: Palmer House a Hilton Hotel
description: "The Chicago Hotel the World Knows Best." The hip & historic Palmer House Hilton has a history of over 140 years and after a multi-million dollar renovation continues to thrive in the heart of the theatre and financial district, just steps from the Art Institute, Millennium Park and State Street shopping. This Chicago hotel features 130,000 sq. ft. of function space with over 77 meeting rooms, seven ballrooms and two exhibition halls. Lockwood Restaurant and Bar, located just off the lobby and Potter's Lounge, perfect for cocktails will enhance your experience.

name: InterContinental Chicago Magnificent Mile, an IHG Hotel
description: Step into our airy lobby with a sweeping staircase and marble mosaic floors, and find yourself drifting into the Roaring Twenties at the InterContinental Chicago hotel, where historic origins blend into the modern luxuries of hospitality. Enjoy breathtaking views of Chicago from the 32nd-floor Tower Lounge, or unwind with a sauna or massage in our luxurious spa. An elevated dining experience with flawless service and gourmet cuisine typify Michael Jordan's Steak House and ENO Wine Bar.
amenities: Photo Copier / Fax In Business Center

name: The Peninsula Chicago
description: The Peninsula Chicago is the five-star hotel that brought traditional Asian service to a city already renowned for the warmth of its hospitality. The hotel has become an integral part of Chicago life and is considered the top choice for everything from accommodation to celebrations and corporate events. For this, the hotel credits its strong links to both the local community and international heritage. The Peninsula Chicago has proudly received a Forbes Travel Guide Five-Star rating each year since its opening.

address_obj.address_string: 108 E Superior St At North Michigan Avenue, Chicago, IL 60611-2645

name: Hyatt Regency Chicago
description: Discover the difference between a hotel and a Hyatt when you stay at our incomparable downtown hotel. Set within the epicenter of the city, our AAA Four Diamond Hyatt Regency Chicago is conveniently located in the heart of the downtown Chicago, connected to the Illinois Center and within minutes of the Magnificent Mile, Navy Pier, Millennium Park & Maggie Daley Park.
amenities: Photo Copier / Fax In Business Center

name: Loews Chicago Hotel
description: Experience Chicago from the heart of the city at the new Loews Chicago Hotel. Our luxury downtown Chicago hotel occupies the first 14 floors of a highly visible 52-story tower located just one block north of the Chicago River and two blocks east of North Michigan Avenue. The hotel boasts spectacular city skyline and lake views from the 400 new guestrooms (including 25 suites) and meeting spaces both indoors and out.

name: Warwick Allerton - Chicago
description: Glamour, revisited. The beautifully rejuvenated Warwick Allerton - Chicago offers charming accommodations at a storied address. Experience boutique ambience in one of The Windy City's grandest hotels. With its 443 stylishly designed rooms, renowned Warwick hospitality, and convenient location among the shopping, dining, and entertainment along Chicago's famed Magnificent Mile, the Warwick Allerton - Chicago is everything you are looking for during your stay in the Windy City.

name: Swissotel Chicago
description: Comfort and productivity come together where the river meets the lake at Swissotel Chicago. Swissotel Chicago is graced with European style and contemporary Swiss elegance. The luxury experience includes award-winning hospitality, well-appointed accommodations and breathtaking views. Housed in a distinctive glass triangle structure, our hotel stands out for its international style, downtown sophistication and central location to signature sights. Find peace of mind and productivity in our recently upgraded 662 guest rooms or 42 luxury suites. Our business-friendly amenities make travel simple and seamless and our 65,000 sq ft of state-of-the-art meeting rooms, ballrooms and special venue space excel as an efficient place to meet, connect, celebrate and do business. We also have one on-site restaurant, hotel bar, and a penthouse fitness centre.

address_obj.address_string: 323 East Upper Wacker Drive, Chicago, IL 60601-9722

name: Viceroy Chicago
description: Viceroy Chicago, located in the exclusive Gold Coast neighborhood, marks Viceroy's first destination in the Windy City. Located at the site of the 1920s-era Cedar Hotel, among historic mansions and just steps to the Magnificent Mile and Lake Michigan, Viceroy Chicago offers a locally-inspired luxury experience with 180 guestrooms and suites.

name: W Chicago - Lakeshore
description: See the Gold Coast of Chicago like never before at W Chicago - Lakeshore. From our perfect location on Lake Shore Drive, our hotel provides unlimited access to the best of Chicago, Illinois. During your stay in one of 520 sleek hotel rooms and suites, you can enjoy waterfront views that are absolutely unrivaled while you plan your next adventure. Meanwhile, stay active with the latest workout equipment at FIT or make a splash at WET®, our heated indoor pool. When hunger catches up to you during your visit, beat it like never before with seasonally inspired American cuisine at CURRENT, our hotel restaurant. Socialize over cocktails at the Living Room, the place to see and be seen on the Gold Coast. Celebrate and succeed in dynamic event space, from intimate meeting rooms to the stunning 33rd-floor Altitude, overlooking the shores of Lake Michigan. Whatever brings you here, W Chicago - Lakeshore is ready to help you keep it fun.

address_obj.address_string: 644 N Lake Shore Dr, Chicago, IL 60611-3017

name: Pendry Chicago
description: Steeped in history, anchored in style. Set within the iconic 1929 Art Deco Carbide & Carbon Building in Chicago’s Loop neighborhood, Pendry Chicago is a modern-day luxury hotel that pays homage to both the past and the present with contemporary, comfortable interiors, signature culinary and cocktail concepts, and inspired gathering spaces throughout that embody the spirit of Chicago.

name: The Westin Galleria Houston
description: The Westin Galleria Houston is a Four-Diamond hotel with direct access to The Galleria mall. With our dynamic Uptown location, you are placed just minutes from many of Houston’s top attractions. Exercise with a view at our 24-hour WestinWORKOUT® Fitness Studio and stay cool in our outdoor pool. The Westin Galleria Houston provides easy access to everything the city offers.

name: Omni Houston Hotel
description: Located in Uptown Houston, near the Galleria Mall and 6 miles from Downtown Houston, the Four-Diamond Omni Houston Hotel elevates the guest experience. The hotel offers all the comforts and amenities of a resort with the convenience of an urban setting. Hotel Details: The hotel is a chic retreat with a luxury spa, weekend nightclub, and two outdoor pools. Enjoy Texas cuisine and stroll the lushly landscaped hotel grounds in Houston, TX. Plush room and suites feature marble baths and flat-screen TVs. Kids are treated to a games-filled backpack and in-room video games. As one of Houston's most romantic hotels, Omni Houston Hotel features elegant banquet rooms for weddings, as well as spaces for large corporate meetings. With fantastic city views, exceptional service and amenities, and the finest of dining and world-class shopping on your doorstep, Omni Houston Hotel is the only way to experience America's fourth-largest city.
amenities: Free Wifi in the Business Center

name: Marriott Marquis Houston
description: Discover the seamless fusion of contemporary elegance and unparalleled hospitality at the Marriott Marquis Houston. Situated in the heart of downtown Houston, Texas, our hotel provide convenience with a modern allure. Seamlessly linked by a skywalk to the George R. Brown Convention Center, our spacious guest rooms and suites offer a haven of comfort and style. Indulge in the ultimate relaxation with a refreshing plunge in our infinity pool or drift along the world's largest Texas-shaped rooftop lazy river. Whether from these aquatic wonders or the comfort of your room, immerse yourself in sweeping park or city vistas, accompanied by a wealth of deluxe amenities designed to elevate your stay. Explore an array of culinary delights across our diverse six dining outlets, each offering a unique and flavorful journey to cater to every palate.
amenities: Photo Copier / Fax In Business Center

name: Hilton Houston-Americas
description: This AAA Four-diamond hotel is conveniently located in the heart of downtown Houston and connected to the George R. Brown Convention Center via two indoor skywalks. This Houston convention center hotel is just steps away from Discovery Green Park, Toyota Center, BBVA Compass Stadium, GreenStreet premier dining and entertainment center, and Minute Maid Park. With 1,200 guest rooms and 91,500 sq. ft. of meeting space, the Hilton Americas hotel in Houston, TX is the ideal choice for corporate meetings and events.
amenities: Photo Copier / Fax In Business Center

name: Blossom Hotel Houston
description: Opened in February 2022 The 13-story, 267-room hotel at 7118 Bertner is the only luxury hotel near NRG Stadium and the latest entry into the Texas Medical Center's field of luxury hotels. The hotel was recently named among the 10 Hottest New Hotels in the U.S. for 2022 as part of TripAdvisor’s 2022 Travelers' Choice Awards. Whether traveling for business or leisure, guests will enjoy the lunar-inspired property for its stellar culinary offerings, luxurious amenities and services, spacious guest rooms, a rooftop pool, a state-of-the-art fitness center outfitted by Peloton™, and a plethora of event and meeting spaces fit for every occasion. All rooms feature spacious living areas with an abundance of natural light and are equipped with complimentary Wi-Fi, top-of-the-line Samsung Smart TVs, Dyson hairdryers, Nespresso coffeemakers, Digital Newspapers with PressReader®, and marble bathrooms with rain shower heads and high-end bathroom amenities. Conveniently located, guests can enjoy the diversity of Houston by exploring via a complimentary Mercedes-Benz shuttle to nearby attractions such as NRG Stadium, Texas Medical Center, the Houston Zoo, Museum District, Rice University/Rice Village, and numerous world-class restaurants.

name: The Post Oak Hotel at Uptown Houston
description: The Post Oak Hotel is the only Texas Forbes Five-Star Hotel and Spa and Houston’s only AAA Five-Diamond destination. Set on 10 oak-studded acres, the 38-story tower boasts 250 ultra-modern guestrooms and suites; 20 executive residences; and an elegant 35,000-square-foot conference facility, including the largest ballroom in the Uptown Houston area. Unique amenities include Texas' only Forbes Five Star Spa, a state-of-the-art Technogym fitness center, a two-story Rolls-Royce showroom and on-site Bentley and Bugatti Post Oak Motors dealership, as well as six restaurants and bars throughout the hotel. The Cellar at The Post Oak, houses a wine collection with over 30,000 bottles, offering guests access to more than $5 million of the world’s finest wines including vintages dating back to the 1800’s. Additional offerings for an effortless experience include the indulgent Post Oak Salon, and the hotel’s fashion-forward boutique, 29 North.
amenities: Free Wifi in the Business Center

name: The Royal Sonesta Houston Galleria
description: Casual sophistication with modern appeal is what you'll find at The Royal Sonesta Houston, one of the few AAA Four Diamond rated hotels in Houston. From a laid-back atmosphere, ample amenities and fine dining to a location within walking distance to the Houston Galleria mall and Uptown neighborhood, our hotel is the perfect place to work, gather, rest or retreat. Settle into one of the 485 beautifully appointed guest rooms and suites, sip at Axis Lounge, or eat at ARA restaurant, TableOne chef's table, or Launch for meals on the go. Host a meeting, throw a gala or say "I do" in our 50,000 flexible square feet of event space, one of the finest for hotels in Houston, TX.

name: The Houstonian Hotel, Club & Spa
description: Travel + Leisure 2023 World's Best Award, No. 1 Resort Hotel in Texas With 27 wooded acres adjacent to Houston’s Memorial Park, this urban escape defines Texas elegance and delivers plenty of room to roam, dine and play with no resort fees! Guest pleasures are endless with meandering pools and outdoor spaces, legendary restaurants, newly renovated guestrooms and suites, and complimentary access to the exclusive Houstonian Club. This famous property was once the home of President and Mrs. George H.W. Bush and is a reflection of all that Houston is – strong, beautiful and friendly. The newly renovated Trellis Spa at The Houstonian with its outdoor Soaking Pools & Garden is right outside the door of the hotel, and Solaya Spa & Salon by The Houstonian is located just 2.5 miles from the property with complimentary transportation for hotel guests.

address_obj.address_string: 111 N Post Oak Ln, Houston, TX 77024-7703

name: Houston Marriott Westchase
description: Discover the west end of Houston, TX, at the Houston Marriott Westchase. Our hotel offers spacious, well-appointed rooms, contemporary Texas-themed decor, and high-speed Internet throughout our AAA-rated 3-diamond hotel. Other amenities include indoor/outdoor heated swimming pools, a fitness center, parking, two restaurants, and Starbucks(R) coffee house. The Westchase section of Houston is conveniently located near key Houston landmarks like Reliant Stadium, Rice University, and The Uptown Galleria Area and is home to companies such as National Oilwell Varco, Honeywell, and BMC Software. A few minutes from the hotel is the I-10 Energy Corridor, a business hotspot for Energy powerhouses like ExxonMobil, Shell, BP, Schlumberger, and many others. Along with amazing rooms and service, we have over 43,000 square feet of available meeting space for your next conference or event, including the Grand Pavilion Ballroom, which has seating for 1,725 guests. Book your stay at The Houston Marriott Westchase Hotel today.
amenities: Photo Copier / Fax In Business Center

name: Hyatt Regency Houston
description: Situated in the heart of downtown’s thriving business and entertainment districts, the newly renovated Hyatt Regency Houston is connected to restaurants and services via the city’s famous seven-mile tunnel system. Walk to events at the nearby George R. Brown Convention Center. Take in an Astros' game at Minute Maid Park or Rockets' game at Toyota Center. Be sure to save time to enjoy a show in downtown’s Theater District or explore the shops along Main Street. A quick ride on Houston’s METRO Light Rail, with stops just seconds from our hotel, will take you to the renowned Museum District, Children’s Museum, the Houston Zoo, the Texas Medical Center or Reliant Park. When it’s time to relax, retreat to your spacious accommodations with Downtown views and thoughtful amenities. Always the right choice; book your reservation now at our outstanding accommodations.

name: Loews Philadelphia Hotel
description: Home to America’s first skyscraper and the Philadelphia Savings Fund Society (PSFS), Loews Philadelphia Hotel is a historic hotel in one of America’s most historic cities. In 2019, the hotel completed a renovation, updating the guestroom décor and bathrooms of each of the 581 guestrooms; added a brand new state-of-the-art fitness center, featuring TechnoGym equipment and Peloton bikes, and salon and spa by the renowned Joseph Anthony Salon & Spa. With over 47,000 of meeting and event space, Loews Philadelphia is the ideal choice for weddings, meetings or events. Take advantage of POD Market, an organic grab and go concept or enjoy an inherently American dining experience at Bank & Bourbon restaurant located off the hotel lobby featuring local seasonal fare and robust bourbon and cocktail program. Right outside our doors explore all the city’s most popular attractions including Reading Terminal Market, City Hall, LOVE Park, Dilworth Plaza and Benjamin Franklin Parkway, the home of the famous Rocky steps and the iconic Philadelphia Art Museum.

address_obj.address_string: 1200 Market Street Reading Terminal Market, Philadelphia, PA 19107-3615

name: Philadelphia Marriott Downtown
description: Experience the best of Center City at your doorstep while surrounded by deluxe, modern amenities at Philadelphia Marriott Downtown. Our stylish Philadelphia, PA, hotel places you only steps away from Reading Terminal Market, Independence Hall, and Fashion District Philadelphia for limitless downtown excitement and discovery. Get the great start your day deserves with a morning coffee and grab-and-go breakfast at our Center City Pantry and on-site Starbucks®, stay active with our 24-hour fitness center and indoor pool, and host unmatched meetings and events with our 72 event spaces for all group sizes and needs. As you settle into the deluxe bedding of one of our well-designed rooms and suites, rest assured that Philadelphia Marriott Downtown has everything you need for a trip to Philadelphia.

address_obj.address_string: 1201 Market Street Guest entrance at 1200 Filbert Street, Philadelphia, PA 19107-2817

name: Philadelphia Airport Marriott
description: Combine convenience and modern amenities in our well-located hotel, the Philadelphia Airport Marriott. Connected via skywalk to Philadelphia International Airport (PHL)Terminal B, our hotel offers guests an ideal retreat after a long day of traveling. Visitors will love our convenient airport location near downtown Philadelphia's most celebrated top attractions, including Penn's Landing, the National Constitution Center, Wells Fargo Center, and Eagle's Stadium in Lincoln Financial Field. If visiting for business or social gatherings, host events in our hotel's sophisticated venues with advanced audiovisual technology and enough space for up to 1,050 guests. After a full day of business, shopping or sightseeing, work out your tired muscles in our hotel gym or refuel with classic American dishes at Aviation Grill. In the evening, unpack in spacious hotel guest rooms with soundproof windows, premium bedding, and high-speed Wi-Fi. We look forward to welcoming you to Philadelphia Airport Marriott next to PHL.

address_obj.address_string: 1 Arrivals Rd Terminal B, Philadelphia, PA 19153

name: Hampton Inn Philadelphia Center City-Convention Center
description:
Welcome to the newly-renovated Hampton Inn Philadelphia Center City-Convention Center hotel - conveniently located across the street from the Pennsylvania Convention Center. 
Our downtown location is within walking distance to the city's best restaurants, shopping and attractions. Visit Reading Terminal Market or the historic Macy's Department Store - both just a 3-block walk away.
We are known for our unbeatable value and convenience, free hot breakfast buffet and free WiFi. Our expanded fitness center is sure to please even the most seasoned gym-goers. All of our well-appointed guestrooms include a microwave and mini-refrigerator for your comfort and ease.
Enjoy dinner at our on-site restaurant, Pub 1301, open every evening from 5pm and serving casual American fare alongside a full bar service.
We look forward to welcoming you into our Hampton family and being your home-away-from-home here in Philadelphia.

name: Live Casino & Hotel Philadelphia
description: Live! Casino & Hotel Philadelphia marks the beginning of a new era in South Philadelphia, transforming the Stadium District into a nationally unrivaled one-stop destination situated amidst the fast-paced action of four major professional sports teams, memorable entertainment, premier dining, well-appointed hotel accommodations and world-class gaming. Conveniently located off I-95 and I-76, the $700 million facility features more than 200 luxury hotel rooms, a FanDuel® Sportsbook, more than 2,100 slots and electronic table games, 150 live action table games, including a dedicated poker room, plus new dining and entertainment options.

name: W Philadelphia
description: Rest easy at W Philadelphia. Our hotel in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania is located near dynamic art galleries and an eclectic music scene that defines historic Philadelphia. After a busy day, unwind with a dip in our sparkling lap pool, or enjoy on-site dining at our restaurants Dolce and the Living Room.
amenities: Free Wifi in the Business Center

name: Marriott Philadelphia West
description: At Marriott Philadelphia West, start your day at our fully equipped fitness center or heated indoor pool with a hot tub. Inside our hotel, Legends Bar & Grill serves fresh American cuisine in a casual setting, surrounded by dark wooden tones and soft lighting. We're also available to cater your wedding, business meeting, or Bar Mitzvah in over 12,000 square feet of flexible, contemporary event space. Travel brilliantly here at Marriott Philadelphia West.

name: Hilton Philadelphia at Penn's Landing
description:
Enjoy spectacular views from your spacious and well-appointed guest room at Hilton Philadelphia at Penn's Landing. Relax and enjoy plush bedding, HDTV, complimentary WiFi. Amenities include refrigerator, iHome clock radio and work desk with ergonomic chair. Our hotel proudly features Peter Thomas Roth bath amenities in all guest rooms. Want to pamper even more? Enquire about our hotel's suite availability, some with an outdoor balcony for the ultimate hotel stay.

Experience waterfront dining at its best at Keating's Rope & Anchor Bar and Kitchen on the lobby floor of Hilton Philadelphia at Penn's Landing. Known for its delicious and innovative cuisine, the restaurant is open daily for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Room service is also offered for your convenience. 

Unwind in The Lounge at Rope & Anchor and watch the activities on the waterfront and the seasonal Spruce Street Harbor Park promenade.

address_obj.address_string: 201 S. Christopher Columbus Blvd., Philadelphia, PA 19106-3101

name: Sheraton Philadelphia University City Hotel
description: With a convenient location and modern event venues, Sheraton Philadelphia University City Hotel is an ideal destination. Stay between the scenic campuses of University of Pennsylvania and Drexel University, top universities in the nation. Childrens Hospital of Philadelphia and the 30th Street Station are also nearby, allowing you to easily access the historic sites of the city. Well designed hotel rooms and suites offer everything you need for a successful visit. Enjoy vibrant views and all of your favorite cable shows from plush beds during downtime. Those seeking to stay active will appreciate our 24 hour fitness center. Guests can savor delectable Asian cuisine at Sang Kee Noodle House, located right onsite. Groups are invited to gather in one of our elegantly designed event venues, including the Benjamin Franklin Ballroom and William Penn Suite. Whether it is work or play that brings you to town, make Sheraton Philadelphia University City Hotel your home base.

name: Hyatt Regency Phoenix
description: Our downtown Phoenix hotel is located in the center of the city offering spacious guestrooms bringing you comfort and convenience. Our new restaurant, Barrel and Bushel is bar-forward restaurant with expansive patio serving American comfort-style menu, 11 Arizona brewed beers on tap and whiskey and bourbon collection to sip on. Stay and explore our southwest destination-our hotel is only steps away from Phoenix Convention Center, sports and entertainment venues, theater, museums, ASU downtown campus, and over 100 restaurants giving you easy access to the best Phoenix has to offer.
amenities: Photo Copier / Fax In Business Center

name: Arizona Grand Resort & Spa
description: Nestled at the base of America's largest urban park and wilderness preserve, Arizona's only AAA Four Diamond all-suite resort features spacious one and two-bedroom suites. Whether meeting with colleagues or vacationing with friends, gracious service, creative culinary delights, and unique recreational activities await. All in the midst of a desert oasis.

address_obj.address_string: 8000 S Arizona Grand Parkway, Phoenix, AZ 85044-5409

name: Arizona Biltmore, A Waldorf Astoria Resort
description:
Daily Mandatory Charge includes: Resort Charge with guest internet; fitness center access and classes; Biltmore Golf replay; 1-hour bicycle usage; 2 bottled waters daily; lawn games; access to The Twist water slides; PressReader. Mandatory Charge also includes Historical Preservation Fund charge.

Known as an Arizona landmark with a century-old legacy and a celebration of Frank Lloyd Wright-influenced architecture and design, the Arizona Biltmore Waldorf Astoria Resort provides a glamorous oasis built among 39 acres adorned with lush gardens and glistening swimming pools. 

More than 700 guest rooms, seven sparkling pools, seven dining outlets, a 65-foot waterslide, two championship golf courses, 200,000 square feet of meeting and event space and a Spa facility await. We offer luxury not typically found in resorts of this size - while still honoring the history of this iconic and magical destination.

name: Hyatt Place Phoenix / Downtown
description: Discover downtown Phoenix through a different lens at Hyatt Place Phoenix/Downtown: Timeless, Refined, & Energetic. Designs featuring modern desert chic all custom lobby, & full-service restaurant. Prime location within walking distance to an array of local attractions. Hyatt Place Phoenix/Downtown brings art deco design, a casual atmosphere, & practical amenities. Urban guestrooms offer separate spaces to sleep, work & play, as well as a Cozy Corner sofa-sleeper. Located in the heart of downtown, 3 blocks from the Convention Center & an array of attractions: Orpheum Theatre, AZ Financial Theatre, Chase Field, Talking Stick Resort Arena, Phoenix Art Museum, shopping, and restaurants. Immerse your taste buds with curated meals from Adams Table Patio & Bar during lunch or dinner, and indulge in local beer, premium spirits, fine wines, and made-from scratch food!
amenities: Free Wifi in the Business Center

name: Hilton Phoenix Airport
description:
The Hilton Phoenix Airport hotel is conveniently located 1.5 miles from Phoenix Sky Harbor Airport. Minutes from the hotel, you will find entertainment venues and city attractions, including the Civic Plaza and Convention Center, Chase Field, USAir Arena, Tempe Town Lake, Arizona State University, and eclectic dining and shopping on Mill Ave. Spacious guestrooms at the Hilton Phoenix Airport are decorated to reflect the impressions of the desert with deep, dark southwestern color schemes and amenities, many featuring balconies that overlook the sparkling pool area.

The guestrooms offer many in-room amenities that include high-speed internet access (an additional charge may apply), dual line access telephones with voicemail, work area, lap-top sized safe and in-room movie rentals. For the more discriminating travelers, the Executive Level upgrades are available and include complimentary continental breakfast and a complimentary evening reception in the private Executive Lounge.

name: Drury Inn & Suites Phoenix Airport
description: Travel Happy® with Drury Hotels. You have enough to worry about while you're traveling. Let us take a few things off your plate, so you can focus on the good stuff. Breakfast, Wi-Fi, dinnertime snacks, soft drinks, popcorn, business center, workout facilities and more - we've got you covered! A microwave and refrigerator can be found in all rooms. Drury Hotels is 100 percent family-owned and operated. At every one of our 150+ locations, you'll consistently experience rooms with crisp sheets, fine linens and cozy surroundings to ensure a good night's sleep.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Phoenix Scottsdale
description:
Rediscover the recently renovated suites at Embassy Suites by Hilton Phoenix - Scottsdale. Located 15 miles from Phoenix Sky Harbor International Airport, the Embassy Suites by Hilton Phoenix Scottsdale features 270 two-bedroom suites with a separate living room area with sleeper sofa, 55- and 49-inch HDTVs, private walk-out balcony or patio, in-room safes, and wet bar with microwave, coffeemaker and a mini-fridge. 

Whether you're traveling for business, recreation, or fun with the family, our all-suite property has everything you need. Take in the gorgeous views of Stonecreek Golf Club or Camelback Mountain. Greet the morning with our complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast. Sip drinks poolside, break a sweat in our 24HR fitness center, or savor locally inspired cuisine at Tatum's lounge or restaurant. 

Wind down for the day or gear up for the night with our complimentary evening reception.

address_obj.address_string: 4415 E. Paradise Village Pkwy South, Phoenix, AZ 85032

name: Sheraton Phoenix Downtown
description: Rest easy at Sheraton Grand Phoenix. Our hotel is a conveniently located hotel in downtown Phoenix, Arizona adjacent to the Phoenix Convention Center and just five miles from the Sky Harbor International Airport. The largest hotel in Arizona's capital city, we provide guests with thoughtful amenities, modern lodging and 110,000 square feet of versatile event space, as well as on-site planning and catering. After a busy day in Phoenix, return to your hotel room or suite and enjoy a good night's sleep on luxurious Sheraton bedding.

name: Hilton Phoenix Tapatio Cliffs Resort
description: Surrounded by mountain views, our resort is a 20-minute drive north of downtown Phoenix. We offer seven pools, a 138-foot water slide, private cabanas, waterfalls, a championship golf course, and a full-service spa. A variety of dining options, nearby hiking trails, and seasonal family-friendly amenities are available

name: Found:Re Phoenix
description: FOUND:RE Phoenix is a place where the community gathers to experience great local design, art, and food. As downtown Phoenix's newest lifestyle hotel, our 104 industrial-chic guestrooms feature custom locally-designed fixtures and furnishings, eclectic local art, and thoughtful amenities. Browse the work of local artists in our Gallery and Studio, or host an unforgettable meeting surrounded by inspiring, thought-provoking art in our 6,000+ square feet of flexible, indoor/outdoor event spaces. If you're looking for a memorable meal with friends or family, try our restaurant, MATCH Restaurant & Lounge. MATCH Restaurant & Lounge is a neighborhood eatery, serving modern comfort food with unique cocktails and craft beers.

name: Renaissance Dallas Hotel
description: Enliven your stay in Dallas, TX, at the luxury Renaissance Dallas Hotel. Located near Dallas Market Center, the Dallas Design District and Market Hall, our hotel places guests in the heart of the city. Explore our city's vibrant districts, where world-class shopping, luxury dining and entertainment await. Start your morning downtown with a swim in our rooftop pool or work out using the modern equipment in our 24-hour fitness center. Join us for our daily breakfast or all-day dining with farm-to-table American cuisine at Asador, our signature restaurant. Whether you're visiting for business or pleasure, treat yourself to a luxury hotel experience at Renaissance Dallas Hotel.
amenities: Photo Copier / Fax In Business Center

name: Hyatt Regency Dallas
description: Hyatt Regency Dallas is located downtown, conveniently connected to landmark Reunion Tower and historic Union Station. The hotel has 1,120 guest rooms, 42 suites and Hyatt StayFit Gym. Conveniently located near the Convention Center, the historic West End District and Dealey Plaza, the American Airlines Center and shopping centers. The hotel also has the longest running AAA four-diamond distinction among convention hotels in downtown Dallas.
amenities: Photo Copier / Fax In Business Center

name: The Westin Galleria Dallas
description: The Westin Galleria Dallas is the gateway to all points north, south, east and west in the Metroplex. Just a short drive from Dallas-Fort Worth International Airport and within walking distance of the Galleria Mall, you'll enjoy access to the best shopping, dining, and entertainment during your stay at our hotel in the heart of prestigious north Dallas, Texas. Stay on track in our 24-hour fitness center, featuring the latest cardio machines and free weights or take a dip in our outdoor pool.

name: Fairmont Dallas
description: In Texas we do things in a big way, and The Fairmont Dallas is no exception amongst hotels in Dallas, TX. In this modern city of soaring skyscrapers, The Fairmont Dallas luxury hotel sets the standard for style and elegance. With our ideal location in the heart of the Downtown Dallas Arts District, we are situated just moments from incredible fine dining, shopping, arts and world-class entertainment. Newly redesigned luxurious guest rooms and suites offer warm hospitality, modern décor and that special Texas flair for an unrivaled travel experience. Fairmont Gold, an exclusive boutique lifestyle experience, is designed to fulfill the needs of the discerning business executive and leisure traveler, with elite lounge access and all of the comforts of home. Enjoy The Pyramid Restaurant & Bar’s four-star cuisine and a Starbucks conveniently located on the lobby level.

name: Omni Dallas Hotel
description: Experience the best of downtown Dallas, TX when you stay at Omni Dallas Hotel. Connected to the Dallas Convention Center via sky bridge, the hotel is a sleek retreat with a full-service spa, heated outdoor infinity pool, rooftop terrace, 7 restaurants and a coffee shop. Relax in chic hotel rooms and suites featuring floor-to-ceiling windows with sparkling city views and sensory floor lighting. Fireplaces and living rooms are also available. The hotel is near historic Dealey Plaza, the Dallas Museum of Art, and less than a mile from Reunion Tower, West End Historic District and Dallas World Aquarium. From dining to culture to sporting events, Dallas has it all and Omni Dallas Hotel puts you right in the center of the action. Whether you are looking for a family retreat, couples getaway, staycation or a solo stay in the city, our hotel specials offer something for everyone.
amenities: Free Wifi in the Business Center

name: Virgin Hotels Dallas
description: Our 268 Chambers are designed with two functional spaces separated by a sliding door: the Sleeping Lounge with a brand patented lounge bed and the Dressing Room with a contemporary vanity, two closets, and a shoe rack. Chambers feature street-priced snacks and drinks in the mini-fridge, yoga mats, plugs in all of the right places, and more surprising extras. Enjoy incredible, one-of-a-kind, experiences in Commons Club, Funny Library, and the fourth floor rooftop venue, The Pool Club, with amazing Dallas skyline views, an Adult Playground, and a Secret Garden. No hidden fees and Wi-Fi is always free. Join The Know for personalized services, best rates, and more. Always feel free to be with staying with us.

name: Sheraton Dallas Hotel
description: Discover a perfectly situated and exceptional hotel experience at Sheraton Dallas Hotel. With close access to American Airlines Center, Fair Park, and the Deep Ellum neighborhood, our downtown Dallas, TX hotel offers a refreshed and comfortable place to start any Texas vacation or business trip. Our well-appointed rooms and suites offer everything you need to make the most of your trip including spacious in-room desks and high-speed Wi-Fi, while our on-site restaurants and bars help you relax and refuel for the day.

name: Lorenzo Hotel Dallas, Tapestry Collection by Hilton

Every tranquil moment you spend at Lake Austin Spa Resort is a chance to enhance your wellness and get back to what matters most—you. Escape the demands of your daily grind and embrace restful relaxation in a way that only a private lakefront setting can offer.

Maintain your workout routine in our state-of-the-art fitness center with cardiovascular equipment, free weights, and large indoor pool.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Detroit - Dearborn
description:
The Doubletree Hotel Detroit/Dearborn near the suburban west Detroit town of Dearborn, Michigan, is only nine miles from downtown Detroit and minutes from Detroit Metro Airport (DTW). Our full-service hotel is conveniently located off the Southfield Expressway at Ford Road, with easy access to I-94, I-96 and all major Detroit-area thoroughfares.

Hotel Features Include The unique Great Room, a great place to meet, relax, watch TV, and stay connected over cocktails or a cup of Starbucks coffee, Classic presentation in a casual atmosphere and nouvelle cuisine at the grille39 restaurant, serving breakfast, lunch and dinner daily, Our well-equipped fitness center, indoor pool, and whirlpool, where guests can keep a good health regimen, Over 12,000 square feet of versatile, state-of-the-art meeting space including an elegant ballroom that can accommodate as many as 800 people, Convenient 24-hour business center.

name: ARRIVE Memphis
description: ARRIVE Memphis is a 62-room boutique neighborhood hotel with thoughtfully designed, industrial-inspired guest rooms. Each room is outfitted with plush robes, Bellino Fine Linens, Grown Alchemist bath amenities, artwork by Memphis-born artist Michelle Fair, Apple TVs with live TV streaming apps, a Marshall Bluetooth speaker and a curated minibar of snacks and refreshments.

awards.award_type: Travelers Choice Best of the Best
awards.display_name: Travelers Choice Best of the Best

name: The Peabody Memphis
description: In the heart of "Blues City," you'll find The Peabody Memphis, a magnificent Forbes Four-Star, AAA Four-Diamond historic hotel.

name: The Guest House at Graceland
description: Located on beautifully landscaped property, just a few steps from the gates of Graceland, this unique accommodation is inspired by the warm hospitality that Elvis always showed his guests. From the southern colonial exterior to the specialty suites (many with design overseen by Priscilla Presley herself), every aspect of the Guest House will reflect Elvis' personal style and the unique character of Graceland. The Guest House at Graceland is more than a full-service hotel. Its 450 spacious rooms and a range of contemporary facilities, including two restaurants, spaces for meetings and special events and a 464-seat theater for live performances and movies. It's the gateway to your visit to Graceland and the perfect place to stay while discovering everything that Memphis has to offer. It's classic elegance and modern luxury - friendly, refined and uniquely Elvis. The Guest House at Graceland amenities include: 450 luxuriously appointed rooms - one of the largest hotels in Memphis; Unique themed VIP suites with design supervised by Priscilla Presley; Concierge service; Free airport shuttle; Room service; Full-service restaurant with indoor and outdoor seating; Themed sports restaurant/bar; Large outside pool and pool bar; Outdoor event/activity area 464-seat theater for live performances and movies; Expansive space for special events, weddings and family reunions; Conference space and meeting facilities for corporate events

name: Holiday Inn Memphis-Univ of Memphis, an IHG Hotel
description: All Suite Hotel Near University of Memphis-Home of the Memphis Tigers, centrally located about 15 minutes from the Memphis International Airport. Our Holiday Inn Memphis-Univ of Memphis hotel is directly across the street from the University of Memphis campus, where it is easy to take a stroll through the picturesque grounds. We are within walking distance of The Links at Galloway Golf Course and Audubon Park Our hotel is just a short drive to Downtown Memphis home of NBA's Grizzlies, Redbirds Baseball and famous Beale Street. All the fun and shopping at Overton Square in Midtown Memphis is only 10 minutes away. If you're in town for business, we're near companies like Kellogg's, FedEx, Deloitte, International Paper, Buckman and AutoZone. Our hotel's 24-hour business center offers a computer, printer and copier, and our meeting space is perfect for events large and small.
amenities: Free Wifi in the Business Center

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Memphis Downtown
Hilton Memphis
description: Towering over Memphis, Hilton Memphis boasts the distinction of being the city's tallest hotel. This luxurious high-rise offers over 30,000 square feet of flexible meeting space, perfect for any business function. Situated in the heart of Memphis' prominent East Memphis business district, our location at I-240 and Poplar provides convenient access to a variety of shopping and dining options. The Memphis International Airport is just a 15-minute drive away, while the vibrant Downtown Riverfront District is approximately 20 minutes via interstate. Unwind after a productive day in our inviting outdoor pool and whirlpool, or savor delicious meals at our on-site restaurant. Hilton Memphis offers a sophisticated and convenient haven for your Memphis visit.

name: The Westin Memphis Beale Street
description: Rest easy at The Westin Memphis Beale Street. Our hotel in Memphis, Tennessee, is located near Beale Street, the FedEx Forum, and The Memphis Rock 'n' Soul Museum. After a busy day, unwind with our on-site fitness center, or enjoy on-site dining at Penny's Nitty Gritty.

amenities: Free Wifi in the Business Center

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Memphis at Beale Street
description:
Welcome to the Newly Renovated Hampton Inn & Suites - Beale Street, located in the heart of the Memphis Entertainment District. We are just a half block off Beale Street, 2 blocks from the FedExForum, and within walking distance of the business district. Most downtown attractions are a short walk or trolley ride away. Whether visiting for business or pleasure, the Hampton Inn & Suites - Beale Street has it all.

Renovated in Spring 2019 to fit in with the modern downtown blues atmosphere, the hotel features an indoor pool, an expanded fitness center, and a sweets shop. Free hot breakfast is included with every overnight stay. Complimentary WiFi, in-room safes, iron and ironing board are also included, as well as local and 800 calls.

name: La Quinta Inn & Suites by Wyndham Memphis Downtown
description: Welcome to the brand new La Quinta Inn & Suites Memphis Downtown hotel located in historic Downtown Memphis just steps from Beale Street, The National Civil Rights Museum, FedEx Forum and Auto Zone Red Birds Stadium. This hotel is perfect for the business or leisure traveler only 15 minutes from Memphis International Airport with access to Interstate 40. We are also close to the Medical District, Cook Convention Center and the University of Memphis. Another one of our local attractions include one of the country's finest zoos, The Memphis City Zoo. Plus, visit one of the top tourist attractions in the country, Graceland. The home of Elvis Presley is a short 12 minute drive from the hotel. St Jude Children’s Research Hospital is located a few blocks north of the hotel Downtown’s newest sleek modern hotel offers beautifully appointed rooms with sweeping city views and chic comfort at an affordable price. Refresh in our Indoor heated swimming pool and state of the art fitness center.

name: The Paramount Hotel
description: Fall in love with the simple luxury of the Paramount Hotel Seattle. You will immediately see why we are consistently ranked in the top 10 of hotels to visit in downtown Seattle after you experience our ideal downtown location, service-oriented team and charming guest rooms.
amenities: Free Wifi in the Business Center
Free Wired Internet in the Business Center

name: Hyatt Regency Lake Washington at Seattle's Southport
description: Located on the shores of Lake Washington, Hyatt Regency Lake Washington at Seattle’s Southport perfectly combines the natural beauty of the Pacific Northwest with modern amenities. Enjoy access to downtown Seattle, Mount Rainier National Park, Gene Coulon Memorial Beach Park, and more. Spend your time shopping, dining, or hiking, then return to your comfortable room in Renton. Lakefront accommodations: 347 spacious guestrooms and suites with unparalleled views • Delicious all-day dining: Our waterfront restaurant offers cuisine inspired by the Pacific Northwest, or enjoy 24-hour dining options from The Market • Location, location, location: Explore Cougar Mountain Regional Wildland Park, kayak on Lake Washington, shop at The Landing, and much more • Ample on-site amenities: Enjoy the complimentary Wi-Fi, indoor pool, on-site spa, and 24-hour StayFit™ Gym • Indoor-outdoor event space: 60,000 sq ft of flexible meeting and event space, including 25,000 sq ft of outdoor event space

name: Arctic Club Hotel
description: Enjoy a stay at the award-winning Arctic Club Hotel conveniently situated in downtown Seattle located within walking distance of local attractions like Pioneer Square, Lumen Field, T Mobile Park, and Pike Place Market. Travel on the Link light rail system from nearby Pioneer Square station to many areas in and around Seattle. This chic, vintage decorated Seattle hotel offers a unique experience echoing the post-Klondike gold rush days of the early 1900s. It also offers modern facilities to business and leisure travelers alike, including wireless high-speed internet access and 5,700 sq. ft. of meeting and event space. Wine and dine in style and at your convenience at the Polar Bar, a famous, local hotspot in the Arctic Club Hotel.
amenities: Free Wifi in the Business Center

name: Warwick Seattle
description: In a city known for setting trends, Warwick Seattle is leading the way. Located in the upbeat Belltown district, the hotel is in the thick of it all - a short walk from the Space Needle, Amazon Worldwide headquarters and Amazon Spheres, Pike Place Market, Chihuly Garden and Glass and Seattle waterfront, it is a sanctuary within the action-packed downtown core. Amongst the heart of the retail district, the Warwick Seattle hotel blends the classic charm that's expected from the Warwick name with the contemporary styling of the Emerald City throughout.
amenities: Free Wired Internet in the Business Center

name: Hyatt Regency Seattle
description: Situated in the heart of the city and within walking distance to top attractions, Hyatt Regency Seattle is designed to make connections. As the largest hotel in the Pacific Northwest and first LEED Gold-certified hotel in the city, the hotel features 1,260 guest rooms and suites, 103,000 square feet of function space and numerous gathering areas and workspaces. Commitment to safety and wellness is our top priority. In accordance with Washington State guidelines, Andare Kitchen & Bar is open at 25% indoor capacity with delivery, take-out and curbside pick-up available. Our Fitness Center is available for use by reservation only. For details on all hotel-specific protocols in place, please visit our website. Current Offers: - Looking for a family-friendly staycation? Take advantage of our Hyatt Night In package that includes early check-in, late checkout, savings on parking and food and beverage options and more. - Need an alternative work location? Book Hyatt Regency Seattle as your Office for the Day and enjoy private use of a guest room from 7 a.m. to 7 p.m., including items such as premium Wi-Fi, discounts on dining and parking, access to hotel gym, etc. Hyatt Regency Seattle is designed to celebrate the very best the city has to offer and provide guests with a distinct Seattle experience. We look forward to welcoming you soon!
amenities: Photo Copier / Fax In Business Center

name: Lotte Hotel Seattle
description: Some of the most scenic views in Seattle from the 16th floor! Rising from 5th Avenue and Marion Street in supreme style, Lotte Hotel Seattle presents the pinnacle of luxury escapism in a class all its own-through infinitely spacious suites, contemporary dining experiences, and distinctly high-touch service that's simply unforgettable. Two buildings-one the embodiment of the city's storied history, the other a sparkling modern tower-converging into one to create a reimagining of Seattle luxury.
amenities: Free Wifi in the Business Center
Free Wired Internet in the Business Center
Photo Copier / Fax In Business Center

name: Graduate Seattle
description: Our historic 1930s Art Deco digs, just a ten-minute stroll to UW’s campus, sits proudly in Seattle’s University District. Purple pride runs deep in the lush lobby, inviting Huskies past and present. Over 36 feet of plaidly clad sofas ease up to a communal coffee table warmly perched fireside. An installation of seashell mobiles dances above, an amped up wall invites conversation and jewel toned rooms wink at our storied past. High above, our scenic rooftop bar serves up hues and mountain views of the inspired landscape.

name: The Westin Seattle
description: One of downtown Seattle's most dynamic destinations, The Westin Seattle offers guests spacious hotel rooms and suites with anticipatory service, signature Heavenly® amenities, and stunning views of the Seattle skyline. Nearby, Seattle icons such as Pike Place Market, the Space Needle, the Washington State Convention Center, and Lumen Field beckon, offering ample opportunities for adventure and exploration. After a busy day exploring Seattle, enjoy curated local wines and innovative small plates at 1900 FIFTH, or savor elevated casual dining at Relish Burger Bistro. For relaxation, the hotel features a heated indoor pool and wellness-enhancing WestinWORKOUT Fitness Studio with state-of-the-art gym equipment, including Peloton® bikes. For those seeking modern event space in downtown Seattle, please use our nearly 70,000 square feet of versatile venues and our delicious catering and expert planning services—CDiscoverthe Emerald City on your terms at The Westin Seattle.

name: Astra Hotel, Seattle, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel by Marriott
description: Welcome to Astra Hotel, the new lifestyle hotel in South Lake Union, featuring sleek and modern guest rooms, distinctive dining in Otium Grill & Greens, signature ALTITUDE Sky Lounge, and Seattle's own Ladro Coffee available in the hotel lobby. Steps from the world-famous Space Needle and Lake Union Park, Seattle Center, the Amazon Campus, and amidst Seattle’s many vibrant culinary experiences. Astra Hotel Seattle offers 265 tech-forward guest rooms and unique artwork for your enjoyment.

name: Thompson Seattle
description: Located near the Puget Sound waterfront, our luxury boutique hotel reflects the intrinsic beauty of Seattle and elevates the refined edge of downtown. Condé Nast Traveler thinks so, too—naming us to its 2020 Readers' Choice Awards as number one hotel in the Pacific Northwest. Come and experience the celebrated interplay of creativity and community within our sleek glass façade. Vitality and innovation find their home here, where innovators, entrepreneurs, and philanthropists seek refuge from the ordinary. Conceived by the city’s own award-winning Olson Kundig Architects, Thompson Seattle is a contemporary urban landmark at the center of an unparalleled landscape. Expansive, gasp-inducing views of the Sound, coupled with the energy of Pike Place Market and the culture of downtown, ensure that Thompson Seattle embodies the best of this modern city. It’s a place where travelers become residents and residents are transported, with revelry fueled culinary experiences that pay homage to the bounty of the Pacific Northwest. Add intriguing layers to the choreography of your stay - whether dining in our captivating restaurant, Conversation, or sipping up high at The Nest, our iconic rooftop bar and lounge. A vibrant culture awaits. Discover the unexpected Seattle with us.

name: Hyatt Regency Denver At Colorado Convention Center
description: Hyatt Regency Denver at Colorado Convention Center, featuring 1,100 modern accommodations, is one of the region’s largest hotels. Standing 36 stories high, sleek and contemporary in design, it is adjacent to the Colorado Convention Center and just one block from the 16th Street Mall pedestrian promenade. The guest rooms were designed with a décor that captures the essence of being where the mountains meet the plains. With special emphasis on state-of-the-art technology, each accommodation features the convenience of LCD Smart 46 inch televisions and free high-speed Internet along with comfortable work stations. A 6,700 square foot fitness center, with windows overlooking the 14th Street Theater District, includes an indoor lap-pool and outdoor sun deck and whirlpool. In addition to Former Saint Craft Kitchen and Taps , Hyatt Regency Denver provides the 27th floor Peaks Lounge which captures sweeping views of the Rocky Mountains.

address_obj.street2: Adjacent to Colorado Convention Center and one block from 16th Street Mall
address_obj.address_string: 650 15th Street Adjacent to Colorado Convention Center and one block from 16th Street Mall, Denver, CO 80202-4207

name: Warwick Denver
description: Boasting an ideal location that connects Denver's vibrant downtown area with all the charm and attractions of the local Uptown Neighborhood, Warwick Denver offers a true urban refuge in the Mile High City. The Warwick Denver was originally built as the Governer's Court, and is still remembered by many for the Playboy Club, the first and only one in Colorado. This luxury downtown hotel features private balconies and oversized guest rooms and suites designed elegantly to reflect the outdoor spirit of the Rockies. The exclusive rooftop heated pool and bar offer captivating year round panoramic views of the Denver skyline and snowcapped Rocky Mountains.

name: Grand Hyatt Denver
description: The Four Diamond AAA award winning Grand Hyatt Denver is in the heart of the Mile High City's business district and one short block from 16th Street Mall. Complete with a host of comforts, each spacious accommodation, one of the region's largest, features the Hyatt Grand Bed, well-lit work stations and free guest room WiFi. The hotel offers outdoor jogging track and tennis court, indoor pool and complimentary 24 hour fitness facility. Linear stacked sandstone fireplaces in the lobby provides a warm welcome for arriving guests. Visit Courier . market | bar | kitchen where you'll find classic dishes reinvented and locally sourced innovative cocktails as well as a grab-and-go market. Serving breakfast, lunch and dinner daily.

name: Hyatt Place Denver/Downtown
description: Feel the energy of one of America's liveliest downtown areas in the heart of it all, just steps away from the Colorado Convention Center, Denver Theater District, ample shopping opportunities, endless entertainment venues, diverse dining options, and so much more. Soak in views of the Rocky Mountains or the sprawling Denver cityscape in one of our 248 rooms nestled in the heart of downtown, each designed as a spacious retreat featuring a Cozy Corner with sofa-sleeper.

name: Hotel Indigo Denver Downtown-Union Station, an IHG Hotel
description: Welcome to the Hotel Indigo Denver Downtown, where modern day pioneers and urban explorers are inspired to discover the perfect day in Denver! Offering the charm of a boutique hotel, our LoDo hotel features sliding barn doors and spa-style bathrooms, top-notch amenities of the Hotel Indigo brand, and in-house local experts who bestow their wisdom on what to do and where to go while visiting Denver. We are located just steps from Union Station, Coors Field, and the Museum of Contemporary Art.
amenities: Free Wifi in the Business Center

name: Hyatt Centric Downtown Denver
description: Check into one of 264 rooms filled with personality and style. Look out through floor-to-ceiling windows that showcase a vibrant Denver cityscape, then settle into a room or suite with well-appointed amenities. Relax in a standard room with a walk-in shower and work area, or opt for a high-floor space for more dramatic views. After you’ve unpacked, head out to see local landmarks like the Denver Art Museum, located less than a mile from your doorstep. At Hyatt Centric Downtown Denver, you’re walking distance to entertainment, fine dining, shopping, celebrated parks, and so much more.
amenities: Free Wifi in the Business Center

name: Hilton Garden Inn Denver Downtown
description:
The Hilton Garden Inn Denver Downtown Convention Center is one of the best centrally located hotels that Denver offers. The Hilton Garden Inn is less than 100 steps from the front doors of the Colorado Convention Center, two blocks from the 16th Street Mall, and a five-minute walk from the Denver Pavilions. 

Cheer on your favorite sports team during your visit. We're just one mile away from Coors Field, two miles from Empower Field at Mile High, and one mile from Ball Arena. Denver Center for the Performing Arts is a 10-minute walk away. Major nearby corporations include CenturyLink, Wells Fargo, Deloitte, KPMG, Gates Corporation, VF Corp, Accenture, and Encana/Ovintiv, all less than 10 minutes away.  

This hotel features 221 beautiful guest rooms, each equipped with complimentary WiFi, mini-refrigerators, microwaves, and Keurig Coffee Makers. The hotel offers a workout facility, full-service restaurant, Territory Kitchen and Bar, along with Dazbog Coffee Shop onsite.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Denver Downtown-Convention Center
description:
Stay in the heart of downtown Denver at the Hampton Inn and Suites Denver Downtown-Convention Center, conveniently located one half block from the Colorado Convention Center. Whether your travels bring you here for business or pleasure, you will feel like you have arrived when you step into the artistically chic lobby that reflects the local environment and energy.

Amuse yourself with a walk from our contemporary hotel to attractions such as the Denver Center for Performing Arts, 16th Street Mall, Denver Art Museum, and sporting venues such as Coors Field and Ball Arena. Nearby attractions such as Sports Authority Field at Mile High, Denver Aquarium, Denver Zoo, History Colorado, and Denver Museum of Nature and Science are just a short ride away.

From trinkets to treasures, it is all available in nearby shopping at Denver Pavilions, Larimer Square, Tabor Center and the 16th Street Mall.  Downtown Denver has an eclectic mix of dining options.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Denver Downtown Convention Center
description: Welcome to the Embassy Suites Denver Downtown / Convention Center - the ideal destination hotel offering the perfect setting for business or pleasure and a gateway to the city's rejuvenated downtown scene. A contemporary convention property, our LEED Silver Certified hotel in Denver is a lively destination within walking distance of the best attractions in downtown. Your stay includes cooked to order breakfast each morning and a complimentary manager’s reception from 5pm to 6:30pm each evening.

name: Renaissance Denver Downtown City Center Hotel
Encore Boston Harbor
description: Encore Boston Harbor offers the finest in Boston hotel resort accommodations, five-star dining, gaming, shopping and more. At every turn, impeccable service. On every level, enchanting ambiance. Indulge in the excitement of our stunning Boston casino. Immerse in the tranquility of our luxurious spa or our outdoor Harborwalk. Enjoy the amazing views from our elegantly appointed rooms and suites. Everything was designed to create the most memorable experience for our valued guests.

name: Omni Parker House
description: Located in the bustling downtown Boston, Massachusetts area, Omni Parker House is an opulent 19th-century landmark hotel situated along the Freedom Trail. Discover high-end New England dining at Parker's Restaurant, where the Boston Cream Pie was invented, a classic cocktail lounge and upscale bar. You'll also find a rooftop ballroom, fitness center, and 19 meeting rooms at our Boston hotel. Stay near Boston's top attractions such as the Theatre District, Fenway Park, Boston Aquarium and TD Garden. The hotel is also near Beacon Hill, Boston Common, Quincy Market and Faneuil Hall Marketplace so you can immerse yourself in the city's rich history and enjoy all that Boston has to offer. Relax in elegant hotel rooms and suites featuring old-world decor, cherry wood furnishings, and flat-screen TVs. Whether you're traveling for business or leisure, let Omni Parker House make your trip extra special with one of our packages.

name: The Godfrey Hotel Boston
description: The Godfrey Hotel is among the newest and most authentic Boston hotels. Enjoy chic & stylish accommodations, luxury amenities & more! Discover your element at the boutique Godfrey Hotel Boston located right in the heart of historic Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Boston Logan Airport
description: The Hilton Garden Inn Boston Logan Airport (BOS) is conveniently located 1 mile from Logan Airport, just minutes from downtown Boston.  Free 24 hour Airport Shuttle service to airport and Subway/Train Station and daily parking for a fee during your stay. Our tastefully-appointed hotel features modern conveniences suited to the savvy business traveler, along with a great location and amenities to please leisure guests.  Spacious new guestrooms boast a long list of guest amenities including Keurig Coffee Makers, generous work surfaces and all rooms are complete with microwaves and refrigerators and Complimentary high-speed internet access.   For your convenience, wireless HSIA is available in public areas throughout the hotel.  Our guests have full use of our amenities including: indoor heated pool, well-equipped Fitness Center and Hotel features the Garden Grille & Bar on-site as well as many restaurants and retails shops nearby.

name: Hyatt Place Boston / Braintree
description: The Hyatt Place Boston/Braintree is an upscale, modern hotel in the heart of the South Shore. Located only 20 minutes from downtown Boston, the hotel features 204 king and double bedded guestrooms, 5 meeting/banquet rooms and a spacious, aesthetically pleasing gallery lobby. The gallery lobby is made up of the cafe offering Starbucks specialty coffee drinks, limited bar menu and 24 hr. food availability; the e-room offering 2 computers with print, copy and fax services including remote printing from your guest room; the great room offering plenty of flexible, comfortable seating to relax. Ideally located in North Braintree at the intersection of Route 93 to Boston and Route 3 to the south shore and Cape Cod, the hotel is only 1 to 3 miles away from large office parks. The hotel is also in walking distance to the South Shore Plaza shopping mall (offering over 300 shops and restaurants) and conveniently located close to the Quincy T (Red line) and Boston Logan Express.

name: W Boston
description: Immersed in the downtown district's music, fashion, and art galleries, W Boston is a stylish, modern hotel with boutique hotel rooms. The hotel is located near the Theatre District, our Boston, MA, near Fenway Park, New England Aquarium, and Chinatown. Signature amenities include a state-of-the-art fitness center, a lounge, and a full-service restaurant.

name: Revere Hotel Boston Common
description: Shaped by local culture and the rebellious, independent spirit of Boston, Revere Hotel Boston Common is a downtown refuge for the adventurous and curious. Immerse yourself in authentic local experiences at our original Back Bay hotel, located steps from Boston's Theater District, Newbury Street and Copley Square.

name: The Langham, Boston
description: The Langham, Boston re-imagines service and tradition as a new American classic hotel following a multimillion dollar renovation. Once the Federal Reserve Bank of Boston, this iconic landmark is a combination of American warmth and comfort. With 312 guestrooms and suites, two new dining destinations, The Langham Club and transformed meeting space, The Langham is a glamorous place to celebrate, just steps away from Boston's best sites and attractions.

name: Hilton Boston Logan Airport
description: The Hilton Boston Logan Airport hotel is the only AAA Four Diamond hotel directly connected to terminals A & E via climate-controlled walkways with 24-hour shuttle bus, and yet just minutes to historic downtown Boston. Featuring spacious, soundproof windows with views of the city and Boston Harbor, it’s the perfect spot for a meeting or to start your next adventure!

name: Hilton Boston Park Plaza
description: Daily Mandatory Charge includes - Premium guest internet access - daily food and beverage credit which excludes room service - daily dry-cleaning credit - Lynx Fitness Club access - Press Reader access. Enjoy complimentary Wi-Fi and mini-fridges available in each room. Book a yoga class at Lynx Fitness Club on-site. Our Boston hotel features a variety of restaurants and bars to choose from (local laws apply). We are located in downtown Boston, surrounded by shopping, dining and entertainment. The Public Garden and Boston Common are steps away, while Beacon Hill and the Theater District are within a half-mile. As one of the most historic hotels in Boston, we are conscious about our community wellbeing and committed to uplifting the people and places that make our city thrive.

address_obj.address_string: 50 Park Plaza at Arlington Street, Boston, MA 02116

name: Sagamore Pendry Baltimore
description: A symbol of Baltimore's historic past, reimagined for its future. Sagamore Pendry Baltimore is the reinvention of one of the region's most storied properties, perched on Recreation Pier in the center of the vibrant waterfront Fell's Point neighborhood. The hotel was carefully renovated by Patrick Sutton Design with a creative vision rooted in its historic signature Charm City allure.

name: Four Seasons Hotel Baltimore
description: Our modern, urban retreat, positioned at the edge of Baltimore's Harbor East, offers a host of luxurious amenities such as a five-star Spa to a rooftop pool, setting the scene for fabulous vacations with kids, romantic getaways and business stays. Miles of walkable waterfront, top restaurants and city landmarks are all within easy reach.

name: Hilton Baltimore Inner Harbor
description:
Daily Mandatory Charge will includes: 2pct Baltimore Tourism Assessment

The Hilton Baltimore hotel lies in the exciting Inner Harbor district downtown, a prime business, historic and cultural district in downtown Baltimore, Maryland. The hotel is directly connected to the Baltimore Convention Center, adjacent to Camden Yards, and across from M & T Stadium, home of the Baltimore Ravens. The Hilton Baltimore hotel is a newly opened property, designed to impress and accommodate every need of today's traveler.

HOTEL LOCATION: Walking distance to many of the Baltimore's leading tourist attractions and destinations including: Baltimore's Inner Harbor, Harborplace and The Gallery, Oriole's Baseball at Camden Yards, National Aquarium in Baltimore, Nearby shopping, fine dining, theater

Adjacent to the Baltimore Convention Center with direct covered access via pedestrian sky bridge

Close to other notable attractions including: M & T Stadium, home of the Baltimore Ravens, Fort McHenry, Nation

name: Hyatt Regency Baltimore Inner Harbor
description: Nestled in the heart of downtown, this AAA Four-Diamond Inner Harbor hotel offers a luxury gateway to this enchanting waterfront town. Catch an Orioles’ game at Camden Yards, crack crabs in the Inner Harbor, or explore the wonders of the sea at the National Aquarium. Take advantage of modern meeting venues within our hotel in Baltimore Inner Harbor - just steps from the Convention Center.

name: Baltimore Marriott Waterfront
description: Tucked in Harbor East near the famed Inner Harbor in Baltimore, Maryland, Baltimore Marriott Waterfront offers guests an unsurpassed location to explore the vibrant city of Baltimore. Our top-rated waterfront hotel in Baltimore is superbly situated in the Harbor East district, home to the city's best dining and nightlife opportunities. Upon arrival, guests will be delighted to discover spacious, well-appointed rooms with perks, including luxury bedding, high-definition TVs, and stunning water views. Additional hotel amenities include a 24-hour fitness center. Boasting a staggering 50,000 square feet of event space and situated near the city's Convention Center, our hotel is ideal for business travelers to Baltimore. Families, too, will appreciate our superior location near local attractions like Camden Yards. Head towards the water and see why Baltimore Marriott Waterfront is the perfect option for business and leisure travelers.

name: Kimpton Hotel Monaco Baltimore Inner Harbor
description: The luxurious Monaco Baltimore hotel is ideally located near the Inner Harbor. Kimpton guests enjoy unrivaled service and amenities, including free WiFi, morning coffee & tea, and wine hour.
amenities: Photo Copier / Fax In Business Center

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Baltimore-Inner Harbor
description:
Welcome to the Hampton Inn & Suites Baltimore Inner Harbor hotel, an upscale Maryland hotel offering the ultimate in modern amenities, comfort and service in the heart of the Baltimore Financial District.  This grand historic building is located two blocks from the Inner Harbor. 

The Baltimore Inner Harbor Hampton Inn & Suites features 116 spacious amenity filled hotel rooms with microwave, refrigerator, coffeemaker, hair dryer, complimentary high-speed internet access, and premium cable TV with movie channels. Maryland travelers can also request a spacious suite that features a whirlpool and additional amenities.

Sure to please the busy executive or leisure Maryland traveler, Baltimore Inner Harbor Hampton Inn & Suites hotel guests will be treated to our complimentary On the House hot breakfast buffet served daily.

name: Hilton Baltimore BWI Airport
description:
Ideally located adjacent to the airport grounds, our ultra-modern Hilton Baltimore hotel is only 4 miles from the Maryland Live Casino, 10 miles from the shopping and entertainment venues of the Inner Harbor, and 30 miles from Washington, D.C. Business guests will also enjoy proximity to major corporations and military and government agencies. 

Select from 280 guest rooms and suites - each featuring plush furnishings, chic bathrooms and Hilton hotel's signature Serenity bedding. Admire our inspiring collection of paintings by local artists, a shining example of our belief that travel should enliven the mind and spirit. 

Establishing a new standard of hospitality for surrounding Hilton Maryland hotels, we offer you a dynamic atmosphere and a picturesque setting: 
280 deluxe guest rooms and suites, including three Executive Level Suites and one Presidential Suite, Inspiring original artwork throughout the hotel by local artists, Wired and wireless Internet access, in all accommodations
