name: Dossier
description: Situated in the heart of downtown Portland, the AAA Four Diamond Dossier is perfectly placed for the urban explorer seeking a beautiful adventure in Oregon. Alder, the new American bistro located within Dossier, delights guests with modern classics, a curated selection of regional wines and beer, as well as one of Portland’s most delightful craft cocktail programs. Each of Dossier’s art-filled rooms and suites features locally-inspired amenities designed to bring the spirit of Portland into the hotel. Wake up refreshed and ready to explore the region’s endless opportunities for adventure, culture, and cuisine. Dossier is your home away from home. Naturally.

name: Hyatt Regency Portland at the Oregon Convention Center
description: Opened in December 2019, Hyatt Regency Portland is the closest full-service hotel to the bustling Oregon Convention Center and Moda Center/Veterans Memorial Coliseum. Centrally located in Lloyd District with a short walk to high-end eateries and breweries nearby. Convenient access to Downtown and the Pearl District across the river to see local landmarks like the International Rose Test Garden.

name: The Benson Portland, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: Daily Mandatory Urban Destination Charge will be added to the room rate and includes:  Internet access: 2 grab & go breakfasts each morning: 2 glasses of wine, beer, soda, or juice each evening: daily bottled water: 1 daily pass to 24 Hour Fitness: Press Reader: local & domestic long-distance calls.  In the heart of downtown Portland, our hotel is a short walk to the Pearl District, waterfront park, and countless shops, bars, and restaurants. Pioneer Courthouse Square and Powell's Books are a five-minute walk from our doors. Our hotel is pet-friendly and features a 24-hour fitness center and over 13,500 sq. ft. of event and meeting space.
amenities: Photo Copier / Fax In Business Center

name: The Nines, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Portland
description: The Nines Portland is a truly magnificent and luxurious hotel in downtown Portland. Historic in nature, yet contemporary in everything else. The hotel is situated amongst picturesque surroundings in the historical Meier & Frank Building. Enjoy modern, and eclectic comfort amidst foxily fashioned hotel suites and rooms. Luxuriate with contemporary amenities, crystal lighting, alabaster colored satin drapes, and leather headboards. Close by are boutiques, trendy dining options, and local attractions accessible by foot, or by Portland's green-friendly Light Rails and Street Cars. Explore the exotic Japanese Gardens, museums, and posh neighborhoods in the city. Stimulate your senses with unique artisanal cuisine, while enjoying exhilarating views of a vibrant downtown landscape. Experience some of the top restaurant's in Portland with the Urban Farmer Steakhouse and the Asian-inspired Departure Restaurant + Lounge. For special occasions, events, or corporate parties, The Nines creates a memorable social experience.

name: Hotel Lucia
description: Want to get to know the real Portland? The keeping weird, coffee-drinking, food-loving, creative, always-outdoors, never normal Portland? We're Hotel Lucia, and we know Portland. Because we are Portland. Centrally located in the heart of downtown close to dining, shopping, entertainment, public transit, and more, Hotel Lucia is the perfect starting point for your Portland adventures. Why? From our hotel artwork to the experts at our 24-hr front desk and concierge service, everything about us is local. We’ve been helping people discover and fall in love with this city since before Portland was trendy, and we’ll keep on doing it for everyone from leisure travelers to business travelers and everyone in between. Some of Portland’s best landmarks and local attractions, dining, and restaurants can be found just steps from Hotel Lucia. Browse books at the world-famous Powell’s City of Books or shop famous brands from Nike to Louis Vuitton in and around the Pioneer Square Mall. Stop in for a cup of Portland-roasted joe at Never Coffee, dine at the world's first certified sustainable sushi restaurant Bamboo Sushi, or try craft cocktails (a Portland specialty) at Fortune. The nearby Pioneer Square and Courthouse is the perfect starting point to discovering Portland; known as the city’s living room, it’s here that Portlanders come to hang out, have fun, and enjoy the feel of the city. From there, TriMet buses and MAX Light Rail lines can connect you to the rest of Portland, from the hip Pearl District to Chinatown to Forest Park. Then, after long days exploring, we’ve got everything you need to rest, recover, and get ready for the next day. Our boutique rooms come with fine modern amenities including a flat screen TV, air conditioning, free Wi-Fi, and a minibar. Want to get in a workout? Head to our top-line fitness center. Need a place to park your car? Enjoy convenient paid public parking on-site or use our valet service. 24-hour room service is also available from Cheryl’s restaurant. So come and stay with us. We know Portland and we’re here to help you discover her.

name: Mark Spencer Hotel
description: In the world of hospitality, there are a few unexpected places in which timeless European flair, cultured style and Old World courtesy are vibrantly alive. These lasting impressions are also accompanied by a profound respect for another very precious aspect: your comfort. Welcome to The Mark Spencer Hotel, an exceptional value in the hub of the city.

name: The Royal Sonesta Portland Downtown
description: Voted Friendliest Hotel in the U.S.! When you visit a famously whimsical city, you want an equally whimsical hotel. With tasteful vintage touches at every turn, The Royal Sonesta Portland Downtown offers the quintessential Portland experience. Rest your head among custom-made bird wallpaper and playful décor in one of our 221 guest rooms and suites. Experience the Peloton Bike in our fitness center. Indulge in a relaxing afternoon at Dosha 5th Avenue Spa. And if business brings you here, enjoy over 8,000 square feet of unique meeting space sure to inspire. Not only do local Oregonians love us, but the property has received raves from Travel + Leisure, Architectural Digest and Condé Nast Traveler magazines. In the heart of downtown, our historic hotel is steps away from Powell's City of Books, Tom McCall Waterfront Park, Pioneer Courthouse Square, and many other premier attractions. A stay at The Royal Sonesta Portland Downtown is an experience you won't soon forget.

name: The Porter Portland, Curio Collection By Hilton
description:
Welcome to The Porter Portland, Curio Collection by Hilton, perfectly located in one of America's most walkable cities. Rising 16 stories above the thriving Fountain District, our Portland hotel is steps from premier shops, popular restaurants and Keller Auditorium and just 2 blocks from Tom McCall Waterfront Park. OHSU Hospital and Legacy Good Samaritan are conveniently close. The MAX Light Rail station is a quick stroll for any travels to Greater Portland.

Guest rooms are stunning, rustic and modern with complimentary WiFi, a 55-inch TV, mini-fridge, a coffeemaker with local teas and coffees, and cozy extras like plush robes and slippers. Upgrade for floor-to-ceiling windows and views of the Willamette River and Cascade Mountains, or book a suite with a separate living area, dining table and wet bar for entertaining.

Hotel restaurants blend indulgence with Portland's love for the outdoors.

name: Kimpton RiverPlace Hotel
description: A 4-star trendy boutique hotel by Kimpton Hotels in downtown Portland, OR. Stay in laid-back luxury and peace but still be in the middle of everything downtown Portland has to offer!

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Portland, OR
description:
Experience Unparalleled Comfort and Convenience at the DoubleTree hotel Portland
Welcome to the DoubleTree hotel Portland, your gateway to an exceptional stay in the vibrant Portland Metro area. Our hotel isn't only one of the largest within walking distance to the Oregon Convention Center, the Moda Center, and Portland Memorial Coliseum, but it also offers an array of amenities and a prime location that ensures an unforgettable visit.

Perfectly Situated for Business and Leisure
Our central location means you're just steps away from world-class entertainment, tax-free shopping at specialty boutiques and national brand stores, and of course Portland's renowned culinary scene with its endless dining options. 

Convenient Parking
At the DoubleTree hotel Portland, we understand the value of convenience. We offer on-site covered parking in our garage, which is a rare find in downtown Portland.

name: Hyatt Regency Milwaukee
description: Hyatt Regency Milwaukee is the premier hotel in downtown Milwaukee with all the latest conveniences and comforts in meetings, accommodations and dining. A magnificent 18-story atrium welcomes you to 481 guestrooms, including 18 suites, complete with high-speed wireless Internet access. Travelers can enjoy easy access to many of downtown Milwaukee's most exciting sites and prominent businesses making the Hyatt Regency an ideal setting for business or pleasure. The hotel is connected by skywalk to the Wisconsin Center and is in the middle of numerous restaurants, sports arenas, museums and the theatre district all within walking distance. Enjoy American cuisine on site in a relaxed atmosphere at Bistro 333, or experience Bar 333, where craft beers and cocktails are our specialty. Unwind in our new Hyatt Stay Fit 24 hour fully equipped fitness facility. At Hyatt Regency Milwaukee, experience a unique combination of amenities and unsurpassed service, as only Hyatt can deliver.
amenities: Free Wifi in the Business Center

name: Hilton Milwaukee City Center
description:
The Hilton Milwaukee City Center hotel is a classic downtown Milwaukee Hotel recognized as the city's finest hotel with a tradition of excellence going back more than 80 years. The gracious style of the hotel is reflected in our impeccable service and attention to every detail.

Combining its 1920s grandeur and elegance with today's modern conveniences, the Hilton Milwaukee City Center hotel features beautifully appointed guest rooms with plush furnishing and the latest in-room amenities, the distinguished Milwaukee ChopHouse featuring savory steaks, fresh seafood and an extensive wine list, and the renowned Miller Time Pub and Grill, perfect for unwinding with friends and co-workers.

In addition, the Hilton Milwaukee City Center hotel has a well-earned reputation for hosting weddings, meetings, conventions and banquets.

name: Hyatt Place Milwaukee Downtown
description: This upscale contemporary hotel is located in the newly revitalized Brewery Area, across from the Fiserv Forum, the new home of Milwaukee Bucks basketball. The hotel is also walking distance to Pilot Project Brewing and Pabst Taproom, and a 10 minute walk to the Milwaukee Riverwalk and over 25 restaurants. Baird Center, Marquette University, UW-Milwaukee and Summerfest are all nearby as well the Public Museum, Milwaukee Art Museum, Harley Davidson Museum, Milwaukee Public Market and American Family Field. Bright, comfortable rooms come with free WiFi, 49" HDTVs and living areas with sofa beds, as well as coffeemakers and mini-fridges. The hotel also features a Coffee to Cocktails Bar, 24-hour Gallery Market, spacious 24 hour fitness room, 24 hour business center, and modern meeting and event spaces. A daily hot breakfast buffet is available. Valet parking is available onsite, or there is a self-park garage 1 block west of the hotel.

address_obj.street2: Enter at 8th Street and Juneau Avenue intersection

amenities: Free Wifi in the Business Center

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Milwaukee Downtown
description: The DoubleTree by Hilton is perfectly located in the heart of Downtown Milwaukee and is an ideal destination for those visiting Brew City. The Baird Convention Center is adjacent to the hotel while the Milwaukee Public Museum and Fiserv Forum are steps away. Within a few blocks, you will find the Marquette University campus, the Summerfest grounds, and the entertainment district. Local businesses include Harley-Davidson, Molson Coors, Manpower, Rockwell Automation, Johnson Controls, Northwestern Mutual, and Milwaukee Tool. Enjoy valet parking, a warm DoubleTree cookie upon check-in, Hilton Honors benefits, free WiFi, and a microwave and refrigerator in each of the contemporary guest rooms. An onsite restaurant, The Avenue Bar and Grill, offers traditional Wisconsin fare for breakfast, lunch, and dinner each day as well as full-service, seasonal sundeck patio. The award-winning team looks forward to welcoming you to the legendary city of Milwaukee.

name: Drury Plaza Hotel Milwaukee Downtown
description: Travel Happy® with Drury Hotels. You have enough to worry about while you're traveling. Let us take a few things off your plate, so you can focus on the good stuff. Breakfast, Wi-Fi, dinnertime snacks, soft drinks, popcorn, business center, workout facilities and more - we've got you covered! A microwave and refrigerator can be found in all rooms. Drury Hotels is 100 percent family-owned and operated. At every one of our 150+ locations, you'll consistently experience rooms with crisp sheets, fine linens and cozy surroundings to ensure a good night's sleep.
amenities: Free Wired Internet in the Business Center
Photo Copier / Fax In Business Center

name: The Pfister Hotel
description: Located just a few blocks from the shores of Lake Michigan, guests of The Pfister Hotel enjoy a four star luxury experience in the heart of downtown Milwaukee. The Pfister is moments away from the Milwaukee Art Museum, Summerfest Grounds, multiple museums, theaters, shopping, nightlife and dining destinations within walking distance. The Pfister is in the center of it all.
amenities: Free Wifi in the Business Center
Free Wired Internet in the Business Center

name: Hilton Garden Inn Milwaukee Downtown
description:
The Hilton Garden Inn Milwaukee Downtown is located in the heart of the city.  Walking distance from the magnificent Milwaukee lakefront this historic Hotel is located in the iconic Loyalty building on north Broadway.  This 125 year old gem will be transformed into a magical Hilton Garden Inn with all the modern technology and amenities necessary in today's hotels while embracing the history and character that has made the Loyalty building an historic landmark of great renown.  Experience the five story atrium with marble, granite and iron finishes and the magnificent skylight.  Imagine executives from Northwestern Mutual Life Insurance climbing the grand staircase in 1886. 

A mere ten miles from Mitchell International Airport the Hotel is walking distance to almost every major attraction the city has to offer:  
• The historic third ward with eclectic shops, art galleries and upscale dining nestled between Lake Michigan and the Milwaukee River.
• West town with its magnificent shoppi

name: The Westin Milwaukee

name: Milwaukee Marriott Downtown
description: Milwaukee Marriott Downtown is a full-service hotel that offers the epitome of luxury and convenience to make it one of the top hotels in downtown Milwaukee. Ideally located in the heart of East Town, this hotel offers easy access to Milwaukee’s top destinations including the shores of Lake Michigan, Pabst Theater, Cathedral Square Park, the Summerfest grounds, and the famed Milwaukee River Walk. This luxurious downtown Milwaukee hotel offers modern amenities including high-speed wireless internet, a 24-hour fitness center, and flexible wedding, special event, and meeting facilities equipped with state-of-the-art lighting and audio equipment. Guests love to stop by East Town Kitchen + Bar which offers elevated comfort food. Guest rooms are highlighted by luxury bedding, HD TVs with premium cable, and stylish design. Choose the Milwaukee Marriott Downtown and discover a Milwaukee, WI hotel destination that provides incomparable service and unprecedented style.

name: Miraval Arizona
description: Miraval is a global leader in well-being resorts and spas. Opened in 1995, Miraval Arizona pioneered the destination well-being spa resort category with its comprehensive program of activities, experiences, and personal treatments. Miraval’s core is mindfulness, and its motto, “life is better when in balance”, guides each visit. Activities include fitness, meditation, yoga, well-being, equine, hiking, biking, and metaphysical exploration.

name: Graduate Tucson
description: Rekindle the spirit of your alma mater at the smartest place to stay in town. Nestled in the heart of campus, Graduate Tucson is close to everywhere Wildcats want to be, and just a short trip from downtown and historic Fourth Avenue. Guest rooms celebrate the natural flora and fauna of the region with pops of color against neutral backdrops. Accents of natural materials such as leather, wood and textiles blend together to create a modern space that’s distinctly Southwest. In the lobby, a vibrant desert sunset scene illuminates the front desk, while giant cacti and woven textiles make the bright, open interior about more than the natural sunlight. While you’re here, relax at the terrazo communal table and make yourself at home at Poindexter, our onsite café. Or head to the rooftop for a drink or a swim. So whether you’re in town rallying for a Wildcats win, exploring campus or soaking up the Southwestern sun, we’re here to make your stay memorable. Our warm, friendly and whip-smart staff are happy to provide you recommendations around Tucson so you’ll feel like a local even if it’s your first time in town.

name: Arizona Inn
description: Privacy, quiet & sunshine. The Arizona Inn is an historic, boutique, resort hotel spread over 14 acres of gardens, fountains, flowers and lawns in the heart of mid-town Tucson, Arizona.

name: Hacienda Del Sol Guest Ranch Resort
description: Experience resort luxury with authentic, southwestern ambiance in Tucson, Arizona. Discover the romantic and vintage style of Hacienda del Sol Guest Ranch Resort. Rich in Tucson history, the resort resides in the foothills of the Santa Catalina Mountains on 34 acres of natural desert landscape. Botanical gardens envelop the resort's private casitas, guest rooms and suites. Authentic adobe structures and hand-carved, wood-beamed ceilings circa 1929 are just a few of the preserved details amidst modern day amenities.

address_obj.address_string: 5501 N Hacienda Del Sol Rd, Tucson, AZ 85718-5122

name: Hilton Tucson East
description:
Newly renovated premium Eastside location just 5 minutes from Research Loop, featuring on-site Starbucks and Tucson's newest restaurant concept Alloro D.O.C.

Guest rooms and suites include free WiFi and parking and feature either a king bed, or 2-queen beds. 
Our premium location offers proximity to many local businesses, shopping, and easy access to stunning nature sites, including Sabino Canyon, Kartchner Caverns and Mt Lemmon.

Enjoy dinner at Tucson's Newest Restaurant, Alloro D.O.C. and experience the difference as the kitchen makes everything from scratch, including all of the pasta and mozzarella. Alloro features a selection of USDA prime steaks ranging from a 10-ounce Top Sirloin to a 40-ounce Tomahawk Ribeye for two, and everything in between. Visit the Mercato di´ Alloro located in the lobby to get your espresso fix daily or grab a light snack.
amenities: Free Wifi in the Business Center
Photo Copier / Fax In Business Center

name: JW Marriott Tucson Starr Pass Resort & Spa
description: JW Marriott Tucson Starr Pass Resort & Spa offers uncomplicated relaxation amid the city's most compelling attractions. Hike and bike on spectacular trails of Tuscon, AZ, or explore the Arizona-Sonora Desert Museum, Kino Sports complex, and Old Tucson Studios. Test your swing on the Arnold Palmer-designed desert golf courses, pamper yourself at our spa or take a dip in our multi-level pool and lazy river. Whatever your reason for visiting, we want to make your stay memorable at JW Marriott Tucson Starr Pass Resort & Spa.

address_obj.address_string: 3800 W Starr Pass Blvd, Tucson, AZ 85745-5115

amenities: Photo Copier / Fax In Business Center

name: El Conquistador Tucson, A Hilton Resort
description: The Hilton Tucson El Conquistador Golf & Tennis Resort is located on 500 acres of high Sonoran Desert terrain in the foothills of the Santa Catalina Mountains, our full-service Tucson, Arizona hotel offers a beautiful destination setting in the heart of Arizona. The hotel houses three nearby championship golf courses, or play a tennis match into the evening on one of 31 floodlit tennis courts. Unwind in your choice of four swimming pools with a waterslide, children's pool, sauna, and hot and cold jetted tubs. Enjoy the southwestern sun on the pool deck and cool down with a tropical drink from Desert Springs Café poolside bar. Relax with a spa treatment or massage at Elements Spa in the Hilton Tucson El Conquistador Golf & Tennis Resort. Re-energize in the fully equipped 24-hour fitness room with modern equipment.  Feel at home with a separate bedroom and living area. Start the day with a delicious breakfast at the Sundance Cafe.
amenities: Free Wifi in the Business Center
Free Wired Internet in the Business Center
Photo Copier / Fax In Business Center

name: Loews Ventana Canyon Resort
description: Tucson's spectacular 'Ventana' - or 'Window' - to the Soul of the Sonoran desert is Loews Ventana Canyon Resort. Situated on 100 acres in the lush Sonoran Desert, indulge in our nature lover’s paradise. Discover a magical perspective nestled into Tucson's Catalina Mountains, where this stunning natural retreat offers a variety of activities and signature services to relax, energize and inspire guests. Our playground of visitor delights includes: two Tom Fazio designed PGA golf courses, the luxurious Lakeside Spa & Tennis Center, two swimming pools, canyon hiking; an 80-foot natural waterfall, nearby riding & cycling trails, and more. Each guestroom is equipped with a large soaking tub and private balcony, perfect for taking in the view. Flying V Bar & Grill features upscale, regional cuisine and a large outdoor patio overlooking the lake and golf course.

name: Adobe Rose Inn
description: The Adobe Rose Inn is a hidden gem tucked away just two blocks from the University of Arizona in the heart of the delightful and historic Sam Hughes Neighborhood. Each of our 6 rooms come with a private bathroom, hairdryer, coffee maker, television, and plush robes. The beauty of our natural surroundings invites you to relax and enjoy our tucked away courtyards, swimming pool and patios. Our breakfasts will tempt your palate and set the tone for your day, whether it is one filled with exploring, adventure, learning or business. The Adobe Rose Inn is dedicated to helping our guests create a lifetime of memories, one moment at a time.

name: Lodge On The Desert
description: Lodge on the Desert is a Tucson classic and guests experience the authenticity of the Old Pueblo blended with the modern southwest charm that has evolved throughout the Lodge's storied 80 years. This 100-room boutique hotel is situated on five acres in mid-town Tucson, AZ and appeals to leisure and business travelers alike. Plus with event spaces for up to 175 guests, Lodge on the Desert is popular for small to mid-size meetings and intimate social gatherings. An Arizona landmark and Tucson tradition renowned for its intimate residential setting and genial hospitality, here guests discover pathways meandering among regal palms, native cacti and manicured lawns wrapped in ribbons of seasonal flowers. Charming hacienda-style accommodations afford guests a sanctuary in which to retreat and relax. It is truly Tucson's urban oasis. And considered by many to be the Old Pueblo's mid-town masterpiece.

name: Best Western Plus Fresno Airport Hotel
description: At the Best Western Plus Fresno Airport Hotel you're sure to find that little something extra. With our modern amenities and thoughtful design, the Best Western Plus Fresno Airport Hotel will stand out among other hotels in Fresno,CA. For the business traveler, a spacious work desk and free internet access are included in all our guest rooms to ensure you don't miss a beat while you're away from the office. For extended stays, each room provides a convenient in-room mini fridge that is ideal for drinks and snacks. We also have an in-house fitness room, so you can keep up your workout routine while you're on the road. As always, the Best Western Plus Fresno Airport Hotel will provide you with the superior customer service that you are used to at Best Western® Hotels & Resorts.

name: Hyatt Place Fresno
description: Discover the vibrant charm of Fresno, California, at Hyatt Place Fresno. Nestled in the heart of this dynamic city, our modern hotel offers a perfect blend of style and comfort for your stay. Whether you're visiting for business or leisure, experience the exceptional hospitality and thoughtful amenities that make us a preferred choice among travelers. Indulge in spacious guestrooms designed with your relaxation in mind. Unwind on plush Hyatt Grand Beds™, catch up on your favorite shows on the flat-screen TV, and stay connected with complimentary Wi-Fi. Start your day right with our complimentary breakfast, featuring a delicious selection of freshly prepared meals and energizing beverages. Stay productive in our flexible meeting spaces, equipped with state-of-the-art technology and supported by our expert event staff. After a successful day, recharge at our 24/7 fitness center or take a refreshing dip in the outdoor pool. Craving a bite to eat? Savor a variety of flavorful options at our Gallery Menu or grab a quick snack from our 24/7 Gallery Market. Conveniently located near Fresno Yosemite International Airport and just minutes away from downtown attractions, Hyatt Place Fresno offers easy access to popular destinations like Fresno Chaffee Zoo, Save Mart Center, and Woodward Park. Explore the vibrant local scene, including restaurants, shopping, and entertainment options, all within reach from our hotel. Experience a seamless stay at Hyatt Place Fresno, where modern comfort meets exceptional service. Book your stay today and let us be your home away from home in the heart of California's Central Valley.
amenities: Free Wifi in the Business Center
Photo Copier / Fax In Business Center

name: Wyndham Garden Fresno Airport
description: The newly renovated Wyndham Garden Fresno Airport rooms are designed with your comfort in mind. Guest enjoy comfortable and spacious rooms, free high-speed Wi-Fi, HDTV, ergonomic work space. Our guests may take advantage of our many amenities including: shuttle service, laundry & dry cleaning services, access to our business center, fitness center, indoor and outdoor pools. Our 6 spacious meeting rooms with room for up to 250 guests and over 9,000 square feet to host your next event.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Fresno Convention Center
description:
Feel welcome the moment you check-in to DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Fresno Convention Center with a warm chocolate chip cookie on arrival. The largest full-service hotel in California's Central Valley, we are just across the street from the Fresno Convention and Entertainment Center. Enjoy easy connectivity to Highway 41, Highway 99, California State University and Fresno Yosemite International Airport - only 10 minutes' drive away. Discover many retail, dining and entertainment opportunities nearby, and visit Kings Canyon National Park, Sequoia National Park or Yosemite National Park; all within driving distance of our friendly hotel in Fresno, California.

Feel at home in a stylish guest room, equipped with complimentary WiFi, an iPod Dock Alarm Clock, a 37-inch flat-screen HDTV and a Serta Suite Dreams bed. Upgrade to a suite for more space and amenities - ideal for families and extended-stays in Fresno, CA.

name: Extended Stay America - Fresno - North
description: Free grab-and-go breakfast: Jumpstart your day with a free grab-and-go breakfast that includes a variety of breakfast bars and muffins, hot cereal, coffee, and tea.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Fresno
description: Conveniently located in the expanding North Side of Fresno, California, the Homewood Suites by Hilton Fresno hotel is on the southeast corner of Herndon Avenue and Fresno Street with easy access to Highway 41 and the surrounding Fresno area. Adjacent to restaurants and shopping centers, Homewood Suites by Hilton Fresno is within walking distance to medical centers, malls and growing business parks.

name: Courtyard by Marriott Fresno
description: Find relaxing, convenient accommodations at Courtyard by Marriott Fresno, a modern and ideally located hotel in Fresno, California. We offer spacious rooms and suites near the Sierra Mountains, Kings River and California State University, Fresno. Hotel amenities include an outdoor pool, a modern fitness center and an American restaurant.

name: Days Inn by Wyndham Fresno Central
description:
Days Inn by Wyndham Fresno Central is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Fresno, offering a budget friendly environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.
You’ll enjoy relaxing rooms that offer a flat screen TV, and you can stay connected during your stay as Days Inn - Fresno Hotel offers guests free wifi.
Plus, Days Inn by Wyndham Fresno Central offers a pool and free breakfast, providing a pleasant respite from your busy day. For guests with a vehicle, free parking is available.
While staying at Days Inn Fresno, visitors can check out Old Fresno Water Tower (2.7 mi) and Fresno City Hall (2.8 mi), some of Fresno's top attractions.
While in Fresno be sure to experience local shrimp favorites at Sequoia Brewing, Richard's, or El Torito Restaurant.
If you’re looking for things to do, you can check out Fresno Art Museum, which is a popular art museum amongst tourists.
Enjoy your stay in Fresno!

name: Best Western Village Inn
description: Located in Fresno,CA, the Best Western Village Inn is sure to provide a peaceful and comforting home away from home for any traveler. Each Best Western hotel provides free internet access, giving guests the opportunity to check emails and surf the web, all from the comforts of their room or the business center. With cleanliness and value being our top priority, we ensure a restful and productive stay. On top of that, our superior customer service will ensure that we meet all your needs and go beyond your expectations.

name: Sonesta ES Suites Fresno
description: Fly into Fresno Yosemite International Airport and experience a surprisingly different stay at Sonesta ES Suites Fresno. Whether you are planning a visit to California State University, hiking in Sequoia National Park, or just need a relaxing space during an extended business trip, our spacious suites will feel like home. Our hotel features fully equipped kitchens, roomy work areas and free Wi-Fi. Sonesta ES Suites Fresno combines affordability with conveniences like parking included in a destination fee and everyday surprises like complimentary treats and other unexpected delights. Feel more at home at ES Suites with free breakfast including fresh coffee and a variety of breakfast offerings. It's no wonder we're a favorite among business travelers and families for hotels in Fresno, CA.

name: The Fort Sutter Hotel Sacramento, Tapestry Collection by Hilton
description: Our boutique Midtown hotel is across the street from Fort Sutter Medical Complex and Sutter's Fort State Historic Park. We're surrounded by tons of restaurants, offices, and shopping, so whether you're here for work or play, there's plenty to do and see. The State Capitol building and park, and SAFE Credit Union Convention Center are just two miles away.

name: Hyatt Regency Sacramento
description: Located in the heart of the vibrant downtown and across the street from the California State Capitol and Park, our iconic hotel offers passionate hospitality and inviting spaces where everyone gets the VIP treatment. Designed for the modern traveler, our hotel features the most updated guestrooms and suites in Sacramento, a 24 hour fitness center with Peletons, a resort-style pool, two restaurants, two bars and a full service Starbucks. When you want to explore the area, you're just steps from exciting shopping, theaters, landmarks, and popular attractions, like the Old Sacramento Waterfront and Golden 1 Center.

name: The Exchange Sacramento, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: Daily Mandatory Charge includes: Sacramento tourism marketing district and infrastructure district fees: California tourism assessment fee. Less than a mile from Golden 1 Center and the State Capitol, our historic 10-story hotel is in the heart of downtown Sacramento. The Old Sacramento Waterfront historic district is just a half mile away, with eclectic restaurants and bars. Sacramento International Airport is less than 15 minutes away. Enjoy the Southern Italian cuisine in Willow, our onsite restaurant and bar.

name: Sheraton Grand Sacramento Hotel
description: Discover exquisite modern lodgings and access to the best of Sacramento at the Sheraton Grand Sacramento Hotel. We are situated in the heart of downtown Sacramento, California, near the convention center and State Capitol complex. We provide comfort in the beautifully restored Public Market Building near the city's best shopping and restaurants and close to top business destinations.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Sacramento Riverfront Promenade
description: Embassy Suites Sacramento-Riverfront Promenade provides a comfortable all-suites experience. Explore the local attractions around this centrally-located hotel, from the Raley Field to the Crocker Art Museum. Stroll along the Riverfront Promenade - just steps from the hotel. Business guests can gather at the nearby Sacramento Convention Center or visit the California State Capitol. Spend an afternoon discovering the stories of Old Sacramento - browsing its shops, attractions and world-renowned museums.  Host a meeting in one of our spacious conference rooms, and stay connected with high-speed WiFi internet access. Our close proximity to the freeway and Sara Lee, Drexel University, PBS&j and Wells Fargo premises are a bonus to business travelers. Enjoy our signature complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast and evening reception held underneath the elegant tropical atrium.

name: Extended Stay America - Sacramento - West Sacramento
description: Free grab-and-go breakfast: Jumpstart your day with a free grab-and-go breakfast that includes a variety of breakfast bars and muffins, hot cereal, coffee, and tea.

name: Larkspur Landing Sacramento
description: Our Larkspur Landing Sacramento hotel is ideal for every kind of traveler. It is conveniently located near Highway 50, California State University Sacramento and is within 3 miles of downtown Sacramento. The charming hotel in Sacramento boasts a proximity to local attractions like Cal Expo, Arco Arena, and the Sacramento County Fairgrounds. name: Magnolia Hotel Omaha

Named to the National Register of Historic Places in 1974, the faces of George and Aquila Cook can still be seen on the front of the boutique hotel’s building today. Here, you’ll discover the inviting warmth of pure hospitality in the center of downtown Omaha. This downtown Omaha hotel offers stylish rooms & suites located near many major corporate headquarters and offices. Omaha's largest mall, The Westroads Mall, offering 150 stores and restaurants is less than a half mile drive from our hotel. Enjoy our full service Marriott with an onsite restaurant and lounge, gym, indoor/outdoor pool, business center, 24 hour Corner Pantry, complimentary parking and complimentary coffee in the lobby! We offer over 12,000 square feet of flexible event space, 300 guest rooms and over 600 parking spaces! Come stay, play and travel with us!

name: Kimpton Cottonwood Hotel
description:
The Cottonwood Hotel is the premier destination for Midwest explorers. Built in 1916, this Omaha landmark offers guests a glimpse of the past, while enjoying the modern luxuries Kimpton is known for. Discover our restaurants and lounges; from The Committee Chophouse to Petit Orleans, we offer the right flavors for the right moments. Live a little history when you walk into the modern restoration of the Cottonwood Room, made famous not only by its playful cocktails, but by the cottonwood tree art instillation which was, and is again, located in the heart of the lounge. After dining, wander through our public art collection, carefully curated by an Omaha local. When you are ready for bed, have a perfect night’s sleep in one of our premium guestrooms or suites. 

Distinctive food and beverage options meet a comfortable, yet sophisticated environment in each of the hotel’s unique event spaces, making The Cottonwood the premier hotel to host friends, clients, and colleagues. Sunrise Yoga on the Rooftop Terrace, meetings in the expansive Gold Coast Ballroom, and outdoor breaks on the event lawn are just a few perks guests can look forward to experiencing. History is evident inside the rooftop Schimmel ballroom, proudly displaying original wood floors, hand-crafted plaster relief, expansive views of the city, and stunning outdoor terraces. 

Want to explore the neighborhood? Welcome to the Blackstone District. The District’s classic structures along Farnam Street and those on the outlying blocks are home to restaurants, bars, and businesses that offer a variety of cuisines, entertainment, and modern-era services for patrons of all ages. All of these offerings are a short walk, or a quick Tuk-Tuk ride, away.

name: Courtyard by Marriott Omaha Aksarben Village

Our Omaha hotel has guests covered. Replenish your mind, body, and spirit in our indoor saltwater pool, relaxing whirlpool, and saunas or stay active in our fitness center outfitted with cardio and strength training equipment.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Omaha Southwest
description:
Enjoy upscale amenities and a great location at Doubletree by Hilton Omaha Southwest. Situated just off I 80, we grant you easy access to Baxter Arena, Henry Doorly Zoo and the University of Nebraska Omaha.

Unwind in your spacious guest room, featuring floor to ceiling windows, free WiFi, a large desk, and an elegant bathroom, complete with large backlit mirror and contemporary barn door entrance. Suites offer additional space, a sofa bed, a wet bar with microwave and refrigerator, and a sitting nook with reading lamp.

Dine in style in our sleek, custom-designed Vida Restaurant and Lounge. Work out in our 24-hour fitness center, then relax in our heated, glass-enclosed pool, featuring outdoor recreation space. If you're here on business, get work done in our open-concept business center, or impress your guests by hosting an event in our flexible, modern meeting space.

name: The Tony Hotel South Beach
description: The Tony Hotel South Beach was originally designed and built in 1939 by L. Murray Dixon, a master architect responsible for many of the Art Deco buildings that line Collins Avenue and Ocean Drive. Dixon’s signature style, embodied in this hotel, included streamlined curves, jutting towers, window “eyebrows,” and neon. Originally named The Tiffany (and subsequently renamed The Hotel of South Beach), the hotel’s rooftop “Tiffany” spire is an historic landmark, towering majestically over Collins Avenue for more than 80 years. In 1985, legendary placemaker Tony Goldman visited South Beach for the first time and fell in love. He saw past the blight and dilapidated buildings that plagued South Beach at the time and envisioned the American Riviera. He spent the next 27 years of his life leading the renaissance of South Beach, fighting to preserve its history while also envisioning its future as a pedestrian destination where people from all walks of life could enjoy its natural beauty in an inclusive community. Tony Goldman bought and methodically restored the hotel, among other properties, and in 1998 enlisted fashion designer Todd Oldham to infuse the hotel with the rich colors, shapes, and textures emblematic of the Art Deco era. The renaming of the hotel as The Tony Hotel South Beach in 2022, on the tenth anniversary of his passing, was a fitting tribute to Tony Goldman by his family, who still own and operate the hotel to this day.

name: Fontainebleau Miami Beach

It is conveniently located 11.8 miles from Miami airport and 3.1 miles from the Art Deco Historic District. The contemporary rooms in four buildings offer modern amenities such as flat-screen TVs, iMacs with Internet access, and iPod docks. Many rooms boast ocean-view balconies. Stylish suites and penthouses feature living rooms, and some even include kitchens. Guests can enjoy a range of amenities, including trendy boutiques, bars, and nightclubs. The hotel offers upscale dining options, including a steakhouse, a Chinese restaurant, and an Italian eatery. For relaxation, there is a luxurious spa with breathtaking ocean views, as well as three elegant ballrooms.

description: Ranked #2 Best Hotel in Miami by Conde Nast Traveler 2023, discover a colorful Miami Beach icon. A vibrant city transitions to a beachside oasis. Designed by famed architect Morris Lapidus, Eden Roc Miami Beach is one of the most iconic and architecturally significant hotels in Miami, lending nostalgic glamour to a modern beachfront resort experience. The same timeless style and upbeat ambience that once drew Old Hollywood luminaries continues to lure loyal guests from all over the world today. Bright, spacious guest rooms with oversized balconies peer out over the sea with direct and dazzling ocean views. Three sparkling beachfront pools, holistic and wellness treatments at the expansive Esencia Wellness Spa including a beauty salon, fitness center and fashion boutique await you. An exclusive strip of beach invite travelers to unwind in a relaxed tropical setting, with pulsing nightlife and world-famous cultural attractions just minutes away. With 5 restaurants and bars, guests can indulge in elevated coastal dining at Ocean Social with dazzling ocean views. For poolside cocktails and snacks, retreat to Aquatica Bar or for a morning pick me up or Grab N Go options, visit Café Inez or experience the finest Japanese cuisine in the city at the world famous Nobu Miami. Whether you’re seeking beach R&R, a wellness escape, or a culinary journey, there’s a little bit of everything for everybody here at Eden Roc.

Experience premier amenities, including a heated saltwater pool with an underwater sound system and poolside cabanas, direct access to South Beach, a 24-hour fitness center with a Peloton, valet parking, elevated on-site dining, and 23,000 sq. ft. of flexible event space. name: Kissel Uptown Oakland
description: Kissel Uptown Oakland is the newest luxury hotel located in the heart of Oakland’s vibrant and eclectic arts and entertainment district. Embodying the spirit of the city and drawing inspiration from its history, the hotel seamlessly blends art deco elements and the industrial character of the old auto row with contemporary design and luxurious modern amenities. Featuring 168 guest rooms and suites, the seven-story hotel serves as a relaxing destination for locals and out-of-town guests alike. Located just minutes from the Fox Theater, Paramount Theater, Lake Merritt, Jack London Square and The Hive, a retail and entertainment complex featuring breweries, bakeries and shopping, it’s the perfect starting line for exploring all that Oakland has to offer. Among the hotel’s amenities are a state-of-the-art fitness center and three distinct food and beverage concepts that offer guests unique dining experiences in inspired settings. The hotel also boasts 9,000 sq. ft. of dynamic and flexible meeting and event spaces, including indoor and outdoor settings for groups. The hotel is also located just 10 miles from Oakland International Airport.

Well-known for its quiet environment and proximity to great restaurants and attractions, Hilton Oakland Airport makes it easy to enjoy the best of Oakland.
Guest rooms offer a flat screen TV, a refrigerator, and air conditioning, and Hilton Oakland makes getting online easy as wifi is available.
You can also take advantage of some of the amenities offered by the hotel, including a 24 hour front desk, room service, and express check-in and check-out. In addition, guests can enjoy a pool and an on-site restaurant during their visit. As an added convenience, there is parking available to guests.
Close to some of Oakland's most popular landmarks, such as Oracle Arena (1.5 mi) and Oakland-Alameda County Coliseum (1.5 mi), Hilton Oakland is a great destination for tourists.
If you’re looking for a wine bar, consider a visit to Vino Volo, which is not far from Hilton Oakland Airport.
If you’re looking for things to do, you can check out Martin Luther King Jr. Regional Shoreline (0.3 mi), which is a popular attraction amongst tourists, and it is within walking distance.
Whether you’re traveling for business, pleasure or both, Hilton Oakland Airport is sure to make your visit to Oakland one worth remembering.

name: Sonesta Simply Suites Arlington
description: Discover a home away from home at Sonesta Simply Suites Arlington. Enjoy our warm atmosphere and spread out in our large cozy suites. Located just 1 mile from attractions including Six Flags, Hurricane Harbor, Globe Life Field, Choctaw Stadium and AT&T Cowboys Stadium, our hotel in Arlington, TX puts you in the heart of the entertainment district on the Arlington Trolley Route. Students, Alumni and Fans will enjoy our convenient location to The University of Texas Arlington. We're contemporary, yet snug and cozy. Highly attentive, yet simple. It's our authenticity that sets us apart. And it's our genuine desire to create a worry-free experience that lets you… be you. Just like home. Refreshingly simple, at a refreshing price. Welcome to Sonesta Simply Suites.

name: Extended Stay America - Bakersfield - California Avenue, CA
description: Free grab-and-go breakfast: Jumpstart your day with a free grab-and-go breakfast that includes a variety of breakfast bars and muffins, hot cereal, coffee, and tea. Cash is accepted as a form of payment for those guests paying by a weekly or monthly rate. A valid credit card must be kept on file for incidentals. Cash is not accepted as a method of payment for guests paying the daily rate.

name: Padre Hotel
description: The Padre Hotel is located in the heart of Downtown Bakersfield. We are a short walk to the Rabobank Arena, the Fox Theater and the arts district. Originally built in 1928, the Padre was renovated and reopened in 2010, becoming Bakersfield's first and only sophisticated boutique hotel with restaurants, nightlife, wedding venues and conference facilities. We look forward to welcoming you to the Padre Hotel.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Bakersfield
description: The Homewood Suites by Hilton Bakersfield is the ideal location for short or extended stays in Bakersfield, California. Guest visiting Bakersfield will feel right at home in our upscale all-suite accommodations conveniently located one block from California State University Bakersfield, The Market Place, and several large corporations. Our guests will enjoy: complimentary hot breakfast buffet, complimentary dinner with wine and beer Monday through Thursday evenings, complimentary WiFi, and on-site fitness facility, outdoor swimming pool, and sports court.

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Bakersfield, CA
description: The Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Bakersfield, CA provides a convenient location near CA-99 and downtown attractions. Stay just minutes from the Kern County Fairgrounds and Rabobank Arena, Theater & Convention Center, both in the heart of Bakersfield. When you finish touring the city, you can relax in the comfort of your room with cable TV and free Internet.

name: Hyatt Place Bakersfield
description: Enjoy the city's 300 days of sunshine at the brand new Hyatt Place Bakersfield. Venture out for a day and explore the local culture just minutes from your room including upscale shopping, dining, and attractions. Ideally located the Hyatt Place is near CSU Bakersfield, major hospitals, and local corporations.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Bakersfield
description: The Hilton Garden Inn Bakersfield hotel is only minutes from downtown and the Bakersfield Airport, near the intersection of California Highway 99 and Rosedale Highway. Buck Owens Crystal Palace, golf courses, tennis, jogging and hiking trails are nearby. Restaurants and Costco shopping are within walking distance. Our hotel features include: Great restaurant open for breakfast and dinner, evening room service, 24-Hour Pavilion Pantry convenience mart, bar, complimentary wireless internet access, indoor heated pool and whirlpool and workout facility.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Bakersfield
description:
Welcome to the DoubleTree by Hilton hotel in Bakersfield. Begin your stay at this inviting hotel with a delicious fresh-baked DoubleTree Chocolate Chip Cookie and allow our attentive staff to cater to your every need. 
Situated on acres of beautiful, landscaped gardens and surrounded by palm trees and seasonal flowers, this Bakersfield hotel offers a resort-like oasis.

Ideally located only five miles from Meadows Field Airport and just off the Rosedale Highway and Highway 99, the hotel provides easy access to all that Bakersfield has to offer. Visit local attractions such as Kern River and The Fox Theatre, both within five minutes of the hotel, or remain in the hotel and lounge by the outdoor pool and work out in the fitness center.

Host a meeting, conference, special event, or wedding at this hotel with over 14,500 sq. ft. of flexible function space, including the largest ballroom in Bakersfield.

address_obj.address_string: 3100 Camino Del Rio Ct, Bakersfield, CA 93308-6245

name: Residence Inn Bakersfield
description: Residence Inn Bakersfield is your home away from home. With exterior private entrances. Each suite comes with an apartment size kitchen with fridge, stovetop, dishwasher & microwave. Our two bedroom, two bath suites have a full stove/oven. We are pet friendly and the only hotel in Bakersfield with an enclosed dog park where you pet can roam freely. We offer a daily hot breakfast every morning if you do not feel like cooking yourself. Great rates offered for group events and of course our extended long term guest. Also we have some rooms with wood burning fireplaces that can be used during burn season Nov-March. We are one of a kind in at the Residence Inn Bakersfield on Chester Lane.

name: Courtyard by Marriott Bakersfield
description: Rest easy at Courtyard by Marriott Bakersfield. Our hotel in Bakersfield, California is located near the Kern County Fairgrounds, Buck Owens Crystal Palace, and the campus of California State University, Bakersfield. After a busy day, retreat to the comfort of our spacious, newly renovated accommodations that boast plush bedding, complimentary Wi-Fi, flat-panel TVs, and views from private balconies or patios. Start your day at The Bistro, where you can fuel up with your morning dose of Starbucks coffee and breakfast and after a long day, make your way back for dinner paired with a tasty cocktail.
amenities: Photo Copier / Fax In Business Center

name: Hyatt Place Tampa Downtown
description: Make yourself at home in contemporary rooms steps from downtown Tampa’s most vibrant destinations. From Hyatt Place Tampa Downtown, take a stroll along the Riverwalk to the Tampa Museum of Art, walk south to Amalie Arena, or ride a streetcar to Ybor City nightclubs. At our hotel, you’re close to it all.

name: Le Meridien Tampa, The Courthouse
description: Mixing contemporary culture with its European heritage, Le Meridien Tampa has transformed the one time Federal Courthouse into an inspiring 130-room boutique hotel. The hotel features luxurious accommodations, meeting and event space, state-of-the-art fitness center and the engaging Hub - a redefined version of the traditional hotel lobby. Take in the New American flavors at Bizou, our bistro and bar, or indulge in a hand-crafted cocktail at Longitude Bar. Enjoy the convenience of our proximity to Ybor City, Channelside and other Tampa attractions. At Le Meridien Tampa, the possibilities are endless.

name: Hotel Flor Tampa Downtown, Tapestry Collection By Hilton
description: Located in the heart of Downtown Tampa we are only a mile from Starz Center and a 10-miunute drive from Tampa Convention Center, Florida Aquarium and Port of Tampa. Our historical property features 12,000 sq. ft. of meeting space, including a 8,000 sq. ft. ballroom, onsite dining and 24-hour fitness center.

name: Grand Hyatt Tampa Bay
description: A newly renovated resort style hotel convenient to the airport and downtown Tampa. Surround yourself in nature on our 35 waterfront acres designed to help you relax and renew whether you are for a business trip or weekend away. Enjoy bird watching along the board walk, look for manatees near the boat dock, walk the picturesque 9.5 mile bayside bike trail or take in a scenic view from your room or one of our award winning restaurants. The natural setting and coastal elegance provides a sense of tranquility and wellbeing.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Tampa Rocky Point Waterfront
description:
The DoubleTree by Hilton Tampa Rocky Point is located on the waterfront just 12 minutes from downtown Tampa and the Tampa Convention Center. The hotel is in the heart of the city and a short drive to the Tampa International Airport, Westshore Mall and International Plaza. Enjoy picturesque views of Old Tampa Bay Wildlife Preserve and Tampa Bay from your room. 

The DoubleTree by Hilton Tampa Rocky Point Waterfront is situated in the Rocky Point business area, which is close to several Fortune 500 companies, the University of Tampa, the University of South Florida and MacDill Air Force Base. Your stay will begin with a warm freshly-baked signature DoubleTree chocolate chip cookie. Unwind in our heated outdoor pool and enjoy a meal poolside. Or, energize in our fully-equipped fitness center including Peloton© bikes.

name: Best Western Tampa
description: Located in Tampa,FL, the Best Western Tampa is sure to provide a peaceful and comforting home away from home for any traveler. Each Best Western hotel provides free internet access, giving guests the opportunity to check emails and surf the web, all from the comforts of their room or the business center. With cleanliness and value being our top priority, we ensure a restful and productive stay. On top of that, our superior customer service will ensure that we meet all your needs and go beyond your expectations.

name: Hotel Tampa Riverwalk
description: Standing proudly along Tampa Bay's iconic riverwalk, Hotel Tampa Riverwalk's silhouette lights up the winding path below. Here is where all of Tampa comes together-to work, play, and celebrate. Exceptional on the surface and excellent all around, our hotel puts you at the center of it all. Delight in modern American cuisine at River's Edge, lounge poolside, and soak in city views from your balcony. When you're ready for some action, head outside toward endless adventure.

name: Hilton Tampa Downtown
description:
Daily Mandatory Destination Charge includes: Premium guest internet access; daily $30 food and beverage credit for use in all hotel outlets (excluding room service); 1-hour bicycle rental for 2.

Experience superior service and refinement at Hilton Tampa Downtown. The upscale 520-guestroom hotel boasts a contemporary design and sophisticated amenities, including 211 Restaurant and Lounge, serving modern American cuisine, a 24/7 fitness center, an outdoor rooftop pool, and more than 30,000 square feet of flexible event space. The distinctive hotel, located in the city center, is steps from the famous Tampa Riverwalk, Amelia Arena, and Tampa Convention Center.

name: Lotus Honolulu at Diamond Head
description:
A sophisticated boutique hotel located on the famed Gold Coast of Waikiki, the Lotus Honolulu, is a marriage of urban
sophistication with warm Hawaiian hospitality. Nestled between Kapiolani Park and a spectacular white sand beach,
this newly renovated hotel offers a peaceful retreat from the hustle and bustle of Waikiki with remarkable views of
majestic Diamond Head and the ocean.

name: Hilton Vacation Club The Modern Honolulu
description: Perfectly situated, Hilton Vacation Club The Modern Honolulu stands at the epicenter between the world renowned Hawaiian experience of Waikiki Beach, the blossoming Kaka’ako arts district, and Honolulu’s downtown cosmopolitan scene. We are the hub of contemporary culture and creativity in Honolulu. Our boutique luxury is as refined as it is relaxed. An empowered team delivers an exceptional experience which is alluring, personalized and innovative, surrounded by an award-winning design concept that creates an urban chic beach aesthetic. Two stylish pools overlook the ocean for daytime fun. It’s no wonder Thrillist magazine called us “The best boutique hotel in Hawaii.”

name: Queen Kapiolani Hotel
description: Named after the beloved wife of Hawaii's last reigning King, the historical Queen Kapiolani Hotel is conveniently located one block to Waikiki beach and near the Honolulu Zoo, Kapiolani Park, Waikiki Shell and Waikiki Aquarium. Most upgraded rooms feature views of Diamond Head and/or the ocean and the following FREE amenities: WiFi Internet access throughout the hotel and mini-refrigerator. Additional hotel amenities include meeting and banquet facilities, pool with sun deck and restaurant with panoramic views of Diamond Head and the Pacific Ocean.

name: Hilton Hawaiian Village Waikiki Beach Resort
description: Hilton Hawaiian Village is Waikiki's only true resort destination located on the widest stretch of beach in Waikiki. Do as much or as little as you like on Duke Kahanamoku Beach & Lagoon, the world-famous stretch of pristine white sands and azure waters fronting the Hilton Hawaiian Village Waikiki Beach Resort. Unwind beside five sparkling pools, which include a 10,000-square-foot Super Pool and the multi-layered Paradise Pool, featuring dramatic waterfalls and one of the only water slides in Waikiki. In this inspiring setting, we provide our guests with a destination to find reflection, renewal and indulge in new experiences unique to Hawaii and Waikiki.
amenities: Photo Copier / Fax In Business Center

name: Hilton Garden Inn Waikiki Beach, Honolulu
description: The brand-new Hilton Garden Inn Waikiki Beach puts you within minutes of Waikiki Beach and the many exciting attractions in Oahu, Hawaii. Walk to the beach and experience surfing, SUP boarding, and may other fun activities. 623 guestrooms and suites are available including both king and double queen guestrooms. These well designed rooms include a mini-refrigerator, microwave, 46" HDTV with premium cable, and complimentary WiFi internet access. Some rooms feature a view of the city or beach. Most rooms have a balcony with seating where you can enjoy the beautiful Hawaiian cityscape.

name: Airport Honolulu Hotel
description: The Airport Honolulu Hotel located is located 2 miles from Honolulu International Airport. Complimentary 24 hour airport shuttle service is available to and from the Airport. All rooms have a microwave and a refrigerator. Nearest hotel Hickam AFB, Pearl Harbor Naval Station and Fort Shafter. Property located 4 miles to cruise ship departures and 8 miles from Waikiki. Aloha Stadium is two miles away. Waipio Sports Complex is 15 minutes away. Willoughby's Restaurant open daily for dinner.

name: 'Alohilani Resort Waikiki Beach
description: The newly transformed ‘Alohilani Resort Waikiki Beach is a cosmopolitan jewel offering unparalleled amenities from world-class dining by Iron Chef Morimoto to a see-and-be-seen saltwater infinity pool and captivating 280,000 gallon Oceanarium.

name: Halekulani Hotel
description: Halekulani has been hosting visitors to Waikiki Beach for over 100 years. Today its reputation for gracious hospitality, impeccable service and magnificent cuisine is unequaled on Oahu and renowned, throughout the world.

name: Sheraton Waikiki
description: Sheraton Waikiki offers a prime location on the shores of Waikiki Beach with spectacular views of Diamond Head crater. After exploring Hawaii's top attractions, guests can unwind in beautifully-designed outdoor pools, and a modern fitness center, or dine in one of the resort's unique restaurants with globally-inspired cuisine. The resort also features 16 contemporary meeting rooms with state-of-the-art audiovisual technology, making it an ideal destination for event-planning purposes.

name: Hyatt Regency Aurora - Denver Conference Center
description: Conveniently located in the heart of metropolitan Denver, Hyatt Regency Aurora-Denver Conference Center features 249 guestrooms and suites, as well as more than 30,000 square feet of flexible conference center and event venue space. We also feature amazing hotel amenities such as an oversized fitness center with state-of-the-art equipment, outdoor swimming pool, and full-service restaurant with lounge and outdoor patio. As an approved conference center with the International Association of Conference Centers, we provide next-level experiences for meetings and social gatherings. This accreditation proves that we adhere to the highest standards for service, so you can rest assured your meeting will surely impress.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Denver-Aurora
description:
Step into the inviting ambiance of the DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Denver-Aurora and receive our signature freshly baked chocolate chip cookie as our welcome gift to you. Conveniently located between Denver's major highway systems of I-25 and I-70, the hotel is just twenty minutes from Denver International Airport and ten minutes from the Denver Tech Center. Take our complimentary shuttle to and from the airport.

Make yourself comfortable in a contemporary guest room with high-speed internet access, a well-lit, over-sized work desk, LCD TV with HD channels, and complimentary newspapers Monday-Friday. Choose a deluxe room for the added convenience of a larger room with a refrigerator and microwave.

The Doubletree by Hilton Denver Aurora offers 14,000 sq. ft. of versatile event space including ballrooms, boardrooms and a 100-seat amphitheater. Depend on the expertise of our friendly staff to customize the event to your needs.

name: Fairfield Inn & Suites Denver Aurora/Parker
description: Fairfield Inn & Suites Denver Aurora/Parker is minutes from Buckley Air Force Base, Denver Tech Center, Parker Adventist Hospital, Aurora Soccer Sports Fields, Aurora Reservoir, Aurora County Fairgrounds as well as Mile High Racing & Entertainment, If you haven't visited an outdoor lifestyle center mall yet, you're in for a great time! The Southlands Mall begins at our front doors and stretches another full mile with streets, stores and plenty of parking. The beauty of our Mall is convenience: drive up and park by the store where you want to shop! With both indoor/outdoor spaces to enjoy, you'll find the entire pleasures the mall offers: fashion, dining and entertainment. We offer five room styles, all smoke-free with a refrigerator, microwave and free wired and wireless high speed Internet access. Whether you're looking for a basic hotel room or one of our sweet suite options, you'll always have a clean and fresh room at Fairfield Inn & Suites Denver Aurora/Parker.

name: Hyatt House Denver Aurora
description: Relax beneath the majestic mountains surrounding our residentially-inspired hotel in suburban Aurora. Located just eight miles from downtown Denver, Hyatt House Denver/Aurora offers a relaxed home base for explorers looking to tackle a hiking trail or discover Denver’s vibrant dining scene. Take in the beauty of the area and enjoy our convenient location steps away from Children’s Hospital.
amenities: Free Wifi in the Business Center

name: Gaylord Rockies Resort & Convention Center
description: With a convenient location on the edge of the Front Range, Gaylord Rockies Resort & Convention Center offers a welcome reprieve from the usual. The hotel showcases Aurora, Colorado's alpine charm through every detail of the property. Your stay begins virtually the moment you land thanks to the unparalleled location just 8.5 miles from Denver International Airport. When you need a moment to unwind, appreciate the tranquility in the contemporary, rustic-inspired rooms and suites with plush bedding, and mini-refrigerators. Dine formally or casually at one of eight restaurants serving everything from premium steaks to seasonal Italian cuisine to ensure everyone finds something to please their palate. Indulge in self-care at Relâche Spa and enjoy the outdoor water complex with a seasonal lazy river. Find the perfect home for your work conference or wedding reception in one of the 69 event rooms. Transform your Aurora stay into a one-of-a-kind vacation at Gaylord Rockies Resort & Convention Center.

name: Mon Chalet
description: For couples seeking a walk on the wild side, or a romantic, private evening away from everything, Mon Chalet is the adult lifestyle resort where fantasies really do come true. We offer a wide variety of rooms with amenities to accommodate, not only your wildest desires, but also, your budget.

name: Extended Stay America Denver - Aurora North
description: Free grab-and-go breakfast: Jumpstart your day with a free grab-and-go breakfast that includes a variety of breakfast bars and muffins, hot cereal, coffee, and tea.

name: Select Suites Denver - Aurora
description: WoodSpring Suites Denver Aurora is a new kind of extend-stay hotel. Our hotels are comfortable, our rooms are well-priced, and our customer service makes every guest feel welcome. If you need a hotel for a few nights, a week, or longer - you'll save more money the longer you stay with us. Free wi-fi and access to guest laundry and vending help you relax while away from home. WoodSpring Suites. It's Simple. Done Better. Pet-friendly. Limited front desk hours - use a courtesy phone in the lobby or guest room for 24/7 guest support (including check-in) from our friendly staff.

address_obj.address_string: 575 Billings St Select Suites Denver - Aurora, Aurora, CO 80011-6848

name: Extended Stay America Select Suites Denver - Aurora South
description: When you stay at an Extended Stay America hotel, you'll enjoy just the right amenities to make you feel at home. All our spacious suites feature amenities like fully equipped kitchens, free wi-fi and plenty of space to work, dine and relax. We also offer on-site guest laundry and pet-friendly rooms. Here at Extended Stay America, genuine care is who we are.

name: La Quinta Inn & Suites by Wyndham Denver Aurora Medical
description: La Quinta Inn & Suites Aurora Medical Center is centrally located off Mississippi Avenue and I-225, and close to I-70 and I-25. Guests are within walking distance of the Aurora Medical Center, and ideally situated near the light rail. During your stay you’ll enjoy free parking, FREE WiFi, a seasonal outdoor pool, fitness room and the delicious FREE hot Bright Side Breakfast®. Pets are welcome at this Aurora hotel, and everyone will appreciate a 100-percent nonsmoking atmosphere. Newly remodeled, this freshly redone hotel features beautiful colors and top-notch finishes. Enjoy spacious common areas and rooms that are a welcome retreat. There are 4 floors and 126 rooms, and you’ll be located just 25 minutes from Denver International Airport. Plus, enjoy excellent amenities while staying at the modernized La Quinta Inn & Suites Aurora Medical Center.

name: Sheraton Park Hotel at the Anaheim Resort
amenities: Free Wifi in the Business Center

name: Hilton Anaheim
description: Enjoy a satisfying California experience at Hilton Anaheim, located in the heart of Orange County, adjacent to the Anaheim Convention Center and across the street from the Disneyland® Resort. This upscale hotel offers Mix Restaurant & Lounge, a Starbucks, a recently renovated outdoor pool with two whirlpool tubs and the new addition of the Kids Splash Zone! The Health Club at Hilton Anaheim (daily fee applies) offers all the amenities of a private health club, including spa treatments, Precor equipment and a tranquil indoor pool. Enjoy Disneyland® Resort benefits at this Anaheim family hotel by paying a visit to the Disney® Desk where expert cast members will offer advice and queue-jump tickets to the world-class attraction right across the street. Experience the magic of Disneyland® Resort from a special Disney® View room, providing great views of the fireworks display and the resort. All guest rooms and suites feature modern comforting amenities and contemporary styling.

name: The Anaheim Hotel
description: This unique resort-style hotel offers the following features: LOCATION: Directly across the main entrance to Disneyland(R). Adjacent to Anaheim Garden Walk. Two blocks from the Anaheim Convention Center. Two-story apartment-style buildings on nine acres of landscaped gardens and walkways. ROOMS: Large rooms, some with patio or balcony. FAMILY SUITES: Two connecting rooms for families. WI-FI: Complimentary internet for guests. FOOD & BEVERAGE: Affordable Restaurant, Lounge and Room Service with with breakfast (6:00am – 11:00am), lunch (11:00am - 5:00pm), dinner (5:00pm - 11:00pm) and late-night offerings (until 1:00am). PARKING: Ample parking all around the hotel. POOL: Largest outdoor swimming pool in Anaheim and hot tub. RECREATIONAL AREA: Green outdoor space with corn hole toss and complimentary oversized connect four games to enjoy. FITNESS ROOM: On site gym with machines and free weights. MEETING ROOMS: Over 11,000 sq. feet of flexible indoor and outdoor meeting space. VALUE: Unbeatable value for a friendly, full-service, 3-Diamond hotel in Anaheim!
