name: Howard Johnson by Wyndham Anaheim Hotel and Water Playground
description: Just an 8-minute walk from Disneyland Park, this non-smoking family resort hotel features Castaway Cove - A Watery Pirate Playground! With slides, drench bucket, water canons, jacuzzi, toddler's wading pool and more, Castaway Cove is a great place for your whole family to play together! Also nestled within the lush, park-like grounds is the family friendly Garden Pool! We have completed top-to-bottom renovation of more than 200 guest rooms and our New Garden Pool. With Netflix streaming, microwaves, fridges and free internet- HoJo Anaheim is the perfect choice for your family adventure!

name: The Westin Anaheim Resort
description: The Westin Anaheim Resort is a AAA Four-Diamond hotel, located across from Disneyland® Resort in Anaheim, California. The hotel offers beautifully designed accommodations and diverse dining options and is situated amid celebrated Southern California attractions. Guests can also enjoy dynamic event spaces, an outdoor pool, and a fitness studio with Peloton bikes.

name: Hyatt House at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center
description: Our Hyatt House(R) at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center hotel is located one block from the Disneyland(R) Resort and 1/2 block from the Anaheim Convention Center, in the heart of the Anaheim Resort. Whether you are visiting for pleasure or business, our modern lifestyle hotel will be the ideal location for vacationers and conventioneers alike and central to all that Southern California has to offer. Hyatt House at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center offers spacious studios and one bedroom suites with kitchens with a contemporary décor and stylish furnishings, including plush Hyatt Grand Bed(R) and state of the art media and work centers. You'll love the flat panel HDTV with cable channels, sofa, free WiFi everywhere and remote printing. Re-energize after a busy day in the 24-hour fitness center or gather the family or meet with friends outside at the Pool Patio complete with BBQ or indoors in the H Bar. Start your morning with a complimentary full breakfast buffet. Our Hyatt House at Anaheim Resort/Convention Center hotel offers easy access to the Disneyland(R) Resort Parks just across the street. Other nearby must see attractions and must see spots such as Knott's Berry Farm, Hollywood/Universal Studios, Sea World San Diego, San Diego Zoo, Catalina Island, Famous restaurants, AMC and Ultra movie theaters, local beaches such as Newport, Huntington and Laguna are all just a short distance away.

name: Anaheim Marriott
description: Anaheim Marriott combines highly-appointed accommodations and superior service to rank among the best hotels in Anaheim, California. An ideal choice for a family trip, discover dream vacations made easy from one of the top 4-star hotels near Downtown Disney and Disneyland Resort. Our guest rooms and suites feature contemporary decor and upscale amenities. Unique among Anaheim hotels, experience nFuse, a stylish bar and restaurant offering fresh California cuisine, handcrafted cocktails, and an impressive wine list. For a quick lunch or snack, visit our on-site Marketplace or Starbucks. After a day of sightseeing or meetings, enjoy a workout in our state-of-the-art fitness center, soak up the sun at our resort-style pool, enjoy a snack on our dining deck or cozy up by the fire pit. Plan seamless business trips to our hotel near the Anaheim Convention Center. With over 100,000 square feet of event space, our hotel in Anaheim is perfect for conferences, weddings and banquets.

name: Ayres Hotel Anaheim
description: Welcome to the Ayres Hotel Anaheim! You’ll find all of the 133 luxurious guest rooms Every morning you will start your day right with our complimentary full American breakfast buffet. We welcome travelers to all of the exciting business, recreational, and entertainment attractions Southern California has to offer. Across the street is the Honda Center that plays hosts to numerous sporting and entertainment events including Anaheim Duck ice hockey and popular music artist concerts. For baseball fans, catch an Anaheim Angeles of Los Angeles game at the Angels Stadium, literally steps away. Guests can catch the Anaheim Resort Transit system to the Anaheim Convention Center, Disneyland Resort, Disney California Adventure, or for shops, restaurants, and bars the Downtown Disney District or Anaheim Garden Walk. The Ayres Hotel Anaheim is perfect for your family vacation, date night, or for the girls or guys night out on the town!

name: Kings Inn Anaheim
description: For a truly unique experience, Kings Inn Anaheim is the perfect choice for your stay in Anaheim, CA. Our family-owned and family-friendly hotel is conveniently located just a few blocks away from the Disneyland® Resort and the Anaheim Convention Center. There are also plenty of exciting places to shop and dine at the Anaheim Garden Walk, only steps away from the hotel. Enjoy an exciting Angel’s game at the Angel Stadium or a sensational concert at the Honda Center just a few minutes away. All rooms are nonsmoking, newly remodeled, and packed with the comforts travelers look for today. Parking is $10.00 per car per night, and WiFi is FREE for guests. While you stay, relax and refresh in our sparkling outdoor pool and spa. Kings Inn Anaheim is committed to providing comfortable accommodations, exceptional service, and optimal affordability to our valued guests.

name: Anaheim Majestic Garden Hotel
description: Located just around the corner from Disneyland® Resort, the Anaheim Majestic Garden Hotel is named for the gardens that grace the 13-acre property, Anaheim Majestic Garden Hotel is an experience that’s as magical as the main attraction just down the street. Its 489 rooms are extra large (and even larger in the suites), the Dream Machine shuttle to and from Disneyland® Resort is free and there’s a Disney Desk where you can buy Disneyland® Resort Tickets. And when it’s time to unwind, there’s an outdoor pool & Jacuzzi, garden courtyards, a koi pond, and a family fun center. Plus the hotel's very own Princess Corinne delights kids and adults with story time, breakfast visits, and, with advance reservations, tuck-in/wake up experiences. The Garden Court Bistro is a great place to enjoy breakfast or dinner. Plus, the all new Hanagi Restaurant offers authentic Japanese temptations for the whole family to enjoy. Poolside dining is available in the summer and the California Deli & Store offers grab and go sandwiches and sushi. In addition to a great family escape, the Anaheim Majestic Garden Hotel provides a diverse array of meeting space, catering selections and pre- and post-meeting adventure. Featuring over 20,000 square feet of flexible meeting space, the hotel offers fifteen meeting rooms ranging in size with beautiful natural lighting and state-of-the-art AV capabilities. Outdoor space with picturesque gardens set Anaheim Majestic Garden Hotel apart from the standard meeting hotel.

name: Don Laughlin's Riverside Resort
description: Don Laughlin's Riverside Resort Hotel & Casino is located along the banks of the beautiful Colorado River. Don's Classic Car Museum is a cultural highlight, and just one of the many amenities waiting to be experienced.

name: Raincross Hotel Riverside
description: Raincross Hotel Riverside is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Riverside, offering a family-friendly environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay. Given the close proximity to Evergreen Memorial Park and Mausoleum (0.6 mi), guests of Raincross Hotel Riverside can easily experience one of Riverside's most popular landmarks. Guest rooms offer amenities such as a flat screen TV and air conditioning, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the hotel. The property also features a pool and free breakfast to make your visit even more pleasant. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to free parking. During your visit, be sure to check out one of Riverside's popular oyster restaurants such as Market Broiler and Cafe Sevilla, all a short distance from Raincross Hotel Riverside. If you are interested in exploring Riverside, check out some of the nearby attractions, such as Mount Rubidoux Park (0.9 mi), Fairmount Park (0.9 mi), and Mission Inn Museum (0.3 mi), all of which are within walking distance of Raincross Hotel Riverside. Enjoy your stay in Riverside!

name: Hyatt Place Riverside/Downtown
description: Located in the heart of Riverside Downtown, the Hyatt Place Riverside Downtown is a newly built 5 story hotel with 125 guest rooms. The hotel is located walking distance to the Riverside Convention Center, historical Mission Inn Hotel and Spa and adjacent from the historical Fox Performing Arts Center. A short walk from the hotel is the home of the Downtown Pedestrian Main Street Mall; enjoy a walk down the tree-lined courtyard as it comes to life with its unique eateries, museums and boutiques.Hyatt Place Riverside Downtown is ideal for guests traveling for business! Located only a short distance to such major companies as: PepsiCo, Kaiser Permanente, Anheuser-Busch, General Electric, Home Depot, Bank of America and Wells Fargo to name a few. Hyatt Place Riverside Downtown is located only 0.7 Miles from The Riverside County Superior Courthouse. Riverside is the Division 2 home to The Court of Appeals for the Fourth Appellate District. In addition, Hyatt Place Riverside Downtown is conveniently located just 10 miles north of March Air Reserve Base and less than 2 miles away from University of California Riverside.For the sports enthusiast, the Hyatt Place Riverside Downtown is centrally located between the Big League Field of Dreams in Mira Loma and the Blast Soccer Complex in San Bernardino.

name: Marriott Riverside at the Convention Center
description: Discover home on the California trail at the full service Marriott Riverside hotel located in the heart of historic downtown Riverside nestled in the Inland Empire. The hotel is located adjacent to the newly renovated Riverside Convention Center, and 15 miles from Ontario International Airport. The hotel features 292 luxurious accommodations including 25 spacious suites ideal for the business and leisure travelers. The hotel is within walking distance to the Fox Performing Arts Center, the historic Mission Inn, the Riverside Pedestrian Main Street Mall, and 2 miles from the University of California Riverside. The hotel is also a mile from the Riverside County Superior Courthouse, major corporations, and 10 miles from March Air Force Reserve Base. The hotel offers a business center, a dedicated Concierge lounge with breakfast & evening Hors d'oeuvres, and 14,000 sq. feet of meeting space with 2 ballrooms. The hotel is just minutes from Mt. Rubidoux and 30 minutes to the Temecula wineries.

name: Courtyard by Marriott Riverside UCR/Moreno Valley Area
Hampton Inn Riverside Downtown
description: Welcome to Hampton Inn Riverside Downtown. Our brand new, 6-story hotel offers an ideal location in heart of the historic Downtown District, surrounded by the best amenities the Inland Southern California region has to offer. Enjoy close proximity to the Riverside Convention Center, Fox Performing Arts Center, and the Riverside Pedestrian Main Street Mall. We're also just two miles from the University of California Riverside and 15 miles from Ontario International Airport. Make yourself at home in a modern guest room or suite. Each room features our clean and fresh Hampton bed®, an HDTV and free WiFi. Our suites offer extra space to relax, as well as homelike amenities including a sofa, mini-fridge and microwave. Wake up each morning to fresh waffles at Hampton's free hot breakfast. If you're in a hurry, grab a Hampton on the Run® Breakfast Bag, available Monday through Friday, as you head out the door.

name: The Mission Inn Hotel & Spa
description: Framed by its breathtaking Spanish Mission-style architecture, The Mission Inn Hotel & Spa welcomes you to a destination where rich history and classic elegance exist in perfect balance with contemporary luxury and comfort. Occupying an entire city block in downtown Riverside, California - just moments from the Riverside Convention Center - this iconic, AAA 4-Diamond hotel has remained faithful to the grand style and ambiance enjoyed by its very first guests in 1876. It is a place where magnificent vistas harbor countless, intimate, hidden treasures. And it's also where the outside world is left behind to set a vivid stage for memories that will last a lifetime.

ranking_data.ranking_string: #5 of 8 Specialty lodging in Big Sur

name: Motel 6 UCR Riverside
description:
See why so many travelers make Motel 6 UC Riverside their motel of choice when visiting Riverside. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a budget friendly setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.
Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Mission Inn Museum (2.0 mi) and Evergreen Memorial Park and Mausoleum (2.8 mi), guests of Motel 6 UC Riverside can easily experience some of Riverside's most well known attractions.
Rooms at Motel 6 UC Riverside offer a refrigerator and air conditioning providing exceptional comfort and convenience, and guests can go online with free wifi.
A 24 hour front desk, room service, and express check-in and check-out are some of the conveniences offered at this motel. An on-site restaurant will also help to make your stay even more special. If you are driving to Motel 6 UC Riverside, free parking is available.
If you like diners, Motel 6 UC Riverside is conveniently located near Mr T's Family Restaurant.
Best of all, Motel 6 UC Riverside makes it easy to experience some great Riverside attractions like March Field Air Museum, which is a popular military museum.
At Motel 6 UC Riverside, your comfort and satisfaction come first, and they look forward to welcoming you to Riverside.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Riverside/Corona East
description: Welcome to the Hampton Inn and Suites Riverside The Hampton Inn and Suites Riverside/Riverwalk hotel offers both business and leisure travelers the best value for dollar spent lodging choice in the Riverside-Corona-Greater Los Angeles area. Located in Riverside, CA just off CA-19-Riverside Freeway in Riverside County, we are conveniently located near the cities of Riverside, Corona, and Moreno Valley. Ontario International Airport-ONT is just 21 miles away and 60 miles from Los Angeles International Airport-LAX. Our reasonable proximity to Los Angeles* business, culture, excitement and pulse offers travelers convenience yet reprieve from the congestion.

name: Drury Plaza Hotel Pittsburgh Downtown
description: Travel Happy® with Drury Hotels. You have enough to worry about while you're traveling. Let us take a few things off your plate, so you can focus on the good stuff. Breakfast, Wi-Fi, dinnertime snacks, soft drinks, popcorn, business center, workout facilities and more - we've got you covered! A microwave and refrigerator can be found in all rooms. Drury Hotels is 100 percent family-owned and operated. At every one of our 150+ locations, you'll consistently experience rooms with crisp sheets, fine linens and cozy surroundings to ensure a good night's sleep.

name: Wyndham Grand Pittsburgh Downtown
description: Discover the 90 distinct neighborhoods of Pittsburgh Pennsylvania when you stay at the centrally located Wyndham Grand Pittsburgh Downtown. Where soaring skyscrapers and Pittsburgh's famous three rivers meet, we are an upscale hotel experience with the best location in the city. Enjoy a classic Pittsburgh dining experience in our 3 Rivers Restaurant, featuring a delicious breakfast, lunch, and dinner menu complete with many of Pittsburgh's favorite tastes. And with 35 event rooms and over 60,000 square feet of prime event space, the Wyndham Grand Pittsburgh is recognized as one of Pittsburgh's most sought-after destinations for special events.

address_obj.address_string: 600 Commonwealth Pl Gateway Ctr, Pittsburgh, PA 15222-1003

name: The Westin Pittsburgh
description: Considered an urban icon, The Westin Pittsburgh is located in the Steel City of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. This light-filled and welcoming hotel provides delicious coffee from Starbucks, WestinWORKOUT Fitness Studio, and American classic fare served at Bill's Bar and Burger. Just minutes away from Heinz Field, PNC Park, and Market Square, as well as walking distance to downtown delectable restaurants.

name: Fairmont Pittsburgh
description: Located in the heart of downtown Pittsburgh, Fairmont Pittsburgh is within walking distance to the city’s thriving Cultural District, Market Square, eclectic shopping and world-class sporting venues. The Four Diamond, 185-room property is LEED certified at the Gold level.

name: Renaissance Pittsburgh Hotel
description: When you are looking for your luxury hotel in Downtown Pittsburgh, the Renaissance Pittsburgh Hotel is your ideal location. Located in the historic Fulton Building, this iconic luxury hotel delivers contemporary style in an exceptional atmosphere.

name: Cambria Hotel Pittsburgh - Downtown
description: It doesn’t matter if you stay with us once a year or once a month—at the Cambria Hotel Pittsburgh - Downtown, you‘re always a VIP. The vibe here is upscale but never uptight - and our modern, stylish rooms make you feel like you’ve been upgraded. We feel pretty strongly that we have an experience just for you—and maybe even a surprise or two along the way. What’s different about Cambria Hotel Pittsburgh - Downtown? Just about everything! Our hotel provides you with personalized service, all the amenities you need, and a dash of fun to make every trip enjoyable. There’s an option for everyone at our Social Circle™ bistro, perfect for a simple-yet-interesting bite. And with service that’s always attentive and never stuffy, you’ll get the extra-special treatment you deserve, every time you stay. • Modern, spacious, stylish suites • Full bar and onsite bistro dining at Social Circle • Workouts on-the-go at our Custom Fit fitness center • Convenient onsite gift & sundry shop • Attached parking deck with easy access to events at the CONSOL Energy Center • Free high-speed internet—accessible everywhere.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Pittsburgh - Green Tree
description:
The DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Pittsburgh - Green Tree, awaits you with our signature DoubleTree chocolate chip cookies and a warm welcome. This South Pittsburgh hotel is located 10 minutes from downtown Pittsburgh and offers complimentary hotel shuttle to Pittsburgh International Airport which is 15 minutes away. With easy access to both downtown and the airport, DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Pittsburgh - Green Tree makes a central location near Golden Triangle corporations such as Heinz, Alcoa and the David L. Lawrence Convention Center. 

Our guest rooms feature comfortable desk with ergonomic chair and high-speed internet access in all rooms and wireless access in the lobby for your convenience. Relax in our indoor pool and get a good workout in our fitness center. Dine at River Restaurant offering contemporary American classic cuisines.

name: Kimpton Hotel Monaco Pittsburgh
description: Monaco Pittsburgh stands above the urban landscape as the city's design innovator. Dramatic, playfully unafraid interior spaces lure in the curious and entertain the observer. Bold design cues make guests feel as though they have stepped into a world-traveler's grand Pittsburgh home, full of collected treasures from along the way. Monaco Pittsburgh features 247 guest rooms, including 13 lavish suites. We offer 7 different meeting rooms totaling 8,500 square feet of space perfect for both traditional and non-conventional meetings and events. There's no better place to host your event than Pittsburgh's newest and only luxury boutique hotel.

name: Omni William Penn Hotel
description: Located in the heart of downtown Pittsburgh, PA, Omni William Penn Hotel is a sophisticated, historic retreat that is the home of the Pittsburgh Steelers. The hotel is near Union Station train station (0.4 miles), PNC Park (1 mile), Heinz Field (1.4 miles), and University of Pittsburgh (2.9 miles). Since opening its doors in 1916, our Pennsylvania hotel has played a starring role in the city of Pittsburgh, hosting movie stars, politicians, heads of state and leaders of business. At Omni William Penn Hotel, you will experience outstanding service, comfortable and spacious accommodations, event venues and award-winning cuisine. Hotel Details: Features include an elegant restaurant, vibrant tea room, and luxurious two-tier Grand Ballroom. There are also two bars, a coffee shop, and deli plus expansive conference facilities. Plush rooms and suites include perks like city views, kitchenettes, and flat-screen TVs.
amenities: Photo Copier / Fax In Business Center

name: Wyndham Pittsburgh University Center
description: With an enviable location in the heart of Pittsburgh's Oakland neighborhood and just steps from Carnegie Mellon and several world-renowned UPMC hospitals, the Wyndham Pittsburgh University Center hotel exemplifies the best among Pittsburgh hotels. Travelers looking for a hotel in the center of Pittsburgh's medical and educational district and walking distance to University of Pittsburgh will find this non-smoking hotel ideal, and leisure travelers will delight in the myriad of sporting events, shopping, dining and renowned attractions offered in the Pittsburgh area and within easy reach of this hotel. After a long day of travel, guests can unwind with a relaxing dip in the heated indoor pool. Bridges Restaurant and Lounge offers upscale yet casual dining and affords guests the opportunity to enjoy breakfast, lunch and dinner without needing to leave the hotel. A fully equipped fitness center is available for those who like to stay active or enjoy relieving the stress of a long day of conducting business. Guests enjoy the convenience of ample parking, available for a nominal daily fee, or may choose to leave the driving to the hotel by taking advantage of the complimentary shuttle service offered within a three-mile radius of this Pittsburgh University Center hotel. Each of the 251 well-appointed guest rooms includes thoughtful amenities like plush bedding, an ergonomic work station, and free Wi-Fi Internet. Guests upgrading to an Executive Level room enjoy a private, key-access floor, plush bathrobe and access to the private club lounge. This Pittsburgh hotel features seven newly renovated meeting rooms totaling 7,333 square feet of meeting space. The event rooms range from a 400-square foot event room that comfortably seats 25 people to a 3,500 square foot ballroom that accommodates up to 600 people for a reception, 250 people for a banquet, or 30 8X10 feet exhibit booths.

name: Marriott Anchorage Downtown
description: Perfectly positioned to accommodate international travel, Marriott Anchorage Downtown boasts an enviable location in downtown Anchorage, just five miles from Ted Stevens Anchorage International Airport. Our spacious rooms offer everything you need for a relaxing stay in Alaska. Picturesque city and mountain views will greet you when you rise. Begin your morning with a freshly brewed cup of coffee and a buffet breakfast at our Cafe Promenade. Our hotel offers several amenities like a fitness center and an indoor pool. Join us at Marriott Anchorage Downtown for a successful stay in Alaska.

name: The Lakefront Anchorage
description: Set on the shore of Lake Spenard next to Lake Hood, The Lakefront Anchorage is the only hotel in Anchorage that is located on a lake. Our scenic hotel near Lake Hood has daily flightseeing and fishing pickups from its own dock, from which you can also gaze at floatplanes with the majestic Chugach Mountains behind.

name: Hyatt Place Anchorage Midtown
description: Hyatt Place Anchorage-Midtown provides a welcomed retreat from a busy day at the office or exploring the natural wonders of Alaska. This modern hotel offers all the conveniences to help you get the most out of your stay.

name: Historic Anchorage Hotel
description: Elegantly restored and generously appointed, the Anchorage Hotel is listed on the National Register of Historic Places. Rich in tradition and elegance... Conveniently located in the heart of downtown Anchorage. The Anchorage Visitor Information Center, Anchorage Convention Centers, 5th Avenue Shopping Mall, the Alaska Center for Performing Arts, the Alaska Railroad Depot, Anchorage Museum, and some of the finest dining and entertainment that Anchorage has to offer are all just steps away from the hotel. Aside from our convenient room amenities, Complimentary hot and cold breakfast, Anchorage Historic Hotel offers guest services to accommodate everyone from the discerning leisure traveler to the busy corporate guest.

name: Westmark Anchorage
description: Perfectly located in the heart of downtown Anchorage, the Westmark Anchorage Hotel is a perfect blend of sophistication and convenience. Take in the awe-inspiring views of the surrounding Chugach Mountains and Cook Inlet from the private balconies that adjoin every guest room. Check your e-mail on our complimentary high-speed internet station or simply relax in the always popular Solstice Bar & Grill. Adjacent to the Egan Center and Performing Arts Center and blocks away from the 5th Avenue Mall, the Westmark Anchorage is the perfect hotel choice for downtown accessibility. With a restaurant, lounge and over-sized guestrooms, the Westmark Anchorage offers supreme comfort in Alaska's largest city.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Anchorage
description: The Embassy Suites by Hilton Anchorage Alaska hotel is located in midtown Anchorage. This upscale hotel will is one of the most luxurious all suite property in the State of Alaska. The Embassy Suites Anchorage Alaska hotel is close to many corporate offices, including British Petroleum, CH2M Hill and Providence Health Care. The hotel is also within walking distance of numerous restaurants and world class shopping. The Embassy Suites Anchorage Alaska hotel features 169 rooms, either one or two bedroom suites with microwave, refrigerator, coffeemaker, hair dryer, voice mail and high-speed internet access. This Anchorage Alaska hotel features a full-service restaurant, bar and lounge, business center, meeting space with onsite catering, indoor pool, whirlpool and fitness center.  We look forward to welcoming you to our Alaska hotel with Hilton signature service and cleanliness along with Hilton Honors benefits for our loyal guests.

name: Sheraton Anchorage
description: Immerse into the awe-inspiring beauty of Alaska by staying at Sheraton Anchorage Hotel, located in the heart of downtown Anchorage. After a restful night's sleep on our signature beds, wake to spectacular city, Cook Inlet or Chugach Mountain views. Our rooms and suites seamlessly blend intuitive designs with unparalleled comfort and convenience. Stay in touch with high-speed Wi-Fi access, or relax watching your 42" flat-screen TV. Take advantage of our hotel's enviable location. Walk to your conference at Egan Convention Center, or stroll to the Anchorage Museum, both only a 10-minute walk away. After a day of sightseeing or business, enjoy breakfast and fresh seafood at JADE Restaurant, Ptarmigan Lounge, or visit our 24-hour fitness center. With over 25,000 square feet of event space and an ideal downtown location, our hotel is also the perfect backdrop for weddings and corporate events in Alaska.

name: Hyatt House Anchorage
description: Hyatt House Anchorage is ideally nestled in Anchorage’s Midtown district, just south of downtown. Experience vibrant restaurants, bars, and museums, or explore Alaska’s scenic hiking trails. Located just four miles from Ted Stevens Anchorage International Airport, Hyatt House Anchorage offers a free airport shuttle service for your convenience.

name: Hilton Anchorage
description:
Located in the heart of Downtown Anchorage, Alaska the Hilton Anchorage hotel stands out for its convenience and comfort. This Hilton hotel is just a 10 minute drive from Ted Stevens International Airport, one block from the Alaska Railroad Depot and within walking distance of the Anchorage Convention District.

The Hilton Anchorage hotel is also within walking distance of over 100 dining options in and surrounding the downtown area. Our very own Hooper Bay Café is an open-air full-service lobby restaurant featuring the Hilton Breakfast, two private dining areas and a Starbucks Coffee Kiosk.

This Hilton Anchorage hotel is just two blocks from: Ship Creek fishing opportunities, Flight-Seeing Operators and Tour Companies, Alaska Museum of History and Art, The Ulu Factory, Nordstrom and the 5th Avenue Mall.

The Hilton Anchorage hotel has an inviting lobby enriched with an extensive Alaskan art collection, complete with a self-guided walking tour.

name: The Hotel Captain Cook
description: Located in downtown Anchorage Alaska, each of the Hotel Captain Cook’s 546 luxury accommodations offer stunning views of the Cook Inlet or the Chugach Mountains. The Hotel Captain Cook, Preferred Hotels and Resorts, and Historic Hotels 2018 Hotel of Year welcome you to experience excellence.

name: Hilton Stockton
description: A full-service Hilton in Stockton, CA on I-5 in the San Joaquin Valley. We're located four miles from the Stockton Arena, three miles from the Haggin Museum, 15 miles from Lodi Wine Country, and less than one hour from San Francisco or Sacramento, CA. Enjoy complimentary WiFi, in-room mini-refrigerators, HDTVs and large work desks. Choose a standard room, or upgrade to a suite or executive room. Executive rooms include executive lounge access, with continental breakfast, available in our lobby across from the front desk). Dine on-site at the Canal Street Sports Bar or the Orchard Grill (local laws apply, vegan options available). Choose from healthy options, or enjoy delicious "bar food" dishes, if you like. We also have an outdoor pool/whirlpool spa, 24-hour business center, 24-hour fitness room, and an on-site walking track. Our on-site Starbucks® kiosk also serves a variety of bottled juice, smoothies or Tazo® teas.

name: Courtyard by Marriott Stockton
description: The Courtyard Stockton is a modern hotel that offers a perfect blend of style, comfort and convenience. Located in the heart of Stockton, California, this hotel is the ideal destination for travelers looking for a refreshing and rejuvenating experience. The hotel boasts of spacious guest rooms, designed to cater to your every need, with amenities such as plush bedding, ergonomic workspaces and high-speed internet access. Wake up to a delicious breakfast in the hotel's on-site restaurant or grab a quick bite from the 24-hour market. Take a dip in the hotel's indoor pool and stay active in the fitness center. The hotel also offers a convenient location that makes it easy to explore the city's attractions such as the Stockton Arena, Weber Point Event Center and the Stockton Ports Baseball. Whether you're here for a business trip or a family vacation, the Courtyard Stockton is the perfect choice for your next stay.

name: Red Roof Inn Stockton
description: Red Roof Inn Stockton is located only 45 minutes from downtown Sacramento and is highway visible with easy access from I-5. Guests enjoy attending events at the Stockton Event Center, Stockton Civic Auditorium and San Joaquin Delta College. This hotel offers waterfront rooms, seasonal outdoor pool, free Wi-Fi, a free expanded cable package featuring HBO, free hot breakfast, and a microwave and mini-refrigerator in all rooms.

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Stockton
description: The Residence Inn Stockton is an exceptional extended-stay hotel that offers a unique blend of comfort and convenience. Nestled in the heart of Stockton, California, this hotel is the perfect choice for travelers looking for a home-away-from-home experience. The hotel's spacious suites are designed with your comfort in mind, featuring fully-equipped kitchens, separate living areas and plush bedding. Wake up to a complimentary breakfast and start your day with a refreshing workout in the hotel's fitness center. The hotel also offers an outdoor pool and a BBQ area, perfect for those who want to relax and enjoy the beautiful California weather. The hotel's prime location makes it easy to explore the city's attractions such as the Stockton Arena, Weber Point Event Center and the Stockton Ports Baseball. Whether you're here for a business trip or a family vacation, the Residence Inn Stockton is the perfect choice for your next stay.
amenities: Free Wifi in the Business Center

name: Extended Stay America Suites - Stockton - March Lane
description: Free grab-and-go breakfast: Jumpstart your day with a free grab-and-go breakfast that includes a variety of breakfast bars and muffins, hot cereal, coffee, and tea.

name: La Quinta Inn by Wyndham Stockton
description:
Finding an ideal budget friendly motel in Stockton does not have to be difficult. Welcome to La Quinta Inn Stockton, a nice option for travelers like you.
Free wifi is offered to guests, and rooms at Stockton La Quinta offer a flat screen TV.
During your stay, take advantage of some of the amenities offered, including a 24 hour front desk. Guests of La Quinta Inn Stockton Hotel are also welcome to enjoy a pool and free breakfast, located on site. For travelers arriving by car, free parking is available.
While staying at Stockton La Quinta, visitors can check out University of the Pacific (1.7 mi), which is a popular Stockton attraction.
While in Stockton, you may want to check out some of the restaurants that are a short walk away from La Quinta Inn Stockton, including Red Lobster (0.6 mi), Dave Wongs (0.1 mi), and Swagat Indian Cuisine (0.6 mi).
If you’re looking for things to do, you can check out The Haggin Museum, which is a popular art museum amongst tourists.
La Quinta Inn Stockton puts the best of Stockton at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

name: University Plaza Waterfront Hotel
description: Look no further. The elegant University Plaza Waterfront Hotel stands on the water's edge alongside Stockton's beautiful Delta waterway.
amenities: Free Wifi in the Business Center

name: Holiday Inn Express Stockton Southeast, an IHG Hotel
description: The Holiday Inn Express Hotel Stockton delivers exceptional service and a central location in the beautiful San Joaquin Valley. We are just south of Lodi's Fabulous Wine Country and North of Modesto. The Holiday Inn Express Hotel Stockton also provides a central location to the cities of Sacramento & San Francisco, the shores of Santa Cruz, Monterey Bay and the slopes of Lake Tahoe. Our perfect location places you minutes from Big League Field of Dreams, Stockton Ports Baseball, Thunder Hockey, Haggin Museum, not to mention plenty of shopping and entertainment for the entire family. We are just a short drive from Old Town Sacramento. Popular area attractions include Micke Grove Zoo, Lodi Wine Country, Delta Waterways and The Bob Hope Theatre. Business travelers appreciate that we offer a well-equipped business center, complimentary wired and wireless Internet access, so catching up with work is made easy.

name: Stockton Inns
description: Discover why generations of Cape May visitors make Stockton Inns their home at the Jersey Shore. For over 45 years, we have been pampering our guests. Known for our excellence in service, a variety of lodging choices, and beach access just steps away, our Cape May inn and manor home are your ideal vacation destination.

address_obj.address_string: 809 Beach Ave. Beach Ave & Howard St., Cape May, NJ 08204

name: Extended Stay America Stockton - Tracy
description: Free grab-and-go breakfast: Jumpstart your day with a free grab-and-go breakfast that includes a variety of breakfast bars and muffins, hot cereal, coffee, and tea.

name: Hyatt Regency Cincinnati
description: Stay at the newly transformed Hyatt Regency Cincinnati and experience a hotel offering every possible convenience under one roof-including the city's largest hotel ballroom. Set conveniently in the heart of city, connected to the Duke Energy Convention Center and steps from Fountain Square and an array of attractions and entertainment venues, the regal Hyatt Regency Cincinnati reigns supreme amongst downtown Cincinnati hotels.
amenities: Free Wifi in the Business Center

name: Graduate Cincinnati
description: Centrally located just three miles north of downtown, Graduate Cincinnati hotel boasts state-of-the-art facilities, exceptional menus, and the latest in audiovisual equipment.

name: The Westin Cincinnati
description: The Westin Cincinnati is the perfect destination for both leisure and business travel. Overlooking historic Fountain Square and located in the heart of downtown Cincinnati, Ohio, our hotel boasts an outstanding location in the central business district. Each of our 456 guest rooms and suites features the Westin Heavenly bed, 37'' LCD TVs and generous workstations.

name: Hilton Cincinnati Netherland Plaza
description: The historic Hilton Cincinnati Netherland Plaza is a 'must-see' hotel in the heart of downtown Cincinnati.  From rare Brazilian rosewood paneling and two-story ceiling murals to stylish guest rooms and the renowned restaurant, Orchids at Palm Court, experience an unforgettable stay at this AAA Four-Diamond hotel. Shopping at Saks Fifth Avenue, Tiffany & Co. and Macy's are just a skywalk away and the complimentary shuttle to the Horseshoe Casino will make planning evening entertainment convenient and carefree.

name: 21c Museum Hotel Cincinnati
description: Located adjacent to the Center for Contemporary Art and across the street from the Aronoff Center for the Arts, 21c Cincinnati works to foster the ongoing revival of Downtown Cincinnati and strengthen its role as a cultural destination. Working with the Cincinnati Center City Development Corporation (3CDC), 21c renovated the former Metropole Hotel and embraced the architecture of the historic landmark to create an exciting new space for guests to experience genuine hospitality, view cutting edge contemporary art, and enjoy culinary experiences that celebrates the region's sustainable producers. The world has changed over the last several months and here at 21c, we have made some changes too. One thing remains constant. Our top priority is the safety and wellness of our teammates and guests. Our website has everything you need to know to return to travel with 21c. We can't wait to welcome you back to Metropole and 21c Cincinnati!

name: Renaissance Cincinnati Downtown Hotel
description: The Renaissance Cincinnati Downtown Hotel is located in a historic building in downtown Cincinnati, our boutique hotel is just minutes from popular attractions. Our contemporary rooms and suites feature a deluxe bedding, flat-screen TVs, complimentary Wi-Fi and large windows with skyline views. Maintain your gym routine in our spacious 24-hour fitness center. You can also host a special event at our hotel in our historic Burnham Hall, which accommodates up to 700 guests. We look forward to welcoming you to downtown Cincinnati, Ohio.

name: The Summit Hotel- Cincinnati
description: Designed to engage, enlighten and inspire our guests, The Summit Hotel promises a transformative journey from everyday to extraordinary. From thought-provoking works of art to chef-curated dining experiences, we'll spark your sense of creativity and self discovery at every turn.
amenities: Free Wifi in the Business Center
Free Wired Internet in the Business Center

name: Ac Hotel By Marriott Cincinnati At The Banks
description: Located in the heart of downtown Cincinnati, AC Hotel by Marriott Cincinnati at The Banks features a dynamic location for your travels. We combine modern amenities and stylish design for restful nights and rejuvenating mornings. Enjoy views of the historic John A. Roebling Suspension Bridge and the Ohio River from our Upper Deck rooftop bar. A European-style breakfast awaits at AC Kitchen. Socialize over cocktails at our AC Lounge. Business travelers can reserve one of our six event spaces to host meetings and presentations. Experience a new way to connect at AC Hotel by Marriott Cincinnati at The Banks.

name: Residence Inn Cincinnati Downtown/The Phelps
description: At Residence Inn Cincinnati Downtown/The Phelps, experience luxury during your extended stay. Unique among hotels in the area, we feature a rooftop restaurant overlooking Cincinnati. After a delicious meal with gorgeous views, ease into our spacious suites with complimentary Wi-Fi. Our rooms also have fully equipped kitchens and complimentary grocery shopping service for your convenience. After a night of relaxation on our plush bedding, wake up to our complimentary breakfast buffet, then burn some calories at our fitness center. We also provide impressive event spaces for your business or social gathering.

name: Hampton Inn Cincinnati-Eastgate
description: Hampton Inn Cincinnati-Eastgate hotel is located off I-275 Exit 63B at State Route 32 East on the northeast side of Cincinnati, Ohio. We are 18 miles from downtown Cincinnati, Ohio and 28 miles from Greater Cincinnati/Northern KY Airport.

name: Renaissance Toledo Downtown Hotel
description: Renaissance Toledo Downtown Hotel is a distinctive hotel offering the perfect blend of style and comfort. Situated in Toledo, Ohio, along the Maumee River, our hotel is located in the heart of downtown just two blocks from Toledo’s main convention center. Amenities include a restaurant, a rooftop bar, a well-equipped fitness center and pet-friendly rooms.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Toledo/Westgate
description:
Welcome to Hampton Inn & Suites Toledo/Westgate, ideally located just one mile from the University of Toledo's Savage Arena, the Glass Bowl Stadium and Franklin Park Mall. A beautiful Art Deco building full of character and charm, our hotel offers choice, clean accommodation close to a host of local attractions and convenient transport links.

Relax in a spacious, bright guest room or suite at our Toledo/Westgate hotel. Tune in to your favorite shows on the flat-screen TV and connect effortlessly to the WiFi provided from the comfort of your bed. Heat snacks in the microwave and store refreshments in the fridge for later. When you need to finish that presentation, be productive using the ergonomic desk and chair you'll find in your room.

Savor a hot breakfast, that's not only delicious but also free. Pick up a snack or drink from our on-site convenience shop when you're in a rush or in need of an energy boost.

name: Quality Inn
description:
Looking for a place to stay in Toledo? Then look no further than Quality Inn, a budget friendly hotel that brings the best of Toledo to your doorstep.
Guest rooms offer a flat screen TV, and Comfort Hotel makes getting online easy as free wifi is available.
In addition, guests can enjoy a fitness center and free breakfast during their visit. As an added convenience, there is free parking available to guests.
For those interested in checking out Savage Arena (1.9 mi) while visiting Toledo, Comfort Inn Toledo is a short distance away.
Travelers looking to enjoy some shrimp can head to J Alexander's Restaurant, Mancy's Steak House, or Mancy's Italian Grill. Otherwise, you may want to check out an Italian restaurant such as Mancy's Italian Grill, Olive Garden, or BRAVO Cucina Italiana.
Toledo is also known for some great historic sites, including Wildwood Manor House and Woodlawn Cemetery, which are not too far from Quality Inn.
We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Quality Inn as you experience everything Toledo has to offer.

name: Wingate by Wyndham Sylvania/Toledo
description: At the service award winning Wingate by Wyndham Sylvania/Toledo we will go out of our way to make your stay more comfortable and provide service with a smile! Whether you're staying with us for business or pleasure you'll be sure to find what you need. Our new refreshed look completed in 2015 including lobby/common areas/ Meeting facilities and all 74 upgraded over sized guest rooms and Suites will impress our guests. Free high speed wireless or wired Internet access in all guest rooms and public spaces, Free local calls Free hot continental breakfast, Free faxes, copies and printing in the 24-hour business center. All guestrooms feature upgraded Beauty-rest Pillow top mattresses and upgraded high thread count linens and pillows, bathroom amenities, IPod/MP3 compatible clock radios, One cup coffeemakers with Wolf Gang Puck in room coffee/tea service, in-room safes, microwaves, refrigerators, over sized work desks with cordless phones, and cable TV with HBO.

name: Motel 6 Toledo
description: Motel 6 Toledo OH is conveniently located off of I-80/I90. The Toledo Zoo, Huntington Center, Fifth Third Field, and Hollywood Casino are all within 10 miles. We offer Free Wi-Fi in all guest rooms, Micro-fridges in select rooms, and a coin laundry.

name: Hampton Inn Toledo - South / Maumee
description:
The Hampton Inn Toledo-South/Maumee hotel is located in Maumee, Ohio, next to Arrowhead Business Park, on the southwest side of Toledo. Our hotel is accessible from Ohio Interstates I-80/90 at exit 59 and exit 6 off US 23/I-475. Area attractions near our hotel include Imagination Station, Lucas County Recreation Ctr., Fort Meigs, Toledo Museum of Art, Stranahan Theater Complex, Toledo Botanical Gardens, Maumee Theater, Toledo Zoo, University of Toledo, Medical University of Ohio, Bowling Green State University, golf courses, and shopping areas. 

The Hampton Inn Toledo-South/Maumee hotel is a four-story interior corridor property, featuring 125 rooms, a fitness center and indoor pool and whirlpool. Complimentary amenities of our hotel include hot breakfast, served daily, wireless Internet access and fee local calls. Free hot breakfast menu features hot waffles, three hot breakfast items and other numerous cold items.

name: Holiday Inn Express & Suites Toledo West, an IHG Hotel
description:
Enjoy modern amenities at our hotel in Toledo, OhioThe  Holiday Inn Express & Suites Toledo West provides comfortable and modern accommodations with a variety of guest rooms and amenities to suit your preferences. Enjoy a free hot breakfast buffet offered daily near the indoor swimming pool and Fitness Center. Ideally located just  one mile from the University of Toledo and Franklin Park Mall and close to a host of local attractions and fine dining.

Holiday Inn Express & Suites Toledo West  provides fresh, plush beds. Linens and duvets are washed fresh for every guest. You will rest easy on our pillow top mattress with plush comforter and crisp white duvet with comfy pillows.

Guests receive complimentary breakfast served daily, including fresh baked waffles and oatmeal with delicious toppings. Holiday Inn Express & Suites Toledo West also provides free in-room and public area Wi-Fi and business services with fax and printer and photocopy equipment.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Maumee Toledo
description:
Stay a while at our Home2 Suites by Hilton Maumee Toledo hotel, ideally located near excellent attractions. Our hotel combines comfort, convenience and location into a complete lodging experience.
Business travelers can enjoy the vibrant décor as you get to work in our incredible business center. After a day of work, relax at our outdoor patio complete with a grill and fire pit. Every room in our all-suite hotel features a welcoming and comfortable modern décor. Enjoy the extensive amenities each suite has to offer including a work desk, a full kitchen, sofa bed and free WiFi. Prepare all your favorites from the comfort of your room with an induction burner, available from the front desk.
Be the star of multi-tasking at our Spin2 Cycle, where you can run on the treadmill while running a load of wash. After your work out, take a dip in our indoor pool. Forgot something? Stop by the 24-hour Home2Mkt for a snack and any forgotten travel essentials.

name: Courtyard by Marriott Toledo West
description: Whether you are here on business or pleasure, expect modern amenities and services when you reserve accommodations at the brand new state of the art Courtyard, located in the heart of Toledo with easy access to I-75 and I-475 and major city attractions.

name: Sandman Signature Plano-Frisco Hotel
description: Sandman Hotel Group, the Dallas Stars and Texas Stars sister hotel company, is proud to introduce its first hotel in the United States, Sandman Signature Plano – Frisco Hotel, offering easy access to Dr Pepper Arena (home of the Dallas Stars practice facility), Ford Center at the Star (home to the Dallas Cowboys Football Operations), numerous conference centers, and a short drive from Dallas/Fort Worth International Airport (DFW). Each of the 233 beautifully appointed guest rooms at this new Plano-Frisco hotel, including the family, corporate, and executive suites, provides the perfect setting to unwind. Whether visiting Plano for business or pleasure, make sure to experience the elegant, relaxed, comfort of Sandman Signature.

name: Cambria Hotel Plano Frisco
description: The Cambria® Hotel Plano Frisco blends modern style with classic Texas charm. We want you make the most of your visit—whether you’re traveling to Plano for business or vacation. That’s why we offer spacious guest rooms and amenities like a outdoor pool, a local shuttle, a fitness center and more. WiFi is included throughout the hotel. We also have our own full-service bar and restaurant serving locally inspired dishes and craft beers from local brewers. Just a short walk from our hotel, you’ll find The Shops at Legacy, an open-air shopping center featuring upscale retailers and a variety of dining options. Legacy West is also within walking distance. It’s an emerging business and cultural district with shops, restaurants and corporate offices for JP Morgan, Toyota Motor Corporation, Liberty Mutual Insurance and many others. Plus, we offer a complimentary shuttle to nearby businesses, attractions and medical centers in Plano and Frisco. If you want to explore the greater DFW area, it’s easy to drive to Dallas to visit the Sixth Floor Museum, the Dallas Arboretum and Botanical Gardens and other attractions.
amenities: Photo Copier / Fax In Business Center

name: NYLO Dallas Plano Hotel Tapestry Collection by Hilton
description:
NYLO Dallas Plano offers corporate travel with style. Find this boutique hotel in the center of Legacy's business district.

Features:
-Free WiFi
-Pet-friendly rooms and suites
-24-hour fitness center
-Outdoor heated pool
-Free five-mile shuttle
-Twenty minutes from DFW airport

Each guest room offers loft-style decor, custom NYLO beds and bedding, a Keurig coffee maker, and rainfall shower.

LOCL Restaurant & Bar provides a lively on-site hangout with breakfast and dinner service as well as late bar service.

Host weddings, events, and meetings for up to 300 guests in our contemporary indoor and outdoor venues.

Local attractions include Toyota Stadium, Shops at Legacy, and The Star in Frisco sports and entertainment district. See it all with the free five-mile shuttle - available Monday through Friday.

name: La Quinta Inn & Suites by Wyndham Dallas Plano West
description:
Finding an ideal family-friendly hotel in Plano does not have to be difficult. Welcome to La Quinta Inn & Suites Dallas Plano West, a nice option for travelers like you.
While staying at Plano La Quinta, visitors can check out St. Andrew United Methodist Church (1.6 mi) and Prestonwood Baptist Church (3.0 mi), some of Plano's top attractions.
Rooms at Plano La Quinta offer a flat screen TV and air conditioning providing exceptional comfort and convenience, and guests can go online with free wifi.
A 24 hour front desk, a convenience store, and express check-in and check-out are some of the conveniences offered at this hotel. A pool and free breakfast will also help to make your stay even more special. If you are driving to La Quinta Inn & Suites Dallas Plano West, free parking is available.
While staying in Plano, you can get some delicious jambalaya at Kona Grill, which is a short distance from Plano La Quinta.
Plano is also home to ArtCentre of Plano, a popular art museum that is not too far from La Quinta Inn & Suites Dallas Plano West.
La Quinta Inn & Suites Dallas Plano West looks forward to welcoming you on your visit to Plano.

name: Hyatt Place Dallas/Plano
description: Enjoy tech-savvy design, old-fashioned service and innovative amenities at the eco-friendly Hyatt Place Dallas / Plano.

name: Red Roof Inn Plano
description: Red Roof Inn Plano Southeast is located off US-75 just South of Park Blvd. We are less than 5 miles from Plano Centre, shopping and dining. Our amenities include a coin laundry facility, and Free Wi-Fi in all guest rooms. A $25.00 refundable room deposit due at check- in.

description: At the Dallas/Plano Fairfield Inn & Suites by Marriott, we now offer fitness and business centers, The Market, guest laundry and refrigerators/microwaves in every room. description:
Daily Mandatory Charge includes: Texas Recovery Fee

Luxurious guest rooms provide plush bedding, This Works amenities, and internet access.

As always, the Best Western Plus Henderson Hotel will provide you with the superior customer service that you are used to at Best Western® Hotels & Resorts.

Attending to guests with impeccable service, wealth of outstanding amenities, and expansive pools and gardens, Green Valley Ranch has become renowned as one of the top luxury resort hotels in the Las Vegas area. Green Valley Ranch Resort has all that you require from Exquisite Accommodations, the ultimate in relaxation and rejuvenation at The Spa, Award-Winning Dining, Non-Stop Gaming Action, Entertainment for Everyone, Meetings & Events, to our Backyard with incredible scenery, sand-bottom pool and laid-back vibe, not to mention a great selection of drinks.

name: Holiday Inn Express & Suites Henderson, an IHG Hotel
description: Try your luck at our modern hotel near the Las Vegas strip Don't miss a beat when staying at the Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites in Henderson, NV. We are located just eight miles from McCarran International Airport (LAS) and 15 minutes from the Las Vegas Strip! Explore the Hoover Dam, browse Galleria Mall or try your luck at Sunset Station Casino. Other great sites, including the Sam Boyd Stadium, Lake Mead, and the District at Green Valley Ranch are a short drive from our hotel's convenient Henderson, Nevada address. Are you in town for the annual NASCAR, SEMA, or CES events? Our easy access to I-515 places you a short drive to some of Las Vegas' biggest events. When you stay with us, you will find yourself only minutes from University of Nevada - Las Vegas (UNLV), 360 Communications and St. Rose de Lima Hospital. In addition to a great location, we also feature a lot of quality perks.

name: Railroad Pass Hotel and Casino Ramada by Wyndham
description: The Railroad Pass boasts the longest running gaming license in Nevada – Now in our 85th year. We focus on the important stuff – providing a friendly staff and great values. You’ll find good food at great prices; newly remodeled rooms at affordable rates; and exciting gaming action. Whether you’re into the classic spinning reels or the newest movie-themed video slots, you’re sure to find a machine to your liking. Blackjack, Craps, and Roulette are all available for your enjoyment. Nestled in the hills of Henderson on the way to historic Boulder City, the Railroad Pass is just a few minutes from Hoover Dam, the Las Vegas Strip, several world-class golf courses, sky diving, zip lines, kayaking, hiking trials, and just about any adventure you can enjoy. We feature three restaurants in which to relax and enjoy a meal. Our Iron Rail Café offers American favorites 24 hours a day. The Box Car Buffet is perfect for those who have a wide range of tastes, offering over 40 freshly prepared items every day. For those with gourmet tastes, enjoy the finest steaks at our DeSimone's Steakhouse. With only 120 guest rooms, we’re tiny by Vegas standards, but are huge on value.

address_obj.address_string: 1500 Railroad Pass Casino Road, Henderson, NV 89002-9774

name: M Resort Spa Casino
description: Nestled in the quiet city of Henderson at the southern end of the Las Vegas Valley, the Forbes Travel Guide Four-Star and AAA Four-Diamond M Resort Spa Casino captures a unique sense of place with its distinctive desert scape location in one of the world’s most exciting cities. The hotel's luxury boutique experience offers 390 guest rooms and suites including one, two, and three-bedroom loft suites, that balance eclectic sophistication with a sleek modern look. The hotel also offers complimentary valet parking services, laundry, a 24-hour front desk and concierge, resort pool with private cabanas, eight restaurants including a rooftop cocktail lounge with outdoor terrace, 24-hour room service, daily newspaper delivery, turndown services, and extensive banquet spaces.

name: SpringHill Suites by Marriott Las Vegas Henderson
Hampton Inn & Suites Las Vegas South
description:
We are pleased to introduce the Brand New Hampton Inn & Suites Henderson-Saint Rose hotel in Nevada, a hotel that features style, innovation, and the Hampton touch!

Hampton Inn & Suites Henderson-Saint Rose Hotel Features

The Hampton Inn & Suites Henderson-Saint Rose hotel aims to please the busy executive, convention attendee, and leisure Las Vegas traveler with an array of special services: Complimentary On the House Hot Breakfast, Complimentary high-speed wireless Internet throughout the Hampton hotel and guest rooms, Complimentary Executive Business Center, 690 sq. ft. of meeting space, Outdoor heated pool and whirlpool, Access to our fitness facility.

Local Henderson, Nevada Corporations and Universities

name: Sunset Station Hotel & Casino
description: Located on more than 98 acres and 457 rooms in the heart of Henderson, Nevada, Sunset Station Hotel and Casino is conveniently located near Lake Mead, Lake Las Vegas, Galleria Mall, Sam Boyd Stadium, golf courses, recreation areas, and other renowned restaurants and shops. We offer panoramic views of the glittering Las Vegas Valley and high desert mountains. From Sonoma Cellar, one of Las Vegas’ finest steakhouses. To Grand Cafe with gourmet tastes at café prices. To Cabo, one of the best Mexican restaurants in town. To Feast Buffet, voted Las Vegas Best Buffet numerous times by the Las Vegas Review-Journal. To a huge food court with some great options for quick eats. Nobody does dining better than Sunset Station. The Las Vegas Review Journal gave Sunset Station the nod as “Best Slots” and “Best Video Poker”. And that’s just one indication of how fabulous the Las Vegas gaming is here. We have the latest and greatest games in the Valley including thousands of Jumbo Penny and Jumbo Dollar slots, the most 100% payback video poker games, table games, bingo, keno, live poker and a thrilling race and sports book. No place offers you greater gaming value for your dollar or more chances to hit the jackpot. The nights really heat up at Sunset Station. We have some of the best live music and concerts in Las Vegas. Plus some great, intimate lounges and bars. And the most family attractions you’ll find in town. With more than 13,000 square feet of event space, Sunset Station turns any corporate meeting or event, wedding, birthday or special occasion into the most unforgettable experience.

name: Aloft Henderson
description: Tune in and turn it up at Aloft Henderson. We are the next generation of hotel, using technology and design to enhance experiences and move at the pace of our guests. Recharge in one of our urban-inspired loft-style rooms which feature ultra-comfortable platform beds and walk-in showers with rainfall showerheads. Head into W XYZ® bar for signature cocktails and live music from local emerging artists. Our expansive first floor is a no-limits space for dynamic socialization featuring a pool table, regional art, and day-to-night lighting. Vibrant design and a tech-forward approach make this hotel in Henderson one of a kind. Breakfast pods and healthy snacks are available at Re:fuel by Aloft℠, our 24/7 grab-n-go pantry. For your convenience, our hotel offers on-site parking for a daily fee. During your stay in Henderson, easily get the Lion Habitat Ranch, River Mountain Loop Trail, the Clark County Museum, and top attractions 20 minutes away in Las Vegas.

This full-service upscale all-suite hotel is just minutes from the University of Nebraska's Memorial Stadium - home of the Nebraska Cornhuskers, the Nebraska State Capitol, the Nebraska Governor's Mansion, the Bob Devaney Sports Center, the Nebraska State Fairgrounds, Pershing Municipal Auditorium, the Lincoln Children's Museum, the Sheldon Memorial Art Gallery & Sculpture Garden, Folsom Children's Zoo and the Lincoln Municipal Airport. Guests of the Embassy Suites Lincoln hotel stay in spacious two-room suites and receive a complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast, a nightly manager's reception, a fitness center featuring a Peloton® Bike with toe cages, and high-speed Internet access.

Choose from a variety of spacious rooms and suites. Free Wifi throughout the hotel, 24-hour business center and fitness facility, indoor swimming pool and hot tub ensure you have everything you need for a comfortable, successful trip. Book Direct for best rate!

This Lincoln, Nebraska hotel offers spaciously-appointed King Size and Double Queen size rooms, each featuring high-speed wireless Internet access, microwaves, refrigerators and cable satellite television with HBO. Guests will wake each morning to a complimentary coffee & tea. Up to 2 pets are welcome with restrictions for FREE!

description:
Looking for a place to stay in Orlando? Then look no further than Intown Suites Orlando/florida Turnpike, a budget friendly hotel that brings the best of Orlando to your doorstep.
Rooms at Crestwood Suites Disney Orlando provide a flat screen TV, a kitchenette, and a desk, and guests can stay connected with wifi.

Close to some of Orlando's most popular landmarks, such as K1 Speed Orlando (1.4 mi) and I-Drive NASCAR Indoor Kart Racing (2.2 mi), Crestwood Suites Disney Orlando is a great destination for tourists.

The hotel features 4 stories, 122 rooms, fitness room, and outdoor pool. Enjoy Norfolk, Virginia hospitality at our complimentary deluxe continental breakfast with hot items.  Other amenities at this Hampton Inn are local calls, WiFi, and TV with HBO and 18 pay-per-view selections. name: Norfolk Waterside Marriott
description: Surround yourself in our downtown accommodations seamlessly combined with traditional charm at Norfolk Waterside Marriott, a downtown Norfolk hotel set in the heart of the historic district. Located on the picturesque Elizabeth River waterfront, our Norfolk, Virginia hotel combines stunning river views with marble accents, classic wood styling and eclectic artwork. From its convenient connection to the Waterside Convention Center to the nearby Nauticus, Norfolk Naval Station or the Virginia Zoo, our location is ideal for business or leisure guests. Stay active at our premier Norfolk, VA hotel fitness center complete with personal TVs, or relax after sightseeing at Capo Capo, serving renowned cuisine within this hotel in Norfolk, VA. Plan outdoor gatherings on our sixth-floor Riverview Terrace or execute grand galas in over 68,000 sq ft of premier Norfolk event space. For unrivaled lodging on the vibrant waterfront, look no further than Norfolk Waterside Marriott.

description: Hilton Norfolk The Main is conveniently located at the intersection of Granby and Main in downtown Norfolk, Virginia. Our new hotel puts you within walking distance of many of Norfolk's attractions, dining and nightlife. Book a river view room and take in the beautiful views of the Elizabeth River. Take a dip in our indoor pool, or grab a workout in our onsite fitness center. During your stay, enjoy dinner or drinks at one of our three delicious new onsite dining options, Grain, VARIA and Saltine. Try your hand at a game of pool at our roof garden and lounge on the fifth floor, Grain. Enjoy fresh seafood and craft beers at Saltine. Or a delicious Italian meal at VARIA. In addition, extensive, high-tech meeting space makes The Main a perfect choice for small and large corporate events, weddings, conferences and more.

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Norfolk Downtown

The Homewood Suites Virginia Beach, Virginia hotel offers 122 suites including your choice of Studio Suites or One and Two Bedroom Suites. description: With inspiring views of downtown Norfolk, Virginia and the Elizabeth River, the Sheraton Norfolk Waterside Hotel boasts an eclectic restaurant, well-appointed rooms and 17 impressive event venues. Enjoy the convenience of room service along with the luxury of a sleeping experience featuring pillowtop mattresses, soft duvets and hypo-allergenic pillows. Whether you're staying in Norfolk for work or leisure, know that Sheraton Norfolk Waterside Hotel will treat you right.

name: Graduate Madison
description: Graduate Madison is just a block from campus, ideally set alongside Lake Mendota on historic Langdon Street and around the way from Memorial Union Terrace. We are nestled between the bustling shops and stops on State Street and majestic Capitol Square

name: Wisconsin Union Hotel
description: The Wisconsin Union Hotel at Union South (UW-Madison) offers a warm, inviting oasis of ‘green’ hospitality, welcoming you to one of the nation’s most livable cities with peaceful ambiance, artful decor, and unsurpassed service. This 60-room boutique hotel is sure to please. Set in the heart of UW-Madison’s vibrant campus, Union South is a LEED Gold building nestled just steps from Camp Randall and the Wisconsin Institutes for Discovery, between Computer Sciences & Statistics and Engineering Hall.

name: Hilton Madison Monona Terrace
description: The Hilton Madison Monona Terrace hotel is located in the heart of downtown Madison overlooking Lake Monona. The Hilton Madison hotel is connected via a climate controlled skywalk to the Frank Lloyd Wright inspired Monona Terrace Community and Convention Center. The hotel is conveniently located in downtown Madison just blocks from the WI State Capitol Building and the University of Wisconsin Madison campus. Local favorite attractions such as the Henry Vilas Zoo, Overture Theater District, and State Street are just a few short blocks away.

name: The Edgewater Hotel
description: Located in the heart of downtown Madison, next door to the University of Wisconsin-Madison, and within walking distance of the Capitol Square and downtown, The Edgewater Hotel in Madison, Wisconsin serves as an urban resort steps away from eclectic shops and Madison institutions that make the downtown scene so vibrant. We offer 202 rooms and the finest in luxury hotel services and amenities, and you’ll be mesmerized by our legendary and breathtaking location on the water’s edge of Lake Mendota, which is visible from a large variety of viewpoints and venues throughout the hotel, including most of the elegant guest rooms.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Madison Downtown
description:
The DoubleTree by Hilton Madison Downtown is in the heart of all of the action. Just steps from the Kohl Center and the University of Wisconsin-Madison campus, this hotel is perfectly located to be able walk to the Capitol, State Street, and numerous other Downtown Madison venues and attractions. 

Enjoy the courtesy shuttle service to and from the Dane County Regional Airport as well as within a two-mile radius of the hotel. All guests receive complimentary Wi-Fi, and Hilton Honors members can earn points during their stay. The award-winning team looks forward to welcoming you to the beautiful city of Madison with their famous DoubleTree chocolate chip cookies.

name: Sheraton Madison Hotel
description: Enjoy your stay at Sheraton Madison Hotel, our modern hotel near the University of Wisconsin, Madison, where guests can explore the city's attractions, including the Capital City Bike Trail and State Street's shops and restaurants. Our guest rooms and suites feature the Signature Sheraton Sleep Experience Bed, high-speed Wi-Fi, and plenty of power connections, ensuring a comfortable and connected stay. Guests can enjoy fresh meals from The Market and craft cocktails, wine, and chef-inspired menu options at The HUB, the hotel's lobby bar.

name: Madison Concourse Hotel and Governor's Club
description: Welcome to Madison’s hotel. We offer our guests a special Madison experience through our distinctive customer focus, modern Madison-inspired decor and perfect location in the heart of beautiful, vibrant downtown. Stay here and you'll find yourself steps from dozens of restaurants, museums, shops, craft beer bars, cocktail lounges and live music venues, as well as bicycle and kayak rentals to travel Madison's bike paths and local lakes, multiple yoga studios and the nation's largest producer-only farmers' market. While you're within our walls, enjoy local flavors at CIRC, our lobby restaurant, take a dip in our 3rd floor pool, use our state-of-the-art fitness center, or grab a cocktail in our Bar. Book a room in our Governor's Club level and enjoy complimentary cocktails, hors d'oeuvres, and desserts in our exclusive 12th floor lounge overlooking Madison's stunning State Capitol building. Come find familiar, experience new, and explore our beautiful city!

name: Hyatt Place Madison
description: Experience Modern Comfort and Convenience at Hyatt Place Madison/Downtown. When you stay at Hyatt Place Madison / Downtown, you’ll be walking distance to some of the best attractions in downtown Madison such as the Wisconsin State Capitol and Overture Center for the Arts. We’re also a few blocks away from the University of Wisconsin-Madison, Monona Terrace, State Street, and the Madison Children’s Museum.

name: AmericInn by Wyndham Madison South
description: The recently upgraded rooms at the AmericInn Madison South include updated furnishings, room décor, flat screen TV’s and cozy Serta® Perfect Sleeper beds. The AmericInn Madison hotel is conveniently located in Monona, Wisconsin near both the University of Wisconsin and the Dane County Regional Airport. Madison is rich in history and is conveniently located near an abundance of area attractions and activities. From the bustling Farmer's Market to the beautiful Monona Terrace Center downtown, there is always plenty to see and do in this vibrant city.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Madison / Downtown
description:
The award-winning Hampton Inn & Suites Madison/Downtown is in the heart of downtown Madison, WI. Just a short walk from shops, restaurants, sporting venues, convention centers, and nightlife, all downtown Madison attractions can be easily reached.

The hotel offers a free hot breakfast, free WiFi, free fitness center, indoor swimming pool and whirlpool, integrated parking ramp, and an on-site restaurant. 

Enjoy a great night's sleep on the Clean and Fresh Hampton bed, and guest room amenities including microwave, refrigerator, and ergonomic desk. 

If you're not satisfied, we don't expect you to pay, that's our 100% Hampton Guarantee.

description:
The Hampton Inn Lubbock hotel is located in Lubbock, Texas, off the Quaker Avenue Exit of South Loop 289, behind Jason's Deli.  Area attractions include Texas Tech University, the West Texas Walk of Fame and Buddy Holly statue, local wineries, sporting events, golf courses, shopping malls, and amusement parks.  A variety of restaurants, including IHOP, Jason's Deli, Cheddar's, Outback Steak House, and Applebee's are within walking distance.

The Hampton Inn Lubbock hotel features 80 rooms, each with cable TV, high-speed wireless internet, hairdryer, iron, and ironing board. Microwaves and refrigerators are available in all rooms. Additional hotel amenities include our free hot breakfast, an indoor spa and pool, a business center, and copy-fax services.

We love having you here at the Hampton Inn Lubbock.

name: Hyatt Place Lubbock
description: The Hyatt Place Lubbock hotel offers the comfort, convenience, and amenities that modern travelers desire. Our hotel and staff will be glad to welcome you and make you feel right at home. We are located just a short drive from Lubbock International Airport. name: La Quinta Inn & Suites by Wyndham Irvine Spectrum
description:
Finding an ideal family-friendly hotel in Irvine does not have to be difficult. Welcome to La Quinta Inn & Suites Irvine Spectrum, a nice option for travelers like you.
The rooms offer a flat screen TV and air conditioning, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available, allowing you to rest and refresh with ease.
La Quinta Inn & Suites Irvine Spectrum features a 24 hour front desk. In addition, as a valued La Quinta Irvine guest, you can enjoy a pool and free breakfast that are available on-site. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to free parking.
Close to some of Irvine's most popular landmarks, such as Northwood Gratitude and Honor Memorial (2.5 mi) and Xtreme Adventures (2.7 mi), La Quinta Irvine is a great destination for tourists.
While visiting Irvine, you may want to try some oyster at one of the nearby restaurants, such as Sam Woo or EMC Seafood & Raw Bar.
If you’re looking for something to do, Orange County Great Park (1.0 mi) is a nice way to spend some time, and it is within walking distance of La Quinta Irvine.
La Quinta Inn & Suites Irvine Spectrum puts the best of Irvine at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Irvine-Spectrum
description:
The DoubleTree by Hilton Irvine Spectrum is conveniently located in the heart of Orange County's Technology Hub. Only 10 minutes from the John Wayne Orange County Airport (SNA), the hotel is easily accessible from I-5 (Santa Ana Freeway), I-405 (San Diego Freeway) and Hwy 133 (Laguna Freeway). As the gateway to many Orange County attractions, we are a half-mile from the Irvine Spectrum Center and the closest hotel to the new FivePoint Amphitheater. Our hotel is 15 minutes from Laguna Beach, 20 minutes from Disneyland and less than one hour from Los Angeles and San Diego. 

The DoubleTree by Hilton Irvine Spectrum offers 252 guest rooms with many features. All guest rooms feature 50-inch televisions, refrigerator, in-room safes, iron and ironing board, hair dryer, in-room coffeemaker, and internet access.

On-property dining options include 90 Pacifica Restaurant, serving breakfast, lunch and dinner, and 90 Pacifica Wine Bar for casual fare and beverages.

name: Extended Stay America - Orange County - Irvine Spectrum
description: Free grab-and-go breakfast: Jumpstart your day with a free grab-and-go breakfast that includes a variety of breakfast bars and muffins, hot cereal, coffee, and tea.

name: Hilton Irvine Orange County Airport
description: The Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport hotel is situated directly across the street from the John Wayne Airport in Orange County California and offers a complimentary airport shuttle. This Irvine hotel features over 20,000 sq. ft. of flexible meeting and banquet spaces for up to 800 guests for your Orange County wedding or special event. Explore nearby things to do like Newport Beach, Angel Stadium and Disneyland Resort. Hilton Irvine also offers complimentary 24-hour fitness, outdoor heated pool and whirlpool. Awarded Green Hotel Leadership Level by the California Green Lodging Program.

description: Elevate your California stay at AC Hotel Irvine, conveniently located near John Wayne Airport-Orange County and popular attractions like Disneyland® Park and Irvine Spectrum Center. Experience sleek European design throughout our hotel, from the stylish lobby to the chic rooms with luxury bedding and workstations. Unwind at the trendy AC Lounge, enjoy breakfast at AC Kitchen, and stay active with our 24-hour fitness center and heated outdoor pool. Whether for business or leisure, AC Hotel Irvine ensures a successful and stylish stay.

After a busy day, enjoy the amenities we offer such as a 24-hour fitness center, free high-speed internet, and an outdoor sparkling, resort-style pool.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Irvine Orange County Airport
description:
The Embassy Suites Irvine - Orange County Airport hotel is the premiere suite hotel located in Southern California. Less than a mile from John Wayne/Orange County Airport, this Embassy Suites hotel is central to major corporations in the Irvine/Airport area and just minutes to Newport, Huntington and Laguna Beach, California. Our hotel is just a short drive to many top Orange County destinations including: Disneyland Resort, South Coast Plaza, University of California at Irvine, Irvine Spectrum, Anaheim Convention Center, Boomers! and K1 Speed Indoor Racing.

In town to catch a game? The Embassy Suites Irvine - Orange County Airport hotel is a short drive to Angel Stadium of Anaheim, home to the Los Angeles Angels of Anaheim and The Honda Center, home to the Anaheim Ducks.

Enjoy our spacious two-room suites featuring separate living room and private bedroom, microwave, refrigerator, galley kitchen and dining/work area.

 The Hampton Inn Glendale-Peoria hotel features 112 rooms, some with whirlpools, a modern, Southwestern decor, gift shop, exercise gym, connecting rooms, cribs and outdoor pool.

Las habitaciones del ALEGRIA Florida Park están equipadas con baño y secador de pelo, balcón, teléfono, TV vía satélite, calefacción y aire acondicionado, nevera y caja fuerte (con cargo). En el restaurante, tipo buffet, podrán disfrutar de una gran variedad de productos frescos y cocinados en el momento, en la terraza encontrarán un snack-bar con show cooking durante el día donde podrán tomar algo mientras disfrutan de los Shows nocturnos que preparamos cada día.
