description: Hyatt Place Reno is located directly across from the Reno-Tahoe International Airport and next to I-580. Only 3 miles from downtown, 4 from the University of Nevada Reno and 40 minutes from beautiful North Lake Tahoe. This modern hotel features a large Indoor pool, 24-hour fitness center, outdoor hot tub and an e-room with two computers and a printer. Oversized guestrooms feature Hyatt Grand Bed(s), a 49" flat-screen HDTV, desk/workstation, mini-refrigerator, single-serve coffee/tea maker and a Cozy Corner sectional sofa sleeper. Our Restaurant is open for a complimentary hot breakfast from 6am-9:30am M-F and 6am-10am S-S. We serve dinner options from 4pm - 10pm daily and we do have a Grab-n-Go that is open 24 hours. Our bar provides beer, wine and well drinks as well as non-alcoholic refreshments and our Bakery Cafe has the best Hyatt cookies ever! Come stay with us and enjoy a relaxing non-smoking, non-gaming and friendly experience!

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Reno West, NV
description:
Enjoy a stay at Hampton Inn & Suites Reno West hotel where you'll be close to downtown Reno, nightlife and skiing. Our modern hotel in Reno, Nevada, has easy access onto I-80. Attend an event at the University of Nevada, Reno 5 miles away. Our suburban location just outside of downtown is convenient to shopping, dining and casinos. Enjoy water activities on the Truckee River, or browse the Riverwalk District.

Before you venture out each day, visit the lobby for our free hot breakfast, which includes delicious freshly baked waffles, hot and cold items, juices and coffee. Refresh after a long day in the indoor heated swimming pool, and soothe tired muscles in the spa. Maintain your exercise routine in the modern fitness center. For your business needs, we offer free WiFi throughout the hotel. Hold a meeting in our 675 sq. ft. space that accommodates up to 60 people. Pick up a snack in the convenience shop.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Reno
description:
Whether your visit to Reno, Nevada is for business or pleasure, the Hampton Inn and Suites Reno, NV hotel is here to make your stay comfortable and memorable. Centrally located in the South Meadows area of Reno, the hotel is close to many of the local attractions, corporate office buildings and a short drive to many outdoor activities. The hotel is just seven miles from the Reno Tahoe International Airport.  This beautiful new hotel is elegantly appointed with an upscale look and service to match. 

Our Reno Hampton Inn & Suites features amenity filled hotel rooms and suites that come standard with a king or double queen bed, coffeemaker, microwave, micro-fridge, hair dryer, iron and ironing board, radio/alarm clock, two phones, voicemail, cable TV with complimentary movie channel and complimentary high-speed internet access. Guests can request a spacious suite with sleeper sofa, connecting rooms and cribs.

name: Peppermill Resort Spa Casino
description: Experience Energy Star Certified Peppermill Resort Spa Casino, Reno’s premier resort. Luxuriate in one of 1,621 opulent guest rooms, including the 600-room all-suite Tuscany Tower. Be pampered in the lavish 3-story, 33,000-square-foot Spa & Salon Toscana, featuring 24 treatment rooms, an indoor pool, sun terrace, a full-service salon, Himalayan salt retreat, and Northern Nevada’s only caldarium. Enjoy 82-000-square-feet of slots and table games across the expansive casino floor and state-of-the-art race & sportsbook. Resort amenities include two remarkable geothermally heated outdoor pools and three jetted spas, three designer boutiques, and the 9,900-square-foot fitness center. Embrace any craving at 9 award-winning restaurants, ranging from authentic Chinese to sumptuous steaks and seafood. Revel in Peppermill nightlife, featuring 15 bars and lounges including the iconic Fireside Lounge, and Reno’s largest whiskey bar, Terrace Lounge.

name: Thousand Trails Chesapeake Bay
description:
A 280-acre waterfront Thousand Trails RV campground set along the banks of beautiful Piankatank River, offering both shady and open campsites. Chesapeake Bay RV Camping has full hook-up sites plus tent sites and rental cabins. Facilities at this coastal Virginia RV campground are clean and well maintained. Our friendly, welcoming staff is on call 24 hours.

Upstream from the Chesapeake Bay, Piankatank River is perfect for boating, water skiing, jet skiing, swimming, crabbing, and fishing. Both saltwater and freshwater fishing are within a quarter mile boat ride from Chesapeake Bay RV Camping. 

Nearby are 3 "living history" towns of unparalleled historical significance. Colonial Williamsburg, Yorktown and the Jamestown Settlement make up what is known as Virginia's "Historical Triangle", and the beautiful Colonial Parkway that connects them is worth the drive if you do nothing else.

description: Free grab-and-go breakfast: Jumpstart your day with a free grab-and-go breakfast that includes a variety of breakfast bars and muffins, hot cereal, coffee, and tea.

name: The Chesapeake Inn
description: The Chesapeake Inn is a perfect retreat for a weekend getaway or a weekday retreat from the chaos of everyday life. We offer twelve beautifully renovated rooms, each with a unique mix of vintage and modern furnishings, a chandelier and a seating area for two in a style we call "coastal elegant" - pretty enough to make our guests feel special but laid-back enough to put your feet up! We are dedicated to true personalized service -- we truly want our guests to feel like the Inn is "their retreat by the river." We don't have an official check-in time and don't ever want our guests to have to wait. Instead, we do our best to make sure our guests' rooms are ready when they arrive! We don't charge extra fees: our rates include snacks and waters and the full use of our amenities (including our bikes, surreys and kayaks), and we welcome pets and families (again, no extra fees). Plus, we provide everything you might need for a weekend away including wireless internet service, 32" LCD televisions, luxury personal amenities, full size refrigerators, microwave ovens, and on site parking. Enjoy the delicious seafood at our wonderful restaurant onsite, the Half Shell Grill, play a game or relax in our lobby/living room or grab a bite at one of Urbanna's other restaurants (6 within a couple blocks of us). Use one of our complimentary kayaks to enjoy Urbanna Harbor, peruse the antiques stores and other shops, or take one of our pedal operated Surreys or bicycles for a joy ride around historic Port Town Urbanna. Nestled in the heart of town, you are only a short stroll to all of our little town's beauty! And the Chesapeake Inn is pet and family friendly, so bring your four-legged family members and kids along:) Come visit us to play, shop, and relax! Our downtown Richmond, Virginia hotel is housed in the former Miller and Rhoads department store, an iconic building with over 100 years of history. The restored building spans an entire city block and boasts original features, such as the lobby marble floor, laid in 1883, and high ceilings. 

Enjoy easy access to all that Richmond has to offer including theaters, historical sites, museums, restaurants, and the Greater Richmond Convention Center. Enjoy a complimentary shuttle service within a one mile radius. Convenient location to many businesses, attractions, and the Main Street Station, where Amtrak runs through Richmond numerous times each day. 

Unwind in a comfortable guest room with work space, complimentary WiFi with Hilton Honors membership, a mini refrigerator, and a coffeemaker. For a memorable experience, select a suite located on the corner of the hotel, offering incredible views of the city.
amenities: Free Wired Internet in the Business Center

name: Graduate Richmond
description: An inspired stay down the street from campus, Graduate Richmond hotel celebrates local icons, VCU traditions and the city's history through unique, thoughtful designs. You'll discover something new with every visit. Our newly updated rooftop bar is the highest in town, with locally inspired drinks, delicious food and stunning 360 views. You'll also enjoy access to our equally scenic rooftop pool. Looking for a quick breakfast or casual dinner? Swing into our lobby-level Brookfield cafe. Close to campus and downtown, you'll be near all of Richmond's top attractions. And whether you’re in town rallying for the Rams, dropping by a show at The National or checking out the area's championship golf courses, Graduate Richmond's team of local experts is here to make your stay memorable. Graduate Richmond is part of Graduate Hotels, a collection of 33+ unique hotels in college towns across the U.S. and U.K.

name: Omni Richmond Hotel
description: Embrace Southern elegance at Omni Richmond Hotel, an elegant retreat that overlooks the class 4 rapids of the scenic James River in Richmond, Virginia. Enjoy storied views, a heated indoor pool, and a beautiful atrium restaurant serving Tuscan delights. There's also an Italian market, Starbucks cafe, and breezy outdoor sundeck. The Virginia State Capitol and Virginia Museum of Fine Arts are moments away from the hotel. The hotel is conveniently located in downtown Richmond, VA making it an ideal place to hold large meetings, corporate events, and weddings. Our personalized service and luxury accommodations will not disappoint you and your guests. Omni Richmond Hotel is a truly unique destination offering easy access to timeless architecture, historic features and vibrant local life that defines the Richmond experience.
amenities: Free Wifi in the Business Center

name: Quality Inn Central
description: The Quality Inn® Central in Richmond is the perfect spot for the social traveler. If you’re looking to host a work event or are visiting the state’s capital with a group, we have the kind of affordable options you’re looking for. Our smoke-free hotel is designed to keep you comfortable and relaxed through your busy schedule, and you can count on amenities like a fitness center, free WiFi and free parking for your convenience. Each guest room makes for a great night’s rest, featuring a microwave and refrigerator along with a coffee maker, iron and ironing board. The city of Richmond is packed with places to explore during your free time, including pieces of history like St. John’s Church, Malvern Hill Battlefield and Henricus Historical Park. If you want to get in touch with nature, Richmond’s Belle Isle and the Virginia Capital Trail are great places to do so. Foodies will be particularly happy here, as the city offers cuisine from all over the world. Enjoy spots like Lehja, Heritage and Roosevelt. If you’re here for a larger event, you’re conveniently near the Richmond International Airport, Richmond Coliseum and Greater Richmond Convention Center.

description: Experience traditional Southern elegance in a historic yet modern setting at Hampton Inn & Suites Birmingham-Downtown-Tutwiler. With over 100 years of history, our hotel is a downtown icon near the legal, banking and cultural districts. Nearby attractions include Birmingham Jefferson Convention Complex, Uptown Entertainment District, Alabama Theatre and Lyric Theatre, Birmingham Civil Rights Institute and Birmingham Museum of Art. The hotel features well-furnished guest rooms including 52 suites. Specialty options include balcony suites, fireplace suites and the 2-bedroom Presidential Suite. Enjoy free breakfast daily and free WiFi.

name: Hyatt Regency Birmingham - The Wynfrey Hotel
description: Welcome to Hyatt Regency Birmingham – The Wynfrey Hotel; a multi-million dollar renovation with untouched southern hospitality was completed in 2021. The transformation includes all guestrooms, meeting space, public space, and food & beverage outlets. The hotel now offers 329 modern guestrooms with features and amenities that allow for a convenient and comfortable stay. Each guest room has the Hyatt Grand bed, an in-room safe, 42" flat panel TV and a mini fridge. All 32,000 square feet of meeting and event space, including the Wynfrey Ballroom and over 22 meeting rooms, have been elegantly appointed with contemporary updates. A revitalized sense of arrival with an updated lobby coupled with a new restaurant, Merk’s Tavern and Kitchen, and a Hyatt StayFit fitness center, will complement the time-honored southern hospitality that awaits you at the Hyatt Regency Birmingham - The Wynfrey Hotel.

description: With a direct connection to the Birmingham-Jefferson Convention Complex (BJCC), a short trip to the University of Alabama at Birmingham and the Birmingham Zoo, and more downtown hotspots right outside our doors, The Westin Birmingham is the ideal staging point for your visit to Birmingham, Alabama. Our pet-friendly hotel is ready to help you start your day strong with a visit to our 24/7 on-site fitness center, or with a swim in our heated terrace pool with a view of downtown. We are also prepared to help make your event, meeting, or wedding the best it can be with our 58,000 square feet of event space featuring banquet halls, breakout rooms, and more. Whatever brings you to Alabama, treat yourself to a stylish break with The Westin Birmingham.

description:
First opened in 1925, Redmont Hotel Birmingham, Curio Collection by Hilton, underwent a complete renovation in 2015, embracing state-of-the-art technologies and amenities, while retaining the style and glamour associated with the hotel in the 1920s. Our boutique hotel is within walking distance to the Theatre District where you will discover The Alabama Theatre, The Lyric Theatre, Paramount Restaurant and Bar, and lots of other dining and theatre options.

Organize a meeting or plan your dream wedding at this Downtown Birmingham, AL hotel. Our mezzanine level ballrooms provide the perfect setting for a host of events, and our dedicated staff will ensure your function is personalized and professional. Our 24-hour Connectivity Zone is the ideal place to check emails or make updates to your presentation.

Energize with the latest cardio and weights technology in the 24-hour fitness center.

description:
Located in the heart of downtown, Hilton Birmingham at UAB puts you within walking distance to the Five Points area and the University of Alabama at Birmingham. Navigating the city is easy with MAX Connect and our complimentary shuttle within two miles from the hotel, as well as to the airport and train. We are just blocks away from Region's Park, home of the Birmingham Barons, Uptown, Lakeside and the BJCC Convention Center Complex. The hotel also features a six level parking facility with direct guest room access. 

Our stylish guest rooms with UAB-themed décor boast floor-to-ceiling windows and offer oversized workspace with ergonomic chair, refrigerator, safe and individually controlled air conditioning. Select a large suite or executive room for a higher floor location, extra amenities, and Executive Lounge access with complimentary breakfast and refreshments throughout the day.

The hotel is also near the Birmingham Zoo, Birmingham Botanical Gardens, Vulcan Park, and other local attractions. During your stay at this hotel in Birmingham AL, enjoy fully furnished two-room hotel suites featuring separate living and sleeping areas, a balcony, and included amenities such as two flat-screen televisions and WiFi availability. The Embassy Suites Birmingham hotel offers 5,100 sq. ft. of flexible meeting and event space, including a 4,704 sq. ft. ballroom for hosting a large conference or banquet for up to 320 guests. Exercise in the fitness center and stay fit with a swim in the hotel's indoor pool.  Savor a unique dining experience at Ruth's Chris Steak House, which serves a range of succulent steaks, lamb and seafood dishes, and enjoy a free cooked-to-order breakfast every morning.

DoubleTree by Hilton Spokane-City Center
description: Our pet-friendly riverside hotel is located on the Centennial Trail, a 3-minute walk from the 100-acre Riverfront Park and Spokane Falls. Shopping and dining destinations at River Park Square are a short walk away, or wander over to Gonzaga to cheer on the Bulldogs. Attending a convention, sporting event or show? Our hotel is connected to the Spokane Convention Center and First Interstate Center for the Arts, and we are less than one mile away from the Spokane Arena and The Podium. Please note, we have suspended our hotel transport services. We recommend taxi, Lyft, or Uber from the airport (trip is approximately 15 minutes).

Enjoy fresh baked cookies and coffee every evening in our lobby.

We are conveniently located 3 miles from some of the area's best medical centers such as Kaiser Permanente and 4 miles from the historic downtown area where you can visit the historical McHenry Museum and Mansion, the Great Value Museum, local farm stands, and eateries. Have a sports tournament at John Thurman Field? We are located less than 5 miles away! Feeling Artsy? Check out the Gallo Center for the Arts just down the road! Make us your home away from home in our lovely guest rooms equipped with free high speed Wi-Fi, and relax in our outdoor heated pool and hot tub. Make sure to grab a bite before you head out for the day with our complimentary breakfast! Looking to host an event? Invite your guests to our lovely ball room!

description:
Everyone needs a place to lay their weary head. For travelers visiting Modesto, California Inn Modesto is an excellent choice for rest and rejuvenation. Well-known for its budget friendly environment and proximity to great restaurants, California Inn Modesto makes it easy to enjoy the best of Modesto.
As your “home away from home,” the hotel rooms offer air conditioning, and getting online is easy, with free wifi available.
Guests have access to room service and a concierge while staying at California Inn Modesto Hotel.
For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Modesto, California Inn Modesto Hotel is located a short distance from John Thurman Field (1.4 mi) and McHenry Mansion (2.2 mi).
Modesto has plenty of Italian restaurants. So when you’re here, be sure to check out popular spots like Galletto Ristorante, Concetta, and Pastas Pronto Italian Food, which are serving up some great dishes.
Whether you’re traveling for business, pleasure or both, California Inn Modesto is sure to make your visit to Modesto one worth remembering.

Gallo Winery, browse the stores in Vintage Faire®, or play 18 holes at Creekside Golf Course. Check out the Victorian McHenry Mansion, catch a performance at Gallo Center for the Arts, or have family fun at Boomers. Caswell Memorial State Park is great for fishing while Stanislaus National Forest offers scenic hikes. For more to do, visit San Francisco for must-sees like the Golden Gate Bridge. Maintain your workout routine in the fitness center before delighting in free breakfast. Plan your day using free WiFi, catch up on work in the business center, and come and go with ease thanks to free parking for vehicles of all sizes. Each non-smoking guest room features a flat-screen HDTV, desk, ironing amenities, hair dryer, and bath products. We also offer a meeting room, sundry shop, guest laundry facilities, and friendly 24/7 front desk staff.

description: Motel 6 Modesto California is located within walking distance to area restaurants. Go shopping or visit the Micke Grove Zoo, 2 miles. Several golf courses are within 5 miles. Enjoy our outdoor pool. Free Wi-Fi is available in all modern guest rooms.

name: Days Inn by Wyndham Modesto
description:
Days Inn by Wyndham Modesto is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Modesto, offering a family-friendly environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.
Rooms at Days Inn Modesto provide a flat screen TV, a refrigerator, and air conditioning, and guests can stay connected with free wifi.
In addition, while staying at Days Inn Modesto Hotel guests have access to a 24 hour front desk, room service, and newspaper. You can also enjoy a pool and free breakfast. Need a place to park? Free parking is available at Days Inn Modesto Hotel.
While staying at Days Inn by Wyndham Modesto, visitors can check out Modesto Historic Graffiti Cruise Route (1.5 mi) and John Thurman Field (2.6 mi), some of Modesto's top attractions.
If you’re looking for a Thai restaurant, consider a visit to Tasty Thai, Thailand Restaurant, or Thai House, which are all conveniently located a short distance from Days Inn Modesto.
If you’re looking for things to do, you can check out McHenry Mansion, which is a popular historic site amongst tourists.
Enjoy your stay in Modesto!

name: Silver Cloud Hotel - Tacoma Waterfront
description: Located in Tacoma's Old Town community is the Silver Cloud Inn Tacoma Waterfront, Tacoma's only waterfront hotel. Our hotel is conveniently located just two miles north of downtown Tacoma's amazing museum district, and is only 10 minutes from Tacoma Dome & Convention Center. All the hotel guestrooms have waterfront views with 55" flat screen TVs and include complimentary high-speed wired and wireless Internet access, microwaves, and refrigerators. A complimentary Silver Cloud Breakfast is provided in addition to our fitness and business centers.
amenities: Free Wifi in the Business Center

name: Holiday Inn Express & Suites Tacoma Downtown, an IHG Hotel
description: The Holiday Inn Express & Suites Tacoma Downtown Hotel is exquisitely designed and conveniently located just off I-5 in the heart of downtown Tacoma. We are minutes away from the University of Washington Tacoma, Union Station, Tacoma Dome, Greater Tacoma Convention Center, Port of Tacoma, and a short drive from Joint Base Lewis McChord. Our spacious suites are perfect for travelers visiting Tacoma General Hospital or St. Joe's Medical Center. Need some leisure downtime? Step out and enjoy the great Pacific Northwest and visit Ruston Way Waterfront, NW Trek Wildlife Park, or our beautiful Mt. Rainier. If you're traveling for business or leisure, stay with us at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Tacoma Downtown. Rest in our fresh and comfortable beds and start your day right with our healthy hot breakfast. You can count on us to be the perfect hotel for all your traveling needs.

name: La Quinta Inn & Suites by Wyndham Tacoma - Seattle
description:
Looking for a place to stay in Tacoma? Then look no further than La Quinta Inn & Suites Tacoma - Seattle, a family-friendly hotel that brings the best of Tacoma to your doorstep.
You’ll enjoy relaxing rooms that offer a flat screen TV, and you can stay connected during your stay as Tacoma La Quinta offers guests free wifi.
The hotel features room service. Plus, La Quinta Tacoma offers a pool and free breakfast, providing a pleasant respite from your busy day. For guests with a vehicle, free parking is available.
Close to some of Tacoma's most popular landmarks, such as Chihuly Bridge of Glass (2.0 mi) and Stadium High School (2.5 mi), Tacoma La Quinta is a great destination for tourists.
Travelers looking to enjoy some ribs can head to Stanley & Seafort's Steak Chop & Fishhouse or Uncle Thurm's. Otherwise, you may want to check out a barbeque restaurant such as L&L Hawaiian Bbq, Tho Tuong BBQ, or Bob's Bar-B-Q.
There is no shortage of things to do in the area: explore popular historic sites such as W.W. Seymour Botanical Conservatory, Fort Nisqually Living History Museum, and Tacoma Armory.
We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at La Quinta Inn & Suites Tacoma - Seattle as you experience everything Tacoma has to offer.

name: Extended Stay America - Tacoma - South
description: Free grab-and-go breakfast: Jumpstart your day with a free grab-and-go breakfast that includes a variety of breakfast bars and muffins, hot cereal, coffee, and tea. Cash is accepted as a form of payment for those guests paying by a weekly or monthly rate. A valid credit card must be kept on file for incidentals. Cash is not accepted as a method of payment for guests paying the daily rate.

name: Hotel Murano
description: Welcome to Hotel Murano, a boutique downtown Tacoma hotel located adjacent to the Tacoma Convention Center and steps from the city’s best museums and restaurants. Tacoma is the epicenter of the American glass art movement and, honoring that heritage, Hotel Murano pairs luxurious guestrooms and well-appointed event space with a museum worthy collection of glass art from around the globe. Hotel Murano is conveniently located in the heart of Tacoma attractions, including Chambers Bay, site of the 2015 US Open and just minutes from downtown Seattle. With a world-class art collection, delicious cuisine at Bite and craft cocktails at our Lobby Bar, and a full-service spa and salon, Hotel Murano is the perfect place to wake up inspired. As one of Tacoma’s finest pet friendly hotels, Hotel Murano invites guests and man’s best friend to take on Tacoma while enjoying our boutique accommodations, timeless service and modern style.

name: Columbus Marriott
description: Experience a seamless blend of high-tech and high-touch amenities at Columbus Marriott. Originally constructed as a mid-nineteenth-century cotton mill, our downtown hotel is mere steps from the Coca-Cola Space Science Center, Springer Opera House and the Chattahoochee RiverWalk. When you're not attending an event at the adjacent Columbus Georgia Convention and Trade Center, host a business function or social occasion in one of our five venues. Whatever the reason for your travels, allow Columbus Marriott to provide the professional service and luxurious amenities you deserve.

Experience the limitless possibilities of downtown Columbus and beyond right outside the hotel’s front door. From rushing down the Chattahoochee River on the world’s largest urban whitewater course to renting bikes and taking a leisurely ride down the Riverwalk, downtown Columbus has an adventure for every guest at every turn. Or choose to simply relax and indulge in culinary excellence at our on-site Millhouse Restaurant. Experience a tantalizing journey through our extensive menu featuring delectable appetizers, exquisite charcuterie, flavorful soups and salads, succulent seafood, mouthwatering beef, poultry and pork dishes, irresistible desserts, and handcrafted cocktails.

name: Hotel Indigo Columbus at Riverfront Place
description: While we may like to take it slow in the South, our tendency to settle into the moment hasn’t stopped the hustle. Founded as a riverfront trading town, the Chattahoochee River rapids are the soundtrack to our city. Hotel Indigo Columbus at Riverfront Place celebrates the spirit of creativity and innovation that spawned the historic W.C. Bradley family, whose influence continues in our hotel today. Founded in 1885, the W.C. Bradley company is distinguished in adaptability and forward-thinking, most known for manufacturing consumer goods with subsidiaries including Char-Broil and Zebco brands. In our restaurant, local gets the spotlight with fresh entrees featuring handpicked produce from W.C. Bradley Farms. With 107 uniquely-appointed guest rooms, our hotel gives you the front seat to the hidden essence of our neighborhood. You don’t need to go far for views – our rooftop bar offers an inviting setting for twilight craft cocktails and regionally-influenced local beers overlooking the Chattahoochee. Cheers to a moment to savor.

name: Fort Conde Inn
description: The Fort Conde Inn, Alabama's only 4-star, AAA four diamond rated boutique hotel and bed and breakfast, is a luxurious facility exuding the style and feel of nineteenth century Mobile. Requiring two years of meticulous workmanship, the Inn has now been restored to its original Victorian splendor. Built in 1836, the Fort Conde Inn (Hall-Ford House) is Mobile’s second oldest house and its interior and exterior finishes reflect its architectural vintage from original heart pine flooring and custom-milled stairways, moldings, and window and door trim to marble fireplace mantles, plaster walls, 12 foot ceilings and crystal chandeliers. The Fort Conde Inn, located in Mobile's historic Fort Conde Village, has recently expanded to include four newly restored hisorically certified homes: The Antunez House, the Spear-Barter House, as well as the Blakely and Gonzalez cottages. Walking into the Inn today, is like taking a step back in time to when these homes were originally built. The Inn sits on a quiet street in Fort Conde Village surrounded by Victorian homes restored with integrity and respect for their architectural heritage. It is situated adjacent to Fort Conde, a pre-revolutionary war fort built by the French in 1720 and named after the Prince of Conde, a grandson of Luis XIV. Mobile was founded by the French and the fort protected Mobile from incursions by the British. In recognition of the French heritage of this land, the rooms at the Inn have been named in French after friends and family members of the owner.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Tallahassee
description:
Welcome to the Doubletree Hotel Tallahassee - a full-service, hotel in the heart of downtown Tallahassee, Florida.

The Doubletree Hotel Tallahassee is located in the heart of downtown Tallahassee and is within walking distance from Florida's Capital Complex, the Florida Supreme Court, U.S. Federal Court, Leon County Courthouse, Tallahassee-Leon County Civic Center, and many government offices and museums. This Doubletree hotel offers views of the city parks, friendly service and an unbeatable location with easy access to Florida State University, Florida A&M University and only 15 minutes from Tallahassee Regional Airport. Our luxurious guest rooms include all the comforts of home and must-have amenities for business and leisure travelers alike.

Doubletree Hotel Tallahassee Features: 6,000 square feet of flexible meeting and banquet space, Two executive meeting suites, Complimentary wireless high-speed Internet access in public areas, Valet and self parking, Outdoor pool and sundeck,

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Tallahassee
description:
The Homewood Suites by Hilton Tallahassee hotel is located in beautiful Tallahassee, Florida just two miles from the Downtown State Capitol Complex and one mile from the famous Governor's Mall. The Homewood Suites hotel in Tallahassee is located within a 2.5 mile radius of Southwood, the Department of Health, Tom Brown Park, Florida State University & Florida A&M University.  All guest rooms at the Homewood Suites hotel in Tallahassee, Florida feature a separate bedroom and kitchen. Please note, our hotel does not allow parties of any kind in guest suites.

We offer a complimentary Suite Start hot breakfast seven days a week and a complimentary Welcome Home reception every Wednesday evening which includes beer and wine. The Homewood Suites hotel in Tallahassee, Florida also offers complimentary wireless high-speed internet in every room and in our hotel lobby. We also offer over 2,300 square feet of meeting space and can accommodate all food, beverage, audio and video needs.
amenities: Free Wired Internet in the Business Center

name: Hilton Garden Inn Tallahassee
description:
The Hilton Garden Inn Tallahassee hotel is just off Florida Interstate I-10 and minutes from downtown Tallahassee. Florida State University, Florida A & M University and numerous corporate offices are also nearby. We offer deluxe accommodations with complimentary high-speed Internet access and secure PrinterOn remote printing. Each Hilton Garden Inn Tallahassee hotel room features an oversized work desk with an ergonomic chair, two telephones, voicemail, data ports, and Internet access. Other standard features include a microwave, refrigerator, coffee maker, hairdryer, iron and ironing board, satellite television with HBO, and a full array of Neutrogena bath products.

The Hilton Garden Inn Tallahassee, Florida hotel breakfast restaurant, The Garden Grille & Bar, serves a bountiful breakfast buffet until 10:00am weekdays and 11:00 am weekends. For lunch or dinner service, numerous local restaurants are located within just a few blocks of the Hilton Garden Inn Tallahassee hotel.

name: Aloft Tallahassee Downtown
description:
Looking for a place to stay in Tallahassee? Then look no further than Aloft Tallahassee Downtown, a family-friendly hotel that brings the best of Tallahassee to your doorstep.
Aloft Tallahassee Downtown Hotel is a family-friendly hotel offering a flat screen TV, a refrigerator, and air conditioning in the rooms, and it is easy to stay connected during your stay as free wifi is offered to guests.
The hotel features a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and baggage storage. Plus, guests can enjoy a pool and a lounge, which have made this a popular choice among travelers visiting Tallahassee. For guests with a vehicle, parking is available.
Nearby landmarks such as Knott House Museum (0.2 mi) and Old City Cemetery (0.4 mi) make Aloft Tallahassee Downtown a great place to stay when visiting Tallahassee.
If you like seafood restaurants, Aloft Tallahassee Downtown Hotel is conveniently located near Crystal River Seafood, Harry's Seafood Bar and Grille, and Bird's Aphrodisiac Oyster Shack.
If you’re looking for things to do, you can check out Florida State University (0.6 mi), Museum of Florida History (0.5 mi), or Cascades Park (0.7 mi), which are popular attractions amongst tourists, and they are all within walking distance.
We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Aloft Tallahassee Downtown as you experience everything Tallahassee has to offer.

name: Four Points by Sheraton Tallahassee Downtown
description: The Four Points by Sheraton Tallahassee Downtown is located in the heart of the city, just blocks from Florida State University, the State Capitol building, Florida A&M University, local museums, shopping, and more. Our hotel is the first L.E.E.D. Silver Certified property in Tallahassee actively carries out sustainable principles and practices in our daily operations. Our hotel features 164 guestrooms, a full-service restaurant, 2 bars, a resort-style pool, hot tub, a 24-hour fitness center, free Wi-Fi, and much more. We are the only choice when visiting Florida's capital city.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Tallahassee Capitol-University
description:
Settle in for a relaxing stay in the heart of Tallahassee. Whether you're visiting us for business or leisure, our Hampton Inn & Suites Tallahassee Capitol-University hotel offers a prime location between historic All Saints District and the revitalized Gaines Street corridor. Enjoy modern comfort steps from Capitol Hill, Florida State University, Florida A&M University, Donald L. Tucker Civic Center and Cascade's Park.
Our modern guest rooms feature free WiFi, a microwave, refrigerator and HDTV. Head to the lobby for free hot breakfast each morning, or grab one of Hampton's On the Run™ Breakfast Bags, available Monday through Friday. Get a complete workout in our 24-hour fitness center or take a dip in our outdoor pool. Stay productive in our business center with access to a computer, faxing and printing capabilities.

name: Hyatt House Tallahassee Capitol-University
description: Escape to a peaceful retreat at Hyatt House Tallahassee Capitol - University, and discover the eclectic style of Railroad Square, the arts, and creative hub surrounding our hotel. Stay steps away from Florida State University and Florida A&M University, the beautiful nature trails of Cascades Park, and exciting dining options—and just a short drive away from the Florida State Capitol and Tallahass

name: Fairfield Inn & Suites by Marriott Tallahassee Central
description: If you're looking for a great new hotel in Tallahassee, you'll love the Fairfield Inn & Suites Tallahassee Central. At the Fairfield Inn & Suites Tallahassee, you're our #1 priority. We promise you'll be satisfied, or we'll make it right. That's our commitment to you. Ask us about the Fairfield 100% Guarantee. Our brand new Tallahassee, FL hotel is near Florida State University (FSU), Florida A&M University (FAMU), and Tallahassee Community College (TCC). Key businesses like Deloitte, HP, Accenture, and Ernst & Young are nearby, and we're just three miles from downtown Tallahassee and the State Capitol. Every room and suite in our hotel features free Wi-Fi and high-speed wired Internet access, a 32" flat-screen HD TV, mini-refrigerator, spacious work desk, and one king or two queen size beds. Suites also offer sofas - as well as extra space and privacy. Start your day with a complimentary HOT breakfast scrambled eggs, sausage, waffles, fruit, muffins, and more.

name: Courtyard by Marriott Tallahassee Downtown/Capital
description: Book your stay at the Courtyard by Marriott Tallahassee Downtown/Capital hotel. Located in Tallahassee, Florida, we are close to attractions such as the Governor's Square Mall, the Old Capitol Museum and the Railroad Square Art District. After a busy day, enjoy the amenities we offer such as a 24-hour fitness center, free high-speed internet, an American restaurant and a sparkling outdoor pool.

name: Wyndham Garden Tallahassee Capitol
description: Set 1.5 miles from the Knott House Museum, this modern 4-story hotel is also 1.6 miles from the Florida State Capitol. The airy rooms with subdued decor feature free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs and coffeemakers, plus desks with ergonomic chairs. Upgraded rooms add minifridges and microwaves. Kids aged 17 and under stay free with paying adults. Parking is free (including large-vehicles). There's also an outdoor heated pool and an exercise room, plus a business center and meeting rooms.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites by Hilton Huntsville Downtown
description: Our hotel is across the street from the Von Braun Center in the heart of downtown Huntsville. Museums, parks, and dozens of restaurants are within a mile. Visit the US Space & Rocket Center and Huntsville Botanical Garden, each 10 minutes away. We offer 1,870 sq. ft. of meeting space and a full bar, plus a fitness center.

name: The Westin Huntsville
description: Rest easy at The Westin Huntsville. Our hotel in Huntsville, Alabama, is located near Huntsville Botanical Garden, the U.S. Space & Rocket Center, and Southern Adventures amusement park. After a busy day, unwind in our pool and fitness center, or enjoy on-site dining at Sage Grille and Trieste Cafe.

address_obj.address_string: 6800 Governors West NW Nw, Huntsville, AL 35806-3202

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Huntsville Research Park Area
description:
The Hampton Inn is located within minutes from the Huntsville International Airport in the heart of Cummings Research Park. Huntsville is a city rich with charm, culture, ambiance and a thriving business climate.
The hotel faces a quaint lake with a 1/2 mile walking track around. The hotel features rooms with one king bed and sofa bed, rooms with two queen beds, and suites with separate living and sleeping rooms. All rooms feature free HSIA with printer on demand capalbilities. The suites offer a mini fridge and a microwave and all rooms include coffee makers. The hotel rooms also feature I-Home radios with MP3 connections. All rooms will have 32" LCD TV's featuring HD channels. The pool is an outdoor saline pool which is eco-friendly. The exercise room features all the latest equipment and has a laundry room with in for the time conscious guest.
